'*' matches zero or more characters ('run*' matches 'run', 'runs', and'running', etc.) '?' matches exactly one character ('run?' matches 'runs' and 'rung', but not 'run' or 'running').
“*” 匹配零个或若干个字符（“run*”匹配“run”、“runs”、和“running”，等等） “?” 匹配单个字符（“run?”匹配“runs”和“rung”，但不匹配“run”或“running”）。
'*' matches zero or more characters, from the current position in a given word to its end.
‘*’匹配零个或多个字符，从指定单词的当前位置开始到它结束的部分。
'?' matches any single character.
‘?’匹配任何单个字符。

(Do not confuse this folder with the "dictionary" folder in OmegaT projects.) Then select the URL (website address) of an online repository from which to download the dictionary or dictionaries, and paste this URL into the "URL of online dictionaries" field.

(Download from the links provided; Linux users may prefer to install from their distribution's repositories, where this is possible)
（请点击链接下载； Linux用户在可能的情况下更倾向于从其发行版的存储库进行安装）
(For more detailed instructions, refer to your instruction manual or click <a0>here</a0>, <a1>here</a1> or <a2>here</a2>.)
（有关更详细的说明，请参阅您的说明手册或点击<a0> 这里 </ a0>，<a1> 这里 </ a1>或<a2> 这里 </ a2>。）
(If Options > View > "Include the first non-unique segment when marking non-unique segments" is selected, all non-unique segments including the first are marked in this way.)
（如果选项>浏览>“标记非唯一片段时包含第一个非唯一片段”被选中，所有非唯一片段包括第一个非唯一片段将均按此方式标记）
(If you have translated into a language which is not your operating system language, see below, "How OmegaT handles localized versions".)
（如果您已经翻译为操作系统语言以外的语言，请参阅下面的“OmegaT如何处理本地化版本”。）
(If you think you have significantly contributed to the OmegaT Project but you (don't see your name on the lists, feel free to contact us.)
（如果您认为您对 OmegaT 项目做出了重大贡献但名字没有出现在列表中， 请随时与我们联系。）
(If you wish to launch OmegaT with a user interface language other than English, make the same change in the relevant localized Bundle.properties file.)
(如果您希望以非英语的用户界面语言启动OmegaT，请在相关的本地化的Bundle.properties file文件中进行相同的更改.)

(In the user's manual, see 'Files to translate' > 'File formats' for a list of supported file formats.) To add files to the project, click on the Copy Files to Source Folder... button in the Project Files window or call this action from the Project menu and select the source files you want to copy.
（在用户手册中，参见“待翻译文件” > “文件格式”来了解支持的文件格式。） 要添加文件到项目中，在项目文件窗口中点击复制文件到源文件夹...按钮或从项目菜单中调用此功能，并选定你想要复制的源文件。
(Infix is also reported to work on WINE.)
（据研究Infix也可以在WINE上运作。）
(It will, of course, check for Bolivian rather than Mexican Spanish!)
（当然，有时也会检查是否是玻利维亚西班牙语而非墨西哥西班牙语！）
(Leave the Password empty if you are using an API Key.)
（如果你正在使用 API 密钥，将密码留空即可。）
(Not to be confused with the "Text Export" feature, which also enables scripts to be used with OmegaT, but on a more basic level.)
（不要与“文本导出”功能混淆，该功能也可以在OmegaT中使用脚本，但是在更基础的层面上）。
(Note to Ubuntu users: the font implementation of the default tcl/tk installation in Ubuntu at the present time (version 9.10) is appalling, but can be rectified.)
（Ubuntu系统用户注意：当前版本的Ubuntu系统（9.10）中的tcl/tk默认安装中的字体略不美观，但这是可以调正的。）
(Note: these are the English files.
（注意：这些是英文文件。

(OmegaT is far from unique in this respect: many other CAT tools convert source files to a different format, in some cases in the background without the translator being aware of the fact, before they are translated.)
(由此看来，OmegaT 远不能独立使用：毕竟许多其他 CAT 工具可在译员翻译之前自行将源文件转换为其他格式。)
(Other methods of closing Priorview will not delete the temporary files.)
（其他关闭Priorview的方法不会删除临时文件。）
(Refer to the "Downloads" page on the OmegaT website for details of the differences.)
（有关这些差异的详细信息，请参阅OmegaT网站上的“下载”页面。）
(See screenshot: only the first three segments have been translated.)
（参见截图：只有前三段已被翻译。）
(Since this is now the standard format, it is simply described as Word, Excel or Powerpoint in MS Office 2007).
（由于这是标准格式，因此在MS Office 2007中简单描述为Word，Excel或Powerpoint）。
(Software that does this is called "machine translation", and you will have to look elsewhere for it.)
（可以替你进行翻译的软件是“机器翻译”，你要到别处寻找。）
(The Java executable file is the file java on Linux and java.exe on Windows.
（所谓 Java 可执行文件，在 Linux 下是 java 文件，在 Windows 下则是 java.exe 文件。
(The Java executable file is the file java on Linux and java.exe on Windows. If Java is installed at system level and is in the command path, the full path need not be entered.)
（所谓 Java 可执行文件，在 Linux 下是 java 文件，在 Windows 下则是 java.exe 文件。 如果 Java 是在系统级安装的且处于命令行路径中，则无需输入完整路径。）
(The definition of “unique” is case-sensitive: "Run" and "run" are treated as being different)
（“唯一” 的判断方法是区分大小写的："Run" 和 "run" 被看作是不同的片段）
(The greater ease of tag handling with .docx files comes at the cost of a slight loss in control over formatting.
（使用.docx文件进行标签处理的难度越来越大，这是以格式化控制方面的轻微损失为代价的。

(The tokenizer can be used with versions 2.0.x and 2.1.0, but this requires both a different version of the tokenizer, and a different installation procedure.) Users are advised to upgrade to the latest beta version of OmegaT.
（分词器可以与版本2.0.x和2.1.0一起使用，但这需要不同版本的分词器以及不同的安装过程。）建议用户升级到OmegaT的最新测试版。
(This incidentally is a limitation of Java, not of OmegaT itself.)
(这是 Java 附带的局限性，并非由 OmegaT 自身导致。）
(This is not the case for the website localization files.)
（网站本地化文件的情况是个例外。）

<a0>OmegaT</a0> creates its tags before the process of sentence segmenting.

<a0>OmegaT</a0> first parses the text for structure-level segmentation.
<a0>OmegaT</a0> 首先将文本分割成结构级别的片段。
<a0>OmegaT</a0> first parses the text for structure-level segmentation. During this process it is only the structure of the source file that is used to produce segments.
<a0>OmegaT</a0> 首先解析文本以进行结构级分割。在此过程中，只使用原文文件的结构来生成片段。
<a0>OmegaT</a0> has by default the following short list available to make it easier for you to deal with some plain text files:
缺省情况下，<a0>OmegaT</a0> 使用下面的短名单帮助您处理一些纯文本文件：
<a0>OmegaT</a0> has two ways to segment a text: by paragraph or by sentence segmentation (also referred to as “rule-based segmentation”).
<a0>OmegaT</a0> 使用两种方式对文本进行片段分割：段落分割或句子分割（也被称为“基于分割的规则”）。
<a0>OmegaT</a0> is a free multi platform Computer Aided Translation tool, with the following highlights:
<a0>OmegaT</a0>是一款免费的多平台计算机辅助翻译工具，具有以下亮点：
<a0>OmegaT</a0> is a robust application.
<a0>OmegaT</a0> 是健壮的应用程序。

<a0>OmegaT</a0> is a robust application. However, you should take precautions against data loss when using <a1>OmegaT</a1>, just as with any other application. When you translate your files, <a2>OmegaT</a2> stores all your progress in the translation memory <l3>project_save.tmx</l3> that resides in the project's <l4>/omegat</l4> subfolder.
<a0>OmegaT</a0> 是健壮的应用程序。然而，就像使用任何其他应用程序一样，使用 <a1>OmegaT</a1> 时应当采取预防措施防止数据丢失。翻译文件时，<a2>OmegaT</a2> 将所有进度存储在项目的 <l4>/omegat</l4> 子文件夹中的翻译记忆文件 <l3>project_save.tmx</l3> 中。
<a0>OmegaT</a0> is available bundled with a Oracle Java JRE for Linux (Intel x86) and Windows platforms.

<e0>Add or rewrite encoding declaration in HTML and XHTML files</e0>: frequently the target files must have the encoding character set different from the one in the source file (wether it is explicitly defined or implied).
<e0>新增或重写HTML和XHTML文件中的编码声明</e0>：目标文件通常使用与源文件不同的编码字符集（不论是显式或隐式定义）。

<e0>Add or rewrite encoding declaration in HTML and XHTML files</e0>: the target files often need to have a different character set encoding from the one in the source file (whether it is explicitly defined or implied). Using this option, the translator can specify whether the target files should have the encoding declaration included. For instance, if the file filter specifies UTF8 as the encoding scheme for the target files, selecting Always will ensure that this information is included in the translated files.
<e0>在 HTML 和 XHTML 文件中新增或重写编码声明</e0>：译文文件通常需要具有与原文文件（无论是显式定义还是隐含）不同的字符集编码。使用此选项，译者可以指定译文文件是否应当包含编码声明。例如，如果文件过滤器指定 UTF8 作为译文文件的编码方案，则勾选本选项将始终确保此信息包含在已译文件中。
<e0>Aggregate tags</e0>: if checked, tags with no translatable text between them will be aggregated into a single tag.
<e0>聚合标签</e0>：如果选中，其间没有可翻译文本的多个标签将被聚合成单个标签。

<e0>Dictionaries, Glossaries</e0>, <e1>Machine translation</e1> , <e2>Spellchecker, LanguageTool:</e2> OmegaT supports an extensive use of dictionaries and glossaries.
<e0>字典和术语表</e0>、<e1>机器翻译</e1>、<e2>拼写检查和语言工具：</e2> OmegaT 支持字典和术语表工具。

<e0>Dictionaries, Glossaries</e0>, <e1>Machine translation</e1> , <e2>Spellchecker, LanguageTool:</e2> OmegaT supports an extensive use of dictionaries and glossaries. If an Internet connection is available, various MT services such as Google Translate and Microsoft Translator can be used from within OmegaT. If spell checking is activated, spelling mistakes and typos are recognized and can be corrected during translation. The open source LanguageTool can be used to correct common grammatical and stylistic mistakes.

<e0>字典、词汇表</e0>、<e1>机器翻译</e1>、<e2>拼写检查、LanguageTool：</e2>OmegaT 支持广泛使用字典和词汇表。如果有因特网连接，可以在 OmegaT 中使用各种机器翻译服务，诸如 Google Translate 和 Microsoft Translator。如果激活了拼写检查，在翻译期间会识别出拼写错误和错别字并可以进行更正。开源的 LanguageTool 可以用于纠正常见的语法与文体错误。

<e0>Important: </e0>the supporting TMX must be renamed XX_YY.tmx, where XX_YY is the target language of the tmx, for instance to ZH_CN.tmx in the example above.
<e0>重要提示：</e0>受支持的TMX必须重命名为XX_YY.tmx，其中XX_YY为TMX的目标语言，例如上面例子中的ZH_CN.tmx。

<e0>Important: </e0>the supporting TMX must be renamed XX_YY.tmx, where XX_YY is the target language of the tmx, for instance to ZH_CN.tmx in the example above. The project and TMX source languages should of course be identical - NL in our example. Note that only one TMX for a given language pair is possible, so if several translation memories should be involved, you will need to merge them all into the XX_YY.tmx.
<e0>重要提示：</e0>辅助性的 TMX 必须重命名为 XX_YY.tmx，其中 XX_YY 是此 tmx 的译文语言，例如在上面的例子中是 ZH_CN.tmx。项目的原文语言和 TMX 的原文语言当然应当是相同的——在这个例子中是 NL。注意对于给定语言对只能使用一个 TMX，因此如果涉及多个翻译记忆库，则需要将它们全部合并到 XX_YY.tmx 中。

<e0>Installing and running OmegaT: </e0>this chapter is useful when you first begin using OmegaT. It contains the specific instructions on how to install OmegaT and run it on Windows, Mac OS X and Linux. For advanced users, the chapter describes the command line mode and its possibilities.
<e0>安装和运行 OmegaT：</ e0>当您第一次开始使用 OmegaT 时，本章会很有用。它包含有关如何安装 OmegaT 并在 Windows、Mac OS X 和 Linux 上运行它的具体说明。对于高级用户，本章介绍命令行模式及其可能性。
<e0>JavaScript</e0> (sometimes abbreviated JS, not to be confused with Java): is a prototype-based scripting language that is dynamic, weakly typed and has first-class functions.
<e0>JavaScript</e0>（不会与Java混淆时简写为JS）：是动态、弱类型且具有一类函数的基于原型的脚本语言。

<e0>JavaScript</e0> (sometimes abbreviated JS, not to be confused with Java): is a prototype-based scripting language that is dynamic, weakly typed and has first-class functions. It is a multi-paradigm language, supporting object-oriented, imperative, and functional programming styles. Being the language behind popular software such as Firefox it is a familiar and preferred programming tool in the open-source domain.
<e0>JavaScript</e0>（有时缩写为 JS，不要与 Java 混淆）：是一种基于原型的脚本语言，它是动态的、弱类型的、并且具有上等函数。它是多范式语言，支持面向对象、命令式和函数式编程风格。作为 Firefox 等流行软件背后的语言，它是开源领域中常见且首选的编程工具。

<e0>语言：</e0>提供 ISO 语言和语言代码列表

<e0>Note: </e0>Of course there are other ways and means to create a simple file with tab delimited entries.
<e0>注：</e0>还有其他创建含TAB分隔条目的简单文件的方法。

<e0>Note: </e0>Of course there are other ways and means to create a simple file with tab delimited entries. Nothing speaks against using Notepad++ on Windows, GEdit on Linux for instance or some spreadsheet program for this purpose: any application, that can handle UTF-8 (or UTF-16 LE) and that can show white space (so that you do not miss the required <k1>TAB</k1> characters) can be used.
<e0>注：</e0>当然还有其他其他方法和手段可以创建含有以制表符分隔的条目的文件。比如说在 Windows 上可以用 Notepad++， 在 Linux 上可以用 GEdit，或者还可以用一些电子表格程序：可以用任意能够处理 UTF-8（或 UTF-16 LE）并能显示空白字符（这样就不会漏掉必要的<k1>制表符</k1>）的程序。
<e0>Note:</e0> the above information applies only to PDF files with a text layer.
<e0>注：以上信息仅适用于带有文字图层的PDF文件。</e0>

<e0>Preserve spaces for all tags</e0>: if checked, "white space" (i.e. spaces and newlines) will be preserved, even if this option is not defined in the document.
<e0>为所有标签保留空格</e0>：如果选中，会保留“空白字符”（即空格和换行符），即使在文档中并未定义此选项也是如此。
<e0>Preserve spaces for all tags</e0>: if checked, "white space" (i.e., spaces and newlines) will be preserved, even if not set technically in the document
<e0>保留所有标签的空白</e0>：如果选中了，则会保留“空白”（即空格和新行符），即使没有在文档中专门设置
<e0>Privacy</e0>: <a1>OmegaT</a1> Java Web Start does not save any of your information beyond the computer on which you are running it.
<e0>隐私政策</e0>：<a1>OmegaT</a1> Java Web Start 不会在您的计算机之外保存您在其中操作的任何资料。
<e0>Project properties</e0>, <e1><a2>OmegaT</a2> Files and Folders:</e1> a project in the context of OmegaT is the piece of work that OmegaT as a CAT tool is able to handle.
<e0>项目属性</e0>、<e1><a2>OmegaT</a2> 文件和目录：</e1> 在 OmegaT 中，项目是指 OmegaT 作为一款 CAT 工具能够处理的工作单位。

<e0>Project properties</e0>, <e1><a2>OmegaT</a2> Files and Folders:</e1> a project in the context of OmegaT is the piece of work that OmegaT as a CAT tool is able to handle. This chapter describes the project properties, such as the source and target languages. The second of these chapters describes the various subfolders and files in a translation project and their role as well as other user and application files associated with OmegaT.
<e0>项目属性</e0>、<e1><a2>OmegaT</a2> 文件和目录：</e1> 在 OmegaT 中，项目是指 OmegaT 作为一款 CAT 工具能够处理的工件。本章介绍项目的各种属性，如原文语言和译文语言等。后面那一章介绍了翻译项目中的各种子文件夹和文件以及它们各自的角色，还有其他 OmegaT 相关的用户和应用程序文件。
<e0>Remove HTML comments in translated document</e0>: all commented parts (between <!-- and -->) won't be copied in the translated document.
<e0>删除翻译文档中HTML注释</e0>:：所有注释部分（在<!-- 和 -->之间) 不会在翻译文档中复制。
<e0>Remove HTML comments in translated document</e0>: commented parts (between <!-- and -->) will not be copied into the translated document.
<e0>在译文文档中删除 HTML 注释</e0>：注释部分（<!-- 和 --> 之间的部分）不会被复制到译文文档中。
<e0>Replace All:</e0> operates replacement of all occurrences (after displaying a confirmation window where the number of occurrences is shown).
<e0>全部替换:</e0> 对所有显示结果进行操作（之前会显示替换内容数量的确认窗口）。
<e0>Replace:</e0> operates a "one by one" replacement, by the mean of buttons in the <e1>header of the Editor pane</e1>.
<e0>替换：:</e0> 通过点击编辑窗格顶部按钮对内容进行“逐个”替换</e1>。
<e0>Sample text:</e0> field for immediate preview of the selected font
<e0>示例文本：</e0>即时预览所选择的字体的区域。
<e0>Searches</e0> and<e1> </e1><e2>Regular expressions</e2>: Searches in OmegaT can be as simple as "<e3>list segments with </e3><e4>the word 'kangaroo' ".
<e0>搜索</e0>和<e1> </e1><e2>正则表达式</e2>：OmegaT 的搜索非常简便，如“<e3>列出所有含有</e3><e4> 'kangaroo' 这个单词的片段”。

<e0>Searches</e0> and<e1> </e1><e2>Regular expressions</e2>: Searches in OmegaT can be as simple as "<e3>list segments with </e3><e4>the word 'kangaroo' ". </e4> They can also be complex, allowing for instance to search for segments with two or more consecutive spaces. In this case the regular expression ^s^s+ would be used to find and list the offending segments. Regular expressions are also used extensively in the segmentation rules.
<e0>查找</e0>和<e1></e1><e2>正则表达式</e2>：OmegaT 中的查找可以简单得像“列出含有单词‘袋鼠’的<e3>片段</e3><e4>“。</e4>也可以很复杂，例如可以查找具有两个或更多连续空格的片段。在这种情况下，需要用正则表达式 ^s^s+ 来查找并列出有问题的片段。正则表达式也广泛用于分割规则中。
<e0>Segmentation</e0>:translation memory tools work with textual units called segments.
<e0>片段分割</e0>：译法记忆工具软件处理的文本单元称作片段。

<e0>Segmentation</e0>:translation memory tools work with textual units called segments. In OmegaT, segments can be based on paragraphs or on segmentation rules. Paragraph segmentation is less frequently used, but can be useful in cases of so-called "creative" texts. The rule-based segmentation is usually synonymous with sentence-based segmentation. A number of rule sets are provided while additional rules can be defined by the user, as described in this chapter.
<e0>片段分割</e0>：翻译记忆库工具使用称作片段的文本单元。在 OmegaT 中，片段可根据段落或片段分割规则进行划分。段落分割使用得较少，但在所谓“创造性”文本的情况下可能很有用。基于规则的分割通常就是指基于句子的分割。软件中已经提供了许多规则集，与此同时用户还可自定义其他规则，如本章所述。
<e0>Shortcuts customization:</e0> shortcuts can be customized to your personal preferences
<e0>快捷键自定义：</e0>可根据您的个人偏好对快捷键进行自定义
<e0>Size:</e0> edit to change font size
<e0>大小：</e0>改变字体大小。
<e0>Skip text matching regular expression</e0>: any text matching the regular expression is skipped. It is shown in red in the tag validator. Text in source segments that matches is shown in italics.
<e0>忽略匹配以下正则表达式的文本</e0>：跳过所有匹配此正则表达式的文本。在标签验证器中它会显示为红色。在原文文本中相匹配的文本会显示为斜体。
<e0>Skip text matching regular expression</e0>: the text matching the regular expression gets skipped.
<e0>忽略匹配正则表达式的文本</e0>：匹配该正则表达式的文本会被忽略。

<e0>TaaS Terminology Lookup</e0>: when checked, will allow querying TaaS data on a segment by segment basis.
<e0>TaaS术语查询</e0>：勾选时，将允许逐段查询TaaS数据。
<e0>Terminology management</e0>: Terminology management is important for translation consistency.
<e0>术语管理</e0>：术语管理对于译文的一致性至关重要。

<e0>Terminology management</e0>: Terminology management is important for translation consistency. OmegaT uses glossaries containing translations of single words or small phrases: a simplified bilingual dictionary for a specific domain. For your reference, OmegaT displays the translation of any word that is both present in the segment and registered in the glossary.
<e0>术语管理</e0>：术语管理对于翻译的一致性非常重要。OmegaT 的术语表包含单个单词或小短语的翻译，即，术语表就是特定领域中的简易双语词典。当前片段中的单词如果存在于术语表中，OmegaT 就会显示出其翻译以供参考。

<e0>The user interface</e0>,<e1>Main Menu and Keyboard Shortcuts</e1>: these two chapters are likely to be heavily consulted, since they explain the user interface of OmegaT and the functions available via the main menu and the keyboard shortcuts.
<e0>用户界面</e0>、<e1>主菜单和键盘快捷键</e1>：这两章很可能会被大量查阅，因为它们解说了 OmegaT 的用户界面，以及可通过主菜单和键盘快捷键调用的功能。
<e0>Translate the following attributes</e0>: the selected attributes will appear as segments in the Editor window.
<e0>翻译以下属性</e0>：所选属性会作为片段出现在编辑器窗口中。
<e0>Translation memories: </e0> explains the role of the various subfolders containing translation memories, and provides information on other important aspects relating to translation memories.
<e0>翻译记忆库：</e0>解释了各个包含翻译记忆库的子文件夹的作用，并提供了其他与翻译记忆库有关的重要方面的信息。
<e0>Translation memory:</e0><a1> OmegaT</a1> stores your translations in a translation memory file.
<e0>译法记忆：</e0><a1> OmegaT</a1>将译文存储在译法记忆文件中。

<e0>Translation memory:</e0><a1> OmegaT</a1> stores your translations in a translation memory file. At the same time, it can use memories files from previous translations for reference. Translation memories can be very useful in a translation where there are numerous repetitions or reasonably similar segments of text. OmegaT uses translation memories to store your previous translations and then suggest likely translations for the text you are currently working on.
<e0>翻译记忆：</e0><a1> OmegaT</a1> 将您的翻译存储在翻译记忆库文件中。同时，它可以用过往翻译的翻译记忆库文件作为参考。如果译文中存在大量重复或相当相似的片段，翻译记忆库文件在翻译中会非常有用。OmegaT 使用翻译记忆文件存储您过往的翻译，然后为您当前正在处理的文本建议可能的翻译。
<e0>Translation process:</e0> Imagine having to translate something; from a single file to a folder containing subfolders each with a number of files in a variety of formats.
<e0>翻译处理：</e0>设想您需要进行翻译，需要翻译的可能是单个文件，也可能是一个文件夹，其中包含子文件夹以及许多种不同格式的文件。

<e0>Translation process:</e0> Imagine having to translate something; from a single file to a folder containing subfolders each with a number of files in a variety of formats. When you let OmegaT know the files that you need to translate, it looks for the files it understands based on file filtering rules, recognizes the textual parts within them, splits up the text groups according to the segmentation rules, and displays the segments one by one so that you can proceed with the translation. OmegaT stores your translations and proposes possible translations from similar segments registered in the translation memory files. When you are ready to view the final product, you can export the translated files, open them in the appropriate application and view the translation in the final format...

<e0>翻译流程：</e0>设想您需要翻译一些东西，可以是单个文件一直到有多个包含许多各种格式文件的子文件夹的文件夹。当您让 OmegaT 知道哪些文件需要翻译之后，它会根据文件过滤规则查找所能理解的文件、识别文件中的文本部分、根据分割规则拆分文本组、并逐个显示片段以供您进行翻译。OmegaT 存储您的翻译并提供翻译记忆库文件中注册的类似片段的可能翻译供参考。当准备查看最终成果时，可以导出译文文件，在相应的应用程序中打开并以最终格式查看译文...
<e0>VCS client: </e0>To interface with the server an SVN or Git client must be installed on computers of "project managers" involved in the OmegaT project.
<e0>VCS客户端：</e0>要和服务器连接，SVN或Git客户端必须安装在包含OmegaT项目的“项目管理员”的电脑上。

<e0>VCS client: </e0>To interface with the server an SVN or Git client must be installed on computers of "project managers" involved in the OmegaT project. Very popular clients for Windows environment are <u1>TortoiseSVN</u1> and <u2>TortoiseGit</u2>. Other operating systems (Linux, OS X) offer similar packages.
<e0> VCS 客户端：</e0>要与服务器连接，OmegaT 项目中涉及的“项目经理”的计算机上必须安装 SVN 或 Git 客户端。Windows 环境中非常流行的客户端是 <u1>TortoiseSVN</u1> 和 <u2>TortoiseGit</u2>。其他操作系统（Linux、OS X）也提供有类似的软件包。
<e0>VCS server - </e0>i.e. SVN or Git server is the environment where the common material is kept and maintained on the net.
<e0>VCS服务器：</e0>即SVN或Git服务器是网上保存和维护公用材料的地方。

<e0>VCS server - </e0>i.e. SVN or Git server is the environment where the common material is kept and maintained on the net. The server can exist in the local network but in the majority of cases it will be available on internet, i.e. via URL address. One member of the team, the project administrator, needs to be acquainted with handling the server side, i.e. the job of setting up the environment, importing the OmegaT project, assigning the access rights for the team members, resolving the conflicts, etc.
<e0>VCS 服务器：</e0>即 SVN 或 Git 服务器，是在网络上保存和维护公共资料的环境。服务器可以放在局域网中，但在大多数情况下，它可在因特网上使用，即，可通过 URL 地址访问。团队的成员之一——项目管理员，需要熟悉服务器端事宜，即设置环境、导入 OmegaT 项目、为团队成员分配访问权限、解决冲突等工作。
<e0>Warning!</e0> Should you change filter options whilst a project is open, you must reload the project in order for the changes to take effect.
<e0>警告！</e0>如果您在项目打开的时候改变过滤器选项，您必须重新载入项目以使改变生效。
<e0>Warning: </e0>because the text will segment differently after filter options have been changed, so you may have to start translating from scratch.
<e0>警告：</e0>由于在改变过滤器选项后将对文本进行不同的分割，所以您可能需要从原文开始进行翻译。

<e0>Warning: </e0>because the text will segment differently after filter options have been changed, so you may have to start translating from scratch. At the same time the previous valid segments in the project translation memory will turn into orphan segments. If you change segmentation options when a project is open, you must reload the project in order for the changes to take effect.
<e0>警告：</e0>由于在更改过滤器选项后文本将以不同的方式进行分割，因此您可能需要从头开始翻译。同时，项目的翻译记忆库中之前的那些有效片段会变为孤立片段。如果在项目开启状态下更改分割规则，则必须重新加载项目才能使更改生效。
<e0>Word:</e0> non-visible instruction text, comments, footnotes, endnotes, footers
<e0>Word：</e0>不可见说明性文本、批注、脚注、尾注、页脚

<e0>add the copied files to the local version of the repository:</e0> right-click on the local checkout folder and select <g1>TortoiseSVN > Add.</g1> In the dialog that opens, leave all options as per default and click<g2> OK</g2>. The Add Finished! window, similar to the one below will appear:
<e0>将复制的文件添加到存储库的本地版本：</e0>右键单击本地检出文件夹并选择 <g1>TortoiseSVN > Add（添加）</g1>。​​在打开的对话框中，让所有选项维持默认，单击<g2>OK（确定）</g2>。将会出现类似于下面“添加完成！”窗口：
<e0>administrator: </e0>the person responsible for the creation and maintaining of the repository, i.e. taking care of the server side of the task.
<e0>管理员：</e0>创建和维护版本库（如处理服务端事务）的人。

<e0>administrator: </e0>the person responsible for the creation and maintaining of the repository, i.e. taking care of the server side of the task. To avoid any problems, one person only should have these rights at least initially.
<e0>管理员：</e0>负责创建和维护存储库的人，即负责服务器端事务的人。为了避免出现问题，至少在一开始，应当只有一个人有这些权限。
<e0>case sensitive</e0>: the search will be performed for the exact string specified; i.e. capitalization is observed.
<e0>区分大小写</e0>：搜索工作将会严格匹配指定字符串，即遵循大小写状态。
<e0>checkout:</e0> the operation that creates a working copy from the repository to your local computer.
<e0>检出：</e0>该操作从版本库创建工作副本到本地电脑。

<e0>checkout:</e0> the operation that creates a working copy from the repository to your local computer. The server keeps the information on checkouts, so that later commits (see below) can be performed in an orderly fashion.
<e0>检出（checkout）：</e0>在本地计算机上创建来自存储库的工作副本的操作。服务器保存有检出的信息，以便后续提交（见下文）可以有序地执行。
<e0>commit local changes to the server: </e0>right-click on the local checkout folder and select <g1>SVN Commit....</g1> The Commit window - see below opens.
<e0>提交本地更新到服务器：</e0>在本地检出文件夹上点击右键并选择<g1>SVN提交…。</g1>提交窗口——请参阅下面。

<e0>commit local changes to the server: </e0>right-click on the local checkout folder and select <g1>SVN Commit....</g1> The Commit window - see below opens. Check the changes to be made - i.e. the folders and files added in this case.
<e0>将本地更改提交到服务器：</e0>右键单击本地检出文件夹并选择 <g1>SVN Commit....（SVN 提交）</g1>​​会打开提交窗口（见下图）。检查要进行的更改——在这里就是添加的文件夹和文件。
<e0>commit: </e0>once a new local version of the checked-out material is ready, it can be committed to the repository and thus made available to the rest of the team.
<e0>提交：</e0>当检出材料的新的本地版本准备好后，就可以提交到版本库而共享给团队其他成员。

<e0>commit: </e0>once a new local version of the checked-out material is ready, it can be committed to the repository and thus made available to the rest of the team. The server makes sure that any conflicting changes, due to two members working on the same checked-out contents, will be resolved.
<e0>提交（commit）：</e0>一旦检出的资料有了新的本地版本，就可以将其提交到存储库，从而可供团队的其他成员使用。服务器确保任何由于两个成员处理同一个检出内容而导致的冲突更改会得到解决。
<e0>in notes: </e0>search in notes to segments
<e0>笔记：</e0>在笔记中搜索
<e0>in source: </e0>search in the source segments
<e0>源片段：</e0>在源片段中搜索
<e0>in translations: </e0>search in the target segments
<e0>目标片段：</e0>在目标片段中搜索
<e0>repository: </e0>the place where the shared material is saved and maintained, either on a local access network or in Internet.
<e0>版本库：</e0>保存和维护共享材料的位置，在本地网或因特网上。
<e0>repository: </e0>the place where the shared material is saved and maintained, either on a local access network or in Internet. Project members connect with it via their VCS client.
<e0>存储库（repository）：</e0>在局域网或因特网上保存和维护共享资料的地方。项目成员通过各自的 VCS 客户端与其连接。
<e0>several projects on the same subject: </e0>keep the project structure, and change source and target folders (Source = source/order1, target = target/order1 etc).
<e0>在相同主题中保存多个项目：</e0>保留项目结构，同时改变源和目标目录（Source = source/order1，target = target/order1等）。
<e0>several translators working on the same project:</e0> split the source files into source/Alice, source/Bob... and allocate them to team members (Alice, Bob ...).
<e0>多个译员工作于相同项目：</e0>把源文件分成 source/Alice, source/Bob 等，同时把它们分配给项目成员 (Alice, Bob ...)。
<e0>update local files from the local repository copy</e0> - the changes received from the server repository reside within the .svn subfolder but not yet in the files and folders themselves.
<e0>从本地版本库副本更新本地文件</e0>——从服务器版本库的.svn子文件夹接收到的变更但还不是文件和文件夹本身的更新。

<e0>update local files from the local repository copy</e0> - the changes received from the server repository reside within the .svn subfolder but not yet in the files and folders themselves. To update the local files, right-click on the checkout folder and select <g1>SVN Update</g1>. Check the contents of the folder to confirm that the local copy of the repository and the corresponding files and folders correspond to the latest server version:
<e0>从本地存储库副本更新本地文件：</e0>从服务器存储库接收到的更改位于 .svn 子文件夹中，但尚未进入文件和文件夹本身。要更新本地文件，请右键单击检出文件夹并选择 <g1>SVN Update（SVN 提交）</g1>​​。检查文件夹的内容以确认存储库的本地副本以及相应的文件和文件夹对应于最新的服务器版本：
<e0>user</e0>: a member of the team, collaborating on the common project.
<e0>用户</e0>：团队成员，在共同项目上进行协作。

<f0>alignDir</f0> 必须包含项目目标语言的翻译。
<g0>Ctrl+Shift+V</g0>: Checks for missing or displaced tags in formatted files.
<g0>Ctrl+Shift+V</g0>：寻找格式化文件中丢失或错置的标签。

<l0>.txt1</l0> files are files in ISO-8859-1, covering most <e1>Western Europe</e1> languages.

<l0>.txt2</l0> files are files in ISO-8859-2, that covers most <e1>Central and Eastern Europe</e1> languages

<l0>.txt</l0> files are automatically (<auto>) interpreted by <a1>OmegaT</a1> as being encoded in the computer's default encoding.
<l0>.txt</l0> 文件会自动 (<自动>) 被 <a1>OmegaT</a1> 以计算机缺省的编码进行解释。
<l0>.utf8</l0> files are interpreted by <a1>OmegaT</a1> as being encoded in UTF-8 (an encoding that covers almost all languages in the world).
<l0>.utf8</l0> 文件会被 <a1>OmegaT</a1> 以 UTF-8 编码进行解释（一种几乎涵盖了世界上所有语言的编码）。

<s0>Linux users</s0>: most Linux distributions are supplied with a Java Runtime Environment, but some open-source implementations do not work properly with OmegaT (although this may not be immediately apparent).
<s0>Linux 用户</s0>：多数 Linux 发行版都提供了 Java 运行环境，但一些开源实现不能很好地处理 OmegaT（尽管可能并不明显）。

<s0>Linux users</s0>: most Linux distributions are supplied with a Java Runtime Environment, but some open-source implementations do not work properly with OmegaT (although this may not be immediately apparent). If you are relatively new to Linux, we advise you to select an OmegaT version with the JRE included. More experienced Linux users may prefer to install the Oracle (formerly Sun) JRE at system level.
<s0>Linux 用户</s0>：大多数 Linux 发行版都提供了 Java 运行环境，但是一些开源实现无法正常地和 OmegaT 一起运行（尽管这可能不会立即出现）。如果您不熟悉 Linux，我们建议您选择带 JRE 的 OmegaT 版本。更有经验的 Linux 用户可能更喜欢在系统级安装 Oracle（之前是 Sun）JRE。
<s0>Linux versions/systems</s0>: locate your OmegaT launch script file (OmegaT or OmegaT.sh).
<s0>Linux 版本/系统</s0>：找到你的OmegaT启动脚本文件（OmegaT或OmegaT.sh）。
<s0>Mac OS X users</s0>: the JRE is installed on Mac OS X by default; there is therefore no version for Mac OS X with the JRE.
<s0>Mac OS X 用户</s0>：Mac OS X 上已默认安装有 JRE；因此，不对 Mac OS X 提供带 JRE 的版本。
<s0>OmegaT version 2.1.0 and older</s0>: the current tokenizer is not compatible with these versions.
<s0>OmegaT 2.1.0 及之前版本</s0>：当前的分词器不适配这些版本

<s0>OmegaT</s0> is a free translation memory application that works on Windows, macOS, Linux... It is a tool intended for professional translators. It does not translate for you! (Software that does this is called "machine translation", and you will have to look elsewhere for it.)
<s0>OmegaT</s0> 是免费的翻译记忆应用程序，适用于 Windows、macOS、Linux……它是为专业翻译人员设计的工具。它并不会替你翻译！（执行此操作的软件称为“机器翻译”，需要去他处找寻。）
<s0>OmegaT</s0> is a free translation memory application written in Java.
<s0>OmegaT</s0>是一个使用Java编写的免费翻译记忆库应用程序。
<s0>OmegaT</s0> is available in many different versions in order to suit a range of user requirements.
<s0>OmegaT</s0> 有多种不同版本可供选择，以满足各种用户需求。
<s0>Platform-neutral version (on Windows)</s0>: locate your OmegaT launch script file (OmegaT.bat).
<s0>平台中立版本（Windows系统）</s0>: 找到OmegaT启动脚本文件（OmegaT.bat）。
<s0>Webstart version of OmegaT</s0>: the tokenizer is not compatible with the Webstart version of OmegaT.
<s0> Webstart版本的OmegaT</s0>:：分词器与Webstart版本的OmegaT不兼容。
<s0>Windows versions of OmegaT</s0>: in order for OmegaT (any version) to be used with the tokenizer, it must be launched from a launch script file.
<s0>Windows版本的 OmegaT</s0>：为了使OmegaT（任何版本）可以与分词器一起使用，它必须从启动脚本文件启动。

<s1>In order to prevent two or more translators from working on the same language at the same time, it is therefore very important that you make an entry in the localization plan when you begin work on a translation.</s1>
<s1>为了避免两个甚至两个以上的翻译人员在同一时间对同一种语言进行翻译，因此在开始翻译工作时，您必须在本地化计划中输入一个条目。</s1>
<s1>The benefit</s1>: once launched, future updates of the Web Start version will be installed automatically on your computer.<br2/>
<s1>优点</s1>: 一旦启动，网页启动版本之后的更新将自动安装在您的电脑上。<br2/>
<s3>The drawback</s3>: at present, this version cannot be used in conjunction with plug-ins, so not all functions are available.
<s3>调查问卷</s3>: 目前，该版本不能和插件一起使用，因此部分功能不可用。
<shortcut> must be of the following form: 0 or more <c0><modifier></c0> followed by 0 or 1 <c1><event></c1> followed by 1 <c2><key></c2>, where:
<shortcut>必须是如下格式：0 个或更多<c0><修饰键></c0>后跟着 0 个或 1 个<c1><事件></c1>后跟着1个<c2><按键></c2>，其中：
<trans-unit> &resname attribute when available
<翻译单元>资源名称属性，如果可用(&R)
<trans-unit> I&D
<翻译单元> I&D

<u0>Apertium</u0> is a free/open-source machine translation platform, initially aimed at related-language pairs, like CA, ES, GA, PT, OC and FR but recently expanded to deal with more divergent language pairs (such as English-Catalan).
<u0>Apertium</u0> 是自由、开源的机器翻译平台，最初致力于相关的语言对，例如 CA、ES、GA、PT、OC 以及 FR，不过最近扩展为能够处理更多的其他语言对（例如英语-加泰罗尼亚语）。
<u0>Belazar</u0> is a Machine language translation tool for the Russian-Belarusian language pair.
<u0>Belazar</u0> 是用于俄罗斯－白俄罗斯语言对的机器语言翻译工具。

<u0>LanguageTool</u0> is an Open Source style and grammar proofreading software for English, French, German, Polish, Dutch, Romanian, and a number of other languages - see the <u1>list of supported languages</u1>.
<u0>LanguageTool</u0> 是开源的文体与语法校对软件，适用于英语、法语、德语、波兰语、荷兰语、罗马尼亚语和许多其它语言（请参阅<u1>支持的语言列表</u1>）。
<u0>Microsoft Terminology Collection</u0> <i1/> can be downloaded in nearly 100 languages and can serve as a cornerstone IT glossary.
<u0>可以下载Microsoft Terminology Collection</u0> <i1/>它有将近100种语言，可以作为基础的IT词汇表。

A "Standard Interface" means an interface that either is an official standard defined by a recognized standards body, or, in the case of interfaces specified for a particular programming language, one that is widely used among developers working in that language.

A "User Product" is either (1) a "consumer product", which means any tangible personal property which is normally used for personal, family, or household purposes, or (2) anything designed or sold for incorporation into a dwelling. In determining whether a product is a consumer product, doubtful cases shall be resolved in favor of coverage. For a particular product received by a particular user, "normally used" refers to a typical or common use of that class of product, regardless of the status of the particular user or of the way in which the particular user actually uses, or expects or is expected to use, the product. A product is a consumer product regardless of whether the product has substantial commercial, industrial or non-consumer uses, unless such uses represent the only significant mode of use of the product.

A "translated" External View file is produced by entering the translation in the target column.
通过在目标列中输入翻译来生成“翻译的”外部视图文件。

A Déjà Vu "External View" file takes the form of an RTF file containing a multi-column table, including columns for the source and target text in which each segment occupies a table cell.
DéjàVu“外部视图”文件采用包含多列表格的RTF文件的格式，其中包括源文本和目标文本的列，其中每个段占用一个表格单元格。
A European Commission press release (in .odt format) in OmegaT and below it the instantaneous target text displayed in Opera.
欧洲委员会新闻稿（采用.odt格式）在OmegaT中并在其下方显示Opera中显示的即时目标文本。
A batch file, used to launch <a0>OmegaT</a0> from the Windows command line.
批处理文件，用于从 Windows 命令行启动 <a0>OmegaT </a0> 。

A general observation: "compatibility" is rarely a black and white, "yes" or "no" issue.
通常我们会发现：“兼容性”并不是一个非黑即白的问题。

A general observation: "compatibility" is rarely a black and white, "yes" or "no" issue. Where the vendor of a software product claims that his product is compatible with another piece of software, this compatibility is seldom 100%. Conversely, where products are clearly not directly compatible, it is often possible to find procedures by which they can work together. The question which must be answered is whether these procedures are acceptable in terms of the result and the effort involved, and the answer is likely to vary from one user to another. In other words, "compatibility" is not only about products, but also about workflows.
一般而言：“兼容性”并不是一个非黑即白的问题。如果软件产品供应商声称其产品与其他软件兼容，则这种兼容性很少是完美的。反过来，在产品显然不能直接兼容的情况下，也往往能找到让它们能协同运作的操作流程。效果及所需的投入是否可接受才是必答题，但这又仁者见仁，智者见智。换句话说，“兼容性”不仅涉及产品本身，还与工作流程有关。

A stemmer for English, for example, should identify the string "cats" (and possibly "catlike", "catty" etc.) as based on the root "cat", and "stemmer", "stemming", "stemmed" as based on "stem".
英语中的词干分析器，例如能识别字符串 "cats"（以及 "catlike", "catty" 等）的词根是 "cat"，而 "stemmer", "stemming", "stemmed" 的词根是 "stem"。

A stemmer for English, for example, should identify the string "cats" (and possibly "catlike", "catty" etc.) as based on the root "cat", and "stemmer", "stemming", "stemmed" as based on "stem". A stemming algorithm reduces the words "fishing", "fished", "fish", and "fisher" to the root word, "fish". This is especially useful in case of languages that use pre- and postfix forms for the stem words. Borrowing an example from Slovenian, here "good" in all possible grammatically correct forms:

例如，英语的词干分析器应当能识别出字符串“cats”（可能还有“catlike”、“catty”等）是基于词根“cat”的；而“stemmer”、“stemming”、“stemmed”是基于“stem”的。词干分析算法将单词“fishing”、“fished”、“fish”、和“fisher”归约为词根“fish”。这对于那些使用词干加前缀和后缀形式的语言尤其有用。借用斯洛文尼亚语的一个例子，这里是“good”的所有可能的语法上正确的形式：
A stemming algorithm reduces the words "fishing", "fished", "fish", and "fisher" to the root word, "fish".

All segmentation rule sets for a matching language pattern are active and are applied in the given order of priority, so rules for specific language should be higher than default ones.
为匹配的语言模式定义的所有片段分割规则会按照规定的优先级别得到应用，因此为特定语言定义的规则优先级会比缺省规则要高。

All segmentation rule sets for a matching language pattern are active and are applied in the given order of priority, so rules for specific language should be higher than default ones. For example, rules for Canadian French (FR-CA) should be set higher than rules for French (FR.*), and higher than Default (.*) ones. Thus, when translating from Canadian French the rules for Canadian French - if any - will be applied first, followed by the rules for French and lastly, by the Default rules.
为匹配的语言模式所定义的所有片段分割规则集都是活动的，并按照规给定的优先级顺序应用，因此为特定语言定义的规则优先级应当高于默认的那些。例如，加拿大法语（FR-CA）的规则优先级应当设置为高于法语（FR.*）的规则，并高于默认（.*）的规则。因此，在翻译加拿大法语时，会首先应用加拿大法语规则（如果存在的话），接着是法语规则，最后为缺省规则。
All the languages have access to the OmegaT object model, with the project as the top object.
所有的语言都能访问OmegaT对象模型，其中的顶级对象为项目。

可以让您激活/取消激活<e0>翻译提示</e0>功能，并设置<e1>精确匹配</e1>选项。激活<e2>翻译提示</e2>后，在原文中突出显示的单词上右击，可显示含有术语表条目的弹出菜单。

Also check that the target language code of your project against the available vocabularies in the setup window. The spell checker uses the target language code to determine the language to be used : if the target language is Brazilian Portuguese (PT_BR), the subfolder with vocabularies must contain the two vocabulary files, called <e0>pt_br.aff</e0> and <e1>pt_br.dic</e1>.
还要根据设置窗口中的可用词汇表检查项目的译文语言代码。拼写检查器根据译文语言代码来确定要使用的语言：如果译文语言是巴西葡萄牙语（PT_BR），存放术语表的子文件夹必须包括名为 <e0>pt_br.aff</e0> 和 <e1>pt_br.dic</e1> 的两个字典文件。

Also supported is the CSV format. This format is the same as the tab separated one: source term, target term. Comment fields are separated by a comma ','. Strings can be enclosed by quotes ", which allows having a comma inside a string:
还支持 CSV 格式。该格式和制表符分隔的格式一样：原文词汇、译文词汇。注释字段则以逗号“,”分隔。字符串可以用引号“"”括起来，这样就允许字符串内部出现逗号：

至于Infix的转换结果是否能和在DTP中二次导出PDF格式的译文相媲美，虽然结论仍有争议，但它应该能比直接转换为RTF等完全不同的格式文件要好得多。

Although it might seem strange to want to translate TMX files (the usual reason for creating a file filter), the addition of a TMX filter has the interesting effect that it enables TMX files in any location to be searched for from within any OmegaT project using the "Search Files" function, something not possible in the standard OmegaT build.
尽管翻译TMX文件听起来似乎很奇怪（这是创建文件过滤器的常见原因），但添加TMX过滤器可以让它在任何位置使用任何OmegaT项目中的TMX文件进行”文件搜索“的功能，这在标准的OmegaT版本中时不可能实现的.
Although many users are aware of this, their reaction is often "But I can't program!".
许多用户意识到了这一点，但他们的反应经常是“可我并不会编程！”。

An "entity transaction" is a transaction transferring control of an organization, or substantially all assets of one, or subdividing an organization, or merging organizations. If propagation of a covered work results from an entity transaction, each party to that transaction who receives a copy of the work also receives whatever licenses to the work the party's predecessor in interest had or could give under the previous paragraph, plus a right to possession of the Corresponding Source of the work from the predecessor in interest, if the predecessor has it or can get it with reasonable efforts.

Apertium uses a shallow-transfer machine translation engine which processes the input text in stages, as in an assembly line: de-formatting, morphological analysis, part-of-speech disambiguation, shallow structural transfer, lexical transfer, morphological generation, and re-formatting.
Apertium 使用浅层传播机器翻译引擎（shallow-transfer machine translation engine ）来处理输入的文本，就像汇编行：去除格式，形态分析，语音消歧，浅层结构传播，词汇传播，形态生成以及重新格式化。

至于相关的分类，下面这些组的分类符合工业标准：重复率、精确匹配、95%-100%、85%-94%、75%-84%、50%-74%和无匹配。

As its name suggests, the "Latest" version of Omegat is more up to date. However, the user manual may no longer be up to date (and therefore possibly confusing), and some minor bugs are possible. Nevertheless, the "Latest" versions of OmegaT are usually very stable and are recommended for any users who already have some experience with OmegaT.
顾名思义，Omegat 的“最新”版本要更时新一些。但是，用户手册可能不再是最新的（因此可能会让人困惑），并且可能会出现小 Bug。尽管如此，OmegaT 的“最新”版本通常非常稳定，推荐任何已经拥有 OmegaT 经验的用户使用。

与用户生成的翻译记忆（就像 <a0>OmegaT</a0>）相对的是机器翻译 (MT) 工具，它使用基于规则的语言学工具而不是翻译记忆来创建源片段的翻译。

As stated above, OmegaT tags are LTR strings. When translating between RTL and LTR languages, correctly reading the tags from the source and entering them properly in the target may require the translator to toggle between LTR and RTL modes numerous times.
如上所述，OmegaT 标签是从左向右的字符串。当在从右向左和从左向右的语言间进行翻译时，要正确地读取原文中的标签并在译文中正确输入它们可能需要译者在从左向右和从右向左模式之间多次切换。
As such, it does nothing not already done by the OmegaT Editor pane; its purpose is to illustrate how the text can be extracted from a script file and made available for further scripts.

As the existing content will not be touched, damage to an existing file would be limited.

By default the editor displays 2,000 of initial segments, and progressively loads more as you scroll up or down.
默认情况下，编辑器会显示2000个初始段，当你向上滚动或向下滚动时，会逐渐加载更多。

By default the editor displays 2,000 of initial segments, and progressively loads more as you scroll up or down. If you have a powerful machine, and/or if you don't like how the scrollbar behaves during progressive loading, you can increase this number.
默认情况下，编辑器一开始会显示 2,000 个片段，并在上下滚动时渐进式地加载更多片段。如果您的机器很强力，并且/或者如果您不喜欢渐进式加载过程中滚动条的行为，可以提高此数字。
By default, 512 MB are assigned, so there is no advantage in assigning less than this figure.
缺省情况下，将会分配512 MB内存，因此分配低于此大小的内存是没有好处的。
By default, MyMemory allows a maximum of 100 requests per day.
默然情况下，MyMemory每天最多允许发生100条请求。

By default, OmegaT does not execute the commands specified in the project-specific settings (the <f0>finder.xml</f0> file in the <f1>omegat</f1> folder), because they may have a critical impact on the machine's security.
默认情况下，OmegaT 不会执行项目专有设置（<f1>omegat</f1> 文件夹中的 <f0>finder.xml</f0> 文件）中所指定的命令，因为它们可能会对机器的安全性产生重大影响。
By default, OmegaT does not execute the commands specified in the project-specific settings (the <f0>omegat.project</f0> file), because they may have a critical impact on the machine's security.
默认情况下，OmegaT 不会执行项目专有设置（<f0>omegat.project</f0> 文件）中所指定的命令，因为它们可能会对机器的安全性产生重大影响。
By default, OmegaT uses automatic match propagation.
默认情况下，OmegaT使用自动匹配传播。
By default, it is not possible to select words in the source segment using the keyboard rather than the mouse.
默认情况下，如果不使用鼠标而使用键盘，无法在源片段中选择单词。
By default, left justification is used for Left-To-Right (LTR) languages and right justification for Right-To-Left (RTL) languages.
缺省情况下，LTR 语言使用左对齐而 RTL 语言使用右对齐。
By default, scripts are stored in the "scripts" folder located in OmegaT installation folder (the folder that contains the OmegaT.jar).
默认情况下，脚本存储在 OmegaT 安装文件夹（包含 OmegaT.jar 的文件夹）中的“scripts”文件夹里。
By default, the /tm folder is below the project's root folder (e.g. ...<e0>/MyProject/tm</e0>), but you can choose a different folder in the project properties dialog if you wish.
默认情况下，/tm文件夹位于项目的根文件夹中（例如：...<e0>/MyProject/tm)</e0>，但如果您愿意您也可以在项目属性对话框中选择不同的文件夹。

By default, the /tm folder is below the project's root folder (e.g. ...<e0>/MyProject/tm</e0>), but you can choose a different folder in the project properties dialog if you wish. This is useful if you frequently use translation memories produced in the past, for example because they are on the same subject or for the same customer. In this case, a useful procedure would be:
默认情况下，/tm 文件夹位于项目的根文件夹下（例如 ...<e0>/MyProject/tm</e0>），但如果你愿意也可以在项目的属性对话框中选择其他文件夹。如果您经常使用过去生成的翻译记忆库，例如因为它们属于同一主题或者同一客户，则此功能非常有用。在这种情况下，有用的流程可以是这样：
By default, the Go To Next Untranslated Segment command (Ctrl+U) skips to the next untranslated segment, skipping propagated translations in the process.
默认地，前往下一未翻译片段指令（Ctrl+U）跳转到下一条未翻译的片段，过程中跳过已传输的翻译。
By default, the bash launch script is executable, but your system may change its permissions (e.g. during unpacking of the archive) and you may have to make it executable again.
默认情况下，bash 启动脚本是可执行的，但是您的系统可能会更改其权限（例如在解压缩存档时），您可能需要再次更改权限使其可执行。
By default, the closest matches displayed in the <g0>Fuzzy Matches</g0> pane are determined using stemming.
默认情况下，显示在<g0>模糊匹配</g0>窗格中的最接近匹配是用词干分析来确定的。
By default, the translated file encoding is the same as the source file encoding.
缺省情况下，已译文件的编码与源文件的编码相同。
By default, under Windows, <l1>omegat.project</l1> is locked, and an error message is received when trying to open a project already opened in another instance of OmegaT.
默认条件下， Windows平台下的 <l1>omegat.project</l1>文件是锁定的，试图打开在另一个OmegaT例子中已经打开的项目会报错。
By deleting a tag group you will remove the related formatting from the translated file.
删除一个标签组的同时，您将会从已译文件中删除相关的格式。
By specifying an email address, it is possible to use 1000 requests per day instead of 100 ones.
电子邮箱经认证后，每天可发送1000条请求。

By unchecking <e0>Automatically Fetch Translations</e0> option, machine translations will be fetched only upon invoking <k1> <k2>Ctrl</k2> <k3>M</k3> </k1> (<k4> <k5>Cmd</k5> <k6>M</k6> </k4> on OS X) on the current segment.

Changing segmentation settings may cause some already translated segments to be split or merged. This will effectively return them to the "untranslated" status, as they will no longer match segments recorded in the project memory, even though their original translation is still there.
改变分割规则设置可能导致一些已经译好的片段被分拆或者合并。这实际上会让它们回到“未译”状态，因为它们和记录在翻译记忆库中的片段不再匹配，虽然它们的原始翻译依然存在。

Create a project, separate for other projects, in the desired language pair, with an appropriate name - note that the TMXs created will include this name.

Deliver your file to the localization co-ordinator, who will pass it on to the development team for inclusion in the next release of OmegaT (user interface and documentation) or upload it to the website (website pages).
将您的文件发送给本地化协调员，由他们将这些文件转发给开发团队，以便在下一版OmegaT（用户界面和文档）中使用或将其上传到网站（网站页面）。
Dependable segmentation rules are already available for many languages, so it is likely that you will not need to get involved with writing your own segmentation rules.
许多语言中已经包含了可靠的分割规则，所以很可能您不需要自己编写分割规则。

Dependable segmentation rules are already available for many languages, so it is likely that you will not need to get involved with writing your own segmentation rules. On the other hand this functionality can be very useful in special cases, where you can increase your productivity by tuning the segmentation rules to the text to be translated.
许多语言都已经有了可靠的分割规则，因此您很可能并不需要参与编写自己的分割规则。另一方面，此功能在特殊情况下会非常有用，可以针对要翻译的文本调整分割规则来提高工作效率。
Depending on the pane status, different signs can appear at its top right corner:

Depending upon how your system is configured, it may be possible to launch the scripts simply by clicking on them with the mouse.
运行脚本可能只需要用鼠标点击文件，这取决于你的系统设定。

Depending upon the preferred editing behavior, the editing field for the untranslated segment may be empty, contain the source text, or contain the translation of the string most similar to the one to be translated.
根据不同的首选编辑行为，未译片段的编辑区域可能是空的、可能包含源文本或者与待译内容最接近的字符串的译文。
Depending upon the segmenting rules, the pair of tags may get separated into two consecutive segments and the tag validation will err on the side of caution and mark the two segments.
根据分割规则，标签对可能会被分成两部分并出现在两个连续的片段，而标签检验会检查到这两处的部分标签并提示这两个片段出现错误。

Enter an appropriate message into the message window and press <g0>OK</g0>. The Commit window will open and show the progress of the commit command. It will first commit the current contents to the server repository and then update the local copy of the repository - i.e. the contents of .svn subfolder - so that it is up to date with the latest repository version.
在讯息窗口中输入适当的讯息，然后按 <g0>OK（确定）</g0>。将会打开提交窗口并显示提交命令的进度。它会先将当前内容提交到服务器存储库，然后更新存储库的本地副本——即 .svn 子文件夹的内容——以使其与最新的存储库版本保持同步。
Enter the URL, provided by ProjectLocker, into the field <e0>URL of repository</e0>.

Enter the URL, provided by ProjectLocker, into the field <e0>URL of repository</e0>. Make sure the field <e1>Checkout directory</e1> is correct, i.e. specifies the empty folder you have created, and press <e2>OK</e2>. Once the operation has finished, you can check the said folder: it should now contain a subfolder .svn and a green OK badge on its icon will show, that the contents of the folder are up-to-date:
把 ProjectLocker 提供的网址输入到存储库的 <e0>URL（网址）</e0> 字段中。确保 <e1>Checkout directory（检出目录）</e1> 字段内容正确，即，指定您刚才所创建的空文件夹，然后按 <e2>OK（确定）</e2>。操作完成后，您可以检查上述文件夹：它现在应该包含一个子文件夹 .svn，并在其图标上显示绿色的 OK 标记，这表示该文件夹的内容是最新的：
Enter the new word or phrase (regular expressions are not supported) in the <e0>Replace with</e0> box, then click one of the following options:

To obtain OpenOffice.org or LibreOffice, follow the link from "Third-party software" button on the left.

Translatable object attributes in XHTML or HTML files can be extracted as separate segments.

Formatting information present in the source file usually needs to be reproduced in the target file. The in-line formatting information made possible by the supported formats (in particular DocBook, HTML, XHTML, Open Document Format(ODF) and Office Open XML (MS Office 2007 and later) at the time of writing) is presented as tags in OmegaT. Normally tags are ignored when considering the similarity between different texts for matching purposes. Tags reproduced in the translated segment will be present in the translated document.

您可以在此处重新定义用于保护登录详细信息和机器翻译服务访问密钥的主密码。在创建新密码之前，请务必记下所有这些详细信息，因为它们都将被删除，需要重新输入。
Here you can select different subfolders, for instance the subfolder with source files, subfolder for target files etc.

Here you can select different subfolders, for instance the subfolder with source files, subfolder for target files etc. If you enter names of folders that do not exist yet, <a0>OmegaT</a0> creates them for you. In case you decide to modify project folders, keep in mind that this will not move existing files from old folders to the new location.
在这里你可以选择不同的子文件夹，例如包含原文文件的子文件夹、译文文件的子文件夹等。如果输入的文件夹名称尚不存在，<a0>OmegaT</a0> 会创建之。如果你决定修改项目的文件夹，要记住这并不会将现有文件从旧文件夹移动到新位置。
Here you may also specify custom location of project folders.
你也可以在此指定项目各文件夹的自定义位置。
Here you may setup the source filename patterns of files \
在此您可以设置过滤器使用的源文件的文件名模式，自定义已译文件的文件名，并选择用来载入文本和保存已译副本的编码。注意：并非所有的过滤器都允许您选择一种编码。

Here you may setup the source filename patterns of files the filter will process, customize the filenames of translated files, and select what encodings it will use for loading the file and saving its translated counterpart.
在此你可以设置过滤器将处理的文件的原文文件名模式、自定义译文文件的文件名、并选择载入文件与保存其对应译文时使用的编码。

Here you may setup the source filename patterns of files the filter will process, customize the filenames of translated files, and select what encodings it will use for loading the file and saving its translated counterpart. Note: not all filters allow you to select an encoding.
在此你可以设置过滤器将处理的文件的原文文件名模式、自定义译文文件的文件名、并选择载入文件与保存其对应译文时使用的编码。 注：并非所有过滤器都允许选择编码。

If <e0>Show Relevant Suggestions Automatically</e0> option is checked, Auto-completer is launched automatically by typing the first letter of a translated glossary entry, or by typing "<" in case of tags.

tuv.seg: If <g0>Use Stemming for Glossary Entries</g0> option is ON, with an English source text, the glossary entry "element" will be found if the source text contains "elements".
如果<g0>使用词干提取自术语条目</g0>选项开启，英文原文中若存在 "elements"，术语条目 "element" 将会显示。

If <l0>abort </l0>is selected, the tag validator will stop on the first invalid segment.

If <l1>warn</l1> is specified, the tag validator will process all segments and write warnings about any segments with invalid tags into the file specified.
如果使用<l1>warn</l1>，则标签验证器会处理所有片段并把含非法标签片段的警告写入指定文件。
If HTML file has the encoding declaration, it will be used disregarding any value you set in this dialog.
如果 HTML 文件中有编码声明，则将使用之，忽略你在此处设置的值。
If Java is already installed on your system (which is probably the case) and you plan to use this existing, system-wide Java installation in conjunction with OmegaT, first check that it is suitable.
如果您的系统已经安装了Java（很可能如本案例所示），并且您准备使用该现有的全系统Java安装来与OmegaT协同，那么需要首先检查其是否适合。
If Java is installed at system level and is in the command path, the full path need not be entered.)
如果 Java 是在系统级安装的且处于命令行路径中，则无需输入完整路径。）
If OmegaT needs to use an authenticated proxy server to access the Internet, enter the details provided by the proxy administrator here.
如果 OmegaT 需要使用要身份验证的代理服务器来访问因特网，请在此处输入代理服务器管理员所提供的详细信息。

If Options > Editing Behaviour > "Go To Next Untranslated Segment stops when there is at least one alternative translation" is selected however and at least one alternative translation of a non-unique segment has been created, this function treats all instances of that segment (whether default or alternative translations) as untranslated, i.e. does not skip them.
如果选项>编辑行为>“当至少有一种可选翻译时前往下一未翻译片段”被选中，并且一个非唯一片段至少创建了一种可选翻译，该功能将该片段的所有实例（不管是默认翻译还是可选翻译）视为未翻译，即不会跳过这些片段。
If Priorview fails to launch:
如果Priorview未能启动：
If a "command not found" or similar message is returned, it is likely that Java is not installed on your system
如果返回了“command not found”或类似的信息，系统很有可能没有安装 Java
If a HHC or HHK file has an encoding declaration, it will be used regardless of any value you specify in this dialog.
如果 HHC 和 HHK 文件中有编码声明，则将使用之，忽略你在此处设置的值。
If a combination you try is already assigned, a message to this effect is displayed in the dialogue, and you can delete the combination and try another.
如果您尝试的组合已被分配，则会在对话框中显示此结果的消息，您可以删除组合并尝试其他组合。
If a file does not load into the <g0>Editor</g0> pane, then it could be that it is in a format that doesn't work in OmegaT.
如果某个文件无法加载到<g0>编辑器</g0>窗格，那么该文件可能是OmegaT无法处理的格式。
If a given sentence has already been translated once, and translated correctly, there is no need for it to be retranslated.
如果指定的片段已翻译过一次且翻译正确，则无需再次翻译它们。
If a segment has already been translated and an identical segment later on in the text is then changed, the earlier segment will be brought into line with the changed segment.
如果一个已译片段在下文更改了译法，则较早的片段将与最新修改的片段保持一致。
If a suitable JRE is already installed on your Windows system, select "Without JRE".
如果 Windows 系统中已经安装了适用的 JRE， 选择“不包含 JRE 版本”。
If a suitable piece of the work for your language has not yet been started, you can make an entry in the plan to indicate that you have assumed responsibility for it.
如果您所使用的语言还没有开始对应的翻译工作，您可以在计划中输入一个条目，表明您已经承担这项工作。
If a user interface in this language is available, <a3>OmegaT</a3> uses it.
如果存在所用语言的界面， <a3>OmegaT</a3> 将会使用它。
If all has gone according to plan, your macro should now work.
如果一切都按计划进行，现在你的宏应该工作。

如果一切正常，将生成文件的一个.html版本：<br1/>
If an <a0>OmegaT</a0> project contains one or more glossaries, any terms in the glossary which are also found in the current segment will be automatically displayed in the Glossary viewer.
如果 <a0>OmegaT</a0> 项目包含一个或多个词汇表文件，当前片段中出现的所有位于词汇表中的词汇将自动显示在词汇表查看器中。
If an Internet connection is available, various MT services such as Google Translate and Microsoft Translator can be used from within OmegaT.
如果连接到互联网，OmegaT 还可连接机器翻译服务，如谷歌翻译和 Microsoft Translator。
If an error is found in such a file, OmegaT will indicate the position within the defective file at which the error is located.
如果在文件中发现了错误，则 OmegaT 将提示问题文件中发现错误的位置。

If both this option and the <l0><g1>Insert the source text</g1></l0> option are selected, all words with a corresponding glossary entry will be translated automatically when the source text is inserted.
如果同时勾选了此选项与<l0><g1>插入原文文本</g1></l0>选项，当插入原文文本时，所有有着相应词汇表条目的词汇都会被自动翻译。
If checked, non-breakable spaces will be displayed with a grey background.
如果选中该选项，不可分割空格以灰底显示。
If checked, non-unique segments will be marked in pale grey.
如果选中该选项，则非唯一片段会被标记为浅灰色。
If checked, segments with notes will be marked in cyan.
如果选中该选项，则含笔记片段会被标记为青绿色。
If checked, source segments will be shown and marked in green.
如果选中该选项，将会显示源片段并标记为绿色。
If checked, the background of all segments where the target segment has been auto-populated (from TMXs placed in /tm/auto for example) are displayed in colour.
如果选中该选项，所有（例如根据/tm/auto路径下的TMX文件）自动填充的片段背景将标记有颜色。
If checked, the entries are sorted alphabetically.
勾选后，条目会按字母顺序排列。
If checked, the longer entries are placed on the list first.
勾选后，列表中首先出现较长的条目。
If checked, the translated segments will be marked in yellow.
如果选中该选项，已译片段将会标记为黄色。
If checked, the untranslated segments will be marked in violet.
如果选中该选项，未译片段将会标记为紫色。
If checked, white spaces will be displayed with a small dot.

If every single word in OmegaT is enclosed within tags, it is possible that Word has attempted to spell-check the text without access to a suitable spelling dictionary, and has therefore marked each word as mis-spelt.
如果OmegaT中的每个单词都包含在标签内，Word可能会拼写检查文本而无法访问合适的拼写字典，因此将每个单词标记为拼写错误。

If for a given source segment there is as yet no existing translation in the project translation memory (project_save.tmx), the current translation will be saved in the project_save.tmx as the default translation.
如果一个片段在项目翻译记忆project_save.tmx中还没有译文，则会把当前译文作为默认译文保存到project_save.tmx中。
If for a given source segment there is no entry for the selected target language, all other target segments are loaded, regardless of the language.
如果一个指定的源片段在选择的目标语言中没有条目，则不考虑语言而加载其他所有目标片段。
If for example the original file is named Document.xx.docx, the following variables will give the following results:
例如如果原始文件名为Document.xx.docx，则变量与其对应的结果如下：
If for some reason these files are lost or corrupted, simply download and/or reinstall OmegaT to restore them all.
如果出于某种原因丢失或损坏了这些文件，仅需下载并重新安装 OmegaT 以恢复它们。
If given, <a2>OmegaT</a2> launches in console mode and translates the given project.
如果给出了该参数，则 <a2>OmegaT</a2> 以控制台模式启动并翻译指定的项目。
If given, <a2>OmegaT</a2> starts in console mode and will translate the given project.
如果给出了该参数，则 <a2>OmegaT</a2> 以控制台模式启动并翻译指定的项目。
If in doubt, don't hesitate to ask project members directly either by sending them an e-mail from the SourceForge page or by sending a public mail to the user group.
如果有任何疑问，请直接向项目成员请教，可通过 Source Forge 页面给他们发送邮件或向用户讨论组发送一份公开邮件。
If in doubt, select this option.
如果不确定，选择此选项。.
If in doubt, select this version.
如果不确定，选择此版本。
If invoked in a git working tree or svn checkout, the results will be staged/added.
如果在 git 工作树或 svn 检出中调用，其结果会被 stage/add。
If issue checking is slow, try disabling some of the optional checks.
如果问题检查很慢，请尝试禁用某些可选检查。
If it does not, you still have the option to install a local version of Java or a different version of Java at system level.
如果不能，您仍可以在系统层面安装本地或其他不同版本的Java。
If it is <e0>tar.bz</e0>, you have forgotten to unpack (untar) it.
如果扩展名为<e0>tar.bz</e0>，那是因为您忘记解压了。
If it is clear from the very start, that translations in a given TM (or TMs) are all correct, one can put them into the<e0> tm/auto</e0> folder and avoid confirming a lot of<e1> [fuzzy]</e1> cases.
如果在提供的 TM 中的译文完全可靠的话，那么可以把它们放到 <e0> tm/auto</e0> 目录以避免需要对大量的 <e1> [模糊]</e1>进行确认。
If it is not in your distribution's repository, you can <a0>download it from kaptain.sourceforge.net</a0>.
如果它不在您发行版的存储库中，您可以 <a0>从 kaptain.sourceforge.net 下载</a0>。
If languages match but not the country, the segments still get loaded.
如果语言匹配但国家不匹配，仍会导入片段。
If later access to the desired location is granted that location will be used and all settings will return to their defaults as a result of the location change.
如果稍后给予了访问所需位置的权限，则将使用该位置， 并且所有设置将因位置更改而恢复为其默认值。
If multiple functions were to be used at the same time in practice, it would be more efficient to combine them in a single script file.
如果现实情况同时要使用多种功能，将这些脚本合并成一个单独文件会更有效率。
If necessary, edit the file names of the dictionary or change your project's language settings.
必要时可编辑词典文件名或改变项目的语言设置。
If necessary, you can select a specific domain to limit the volume of data sent and received.
如有必要，你可以选择特定领域以限制发送与接受的数据量。
If neither the language code not the country code match, the segments will be ignored.
如果语言代码和国家代码都不符合，片段将被忽略。
If no text has been selected, the current source segment is written to this file.
如果未选中文本，将导出当前的源片段至该文件。
If no text is selected, <a1>OmegaT</a1> selects the word that contains the letter immediately to the right of the cursor.
如果未选中文本， <a1>OmegaT</a1> 将选中包含了紧挨着光标右边字母的单词。
If not checked, source segments will not be shown.
如果未选中，将不会显示源片段。
If not given, <a2>OmegaT</a2> reverts to default values (<a3>OmegaT</a3> folder under user home or, if unavailable, the current working folder).
如果没有给出该参数，<a2>OmegaT</a2>将转而使用缺省值（即用户主目录中的<a3>OmegaT</a3>文件夹，如果不可用的话则是当前的工作目录）。
If not specified, OmegaT reverts to default values (the OmegaT folder in the user home folder, or if not available: the current working folder).
如果没有给出该参数，OmegaT 将转而使用缺省值（即用户主目录中的OmegaT文件夹，如果不可用的话则是当前的工作目录）。
If not, debugging messages will be shown which will (hopefully) provide some idea of where the problem is.
如果没有，则会显示调试消息，它将（希望）提供有关问题出现的一些信息。
If not, or if you are not sure, select "with JRE".
如果未安装或不确定，选择“包含 JRE 版本”。
If not, why not write an article on using OmegaT?
如果没有，为什么不写一篇关于OmegaT使用的文章呢？
If on, when a PO segment (which may be a whole paragraph) is not translated, the translation will be empty in the target file.
如果启用，未翻译的 PO 片段（可能是整个段落）在目标文件中的译文是空的。
If one does not wish to use external TMs for counting, one will either have to empty the /tm folder or change the project setup (temporarily) so that the value for /tm points to a different location.
如果不想使用外部翻译记忆参与统计，可以让 /tm 文件夹为空或临时改变项目设置以让 /tm 指向其他地方。
If only one file is present, check its extension.
如果只有一份与预期相同的文件，那么检查下它的扩展名。
If part of the target segment has been selected, this function overwrites the selected portion.
如果已选中了目标片段的某个部分，则此功能会覆盖此部分。

If selected, when a segment in a PO file (which may be a whole paragraph) is not translated, the translation will be empty in the target file. Technically speaking, the <c0>msgstr</c0> segment in the PO target file, if created, will be left empty. As this is the standard behaviour for PO files, it is selected by default. If the option is off, the source text will be copied to the target segment.
如果选择了此选项，当 PO 文件中的某个片段（可能是整个段落）未翻译时，其在译文文件中的翻译将为空。技术上说，在 PO 译文文件中的 <c0>msgstr</c0> 片段（如果已创建）将保留为空。由于这是 PO 文件的标准行为，因此它在默认情况下是选中的。如果关闭了此选项，原文文本将被复制到译文段落。
If sentence segmentation has been selected, you can setup the rules by selecting <m5> <g6><i7/>Options</g6> <g8>Segmentation...</g8> </m5>from the main menu.
如果选用了句子分割，可通过从主菜单选择<m5> <g6><i7/>选项</g6> <g8>片段分割...</g8> </m5>以设置规则。
If so, this makes installation much easier.
如果这样将使得安装更容易。
If some texts are selected within the fuzzy match, only this selection will be inserted at the cursor position.
如果某段文字被选为模糊匹配，那么被选择的部分会在光标处插入。
If some texts are selected within the fuzzy match, only this selection will replace the whole target segment.
如果某段文字被选为模糊匹配，那么只有被选中的部分会被整个目标片段替换。
If spell checking is activated, spelling mistakes and typos are recognized and can be corrected during translation.
如果启用拼写检查功能，翻译过程中 OmegaT 即会辨认拼写错误和错别字并进行修改。
If the Auto-propagation check box is not checked, the segments with alternative translations are left untranslated until the user has decided which translation is to be used.
如果未选中自动传播复选框，则含可选译文的片段会保持未译状态至用户决定使用哪种译文。

If the Program specifies that a proxy can decide which future versions of the GNU General Public License can be used, that proxy's public statement of acceptance of a version permanently authorizes you to choose that version for the Program.

If the Program specifies that a proxy can decide which future versions of the GNU General Public License can be used, that proxy's public statement of acceptance of a version permanently authorizes you to choose that version for the Program.
If the appropriate filter is found, the file is assigned to it for processing.
如果找到了合适的过滤器，它将被用来处理该文件。
If the automatic installation process does not work: check that your Internet connection is working; if so, try a different repository URL.
如果自动安装流程无法正常进行：检查网络连接是否正常；如果正常，试一下其他仓库URL。
If the checker's changes are to be included in a translation memory repository maintained by the customer, the changes need to be made <i0>before</i0> the final documents are created.
如果要将校对人员的改动也纳入客户维护的翻译记忆库， 那么必须在创建最终版文件 <i0>之前</i0> 进行改动。
If the code compiles successfully, you will see the <c0>BUILD SUCCESSFUL</c0> message.
如果代码编译成功，您将看到<c0> BUILD SUCCESSFUL </ c0>消息。
If the current segment is the first one in a file, it moves to the last segment of the previous file.
如果当前片段是文件中的第一个片段，将移动到前个文件的最后一个片段。
If the current segment is the last segment in a file, it moves to the first segment of the next file.
如果当前片段是文件中的最后一个片段，将移动到下个文件的第一个片段。
If the current translation of the segment does not fit, the user can select <g0>Edit → Create Alternative Translation</g0>.
如果片段的当前译文不适合，则用户可选择<g0>编辑→创建可选译文</g0>。

If the document allows, the translator is strongly encouraged to remove style information from the original document so that as few tags as possible appear in the OmegaT interface.
如果允许，极力倡导翻译人员将原始文档的风格信息删除，以确保在 OmegaT 中尽可能少地显示标签。

If the document allows, the translator is strongly encouraged to remove style information from the original document so that as few tags as possible appear in the OmegaT interface. Follow the indications given in Hints for tags management. Frequently validate tags (see Tag validation) and produce translated documents (see below and Menu) at regular intervals to make it easier to catch any problems that arise. A hint: translating a plain text version of the text and adding the necessary style in the relevant application at a later stage may turn out to be less hassle.
如果文档允许，强烈建议译者从原始文档中删除样式信息以在 OmegaT 的界面中尽可能少地显示标签。请遵循标签管理提示中给出的说明。经常验证标签（参见标签验证）并定期生成译文文档（参见下文和菜单）可以更容易发现问题。提示：翻译文本的纯文本版本并在稍后阶段在相关应用程序中添加必要的样式可能会不那么麻烦。
If the document you are translating contains it, please do <s0>not</s0> translate the GPL (GNU Public License) or the GFDL (GNU Free Documentation License).
如果您正在翻译的文档包含GPL（GNU公共许可证）或GFDL（GNU自由文档许可证），请<s0>不要</s0>翻译他们。
If the documents are not available, the entry is greyed out.
如果文件不可用，该菜单条目为灰。
If the file already exists, no attempt is done to verify the format or the character set of the file: the new entries will always be in tab-separated format and UTF-8.
如果该文件已存在，不会对其格式或字符集进行检查：新条目总是以tab分隔并使用UTF-8编码。
If the file displayed in the browser is not being updated, check the following:
如果浏览器中显示的文件未更新，请检查以下内容：

If the files to be translated are parts of a tree structure (as in a website), you need only specify the top-level subfolder and OmegaT will maintain the entire contents, while keeping the tree structure intact.
如果要翻译的文件是结构树的一部分（例如网站上的文件），您只需指定最上级子目录，而 OmegaT 将会保持完整的树形结构和全部内容。
If the filter has any options, you may change them by clicking Options.
如果过滤器有任何可选项，你可以通过点击选项按钮来更改之。
If the language of the user's system is not available, <a6>OmegaT</a6> defaults to English.
如果不存在用户系统的语言，<a6>OmegaT</a6>缺省使用英语。
If the option is OFF, the glossary entry above will not be found.
如果关闭此选项，上述术语条目将不会显示。
If the option is off, the source text will be copied to the target segment.
如果关闭了此选项，则会复制源文本到目标片段中。
If the original document was LTR, the display direction of the target document must be changed manually to RTL in its viewing application.
如果源文档是自左向右的，目标文档的显示方向可以在其查看程序中手动修改为自右向左。
If the parameter is not specified, all files will be processed.
如果未使用该选项，则处理所有文件。
If the path to the location of priorview.tcl contains spaces, put it in quotes, e.g.:
如果beforeview.tcl位置的路径包含空格，请将其放在引号中，例如：
If the program does terminal interaction, make it output a short notice like this when it starts in an interactive mode:
If the program does terminal interaction, make it output a short notice like this when it starts in an interactive mode:
If the project language codes and the tmx language codes fully match, the segments are loaded in memory.
如果项目语言代码和 TMX 语言代码完全匹配，片段将会导入内存中。

If the project uses specific filters and segmentation parameters, both the <f0>filters.xml</f0> and <f1>segmentation.conf</f1> files must be added to the versioning system and published on the server.
如果项目使用专用过滤器和片段分割参数，<f0>filters.xml</f0> 和 <f1>segmentation.conf</f1> 文件都必须添加到版本控制系统中并发布到服务器上。
If the rule matches, either the cursor moves on without inserting a segment break (for an exception rule) or a new segment break is created at the current cursor position (for the break rule).
如果规则匹配，光标继续移动而不进行分割（对于例外规则）或者创建一个新片段（为中断规则）。
If the source file is modified after you have begun translating, <a1>OmegaT</a1> may be unable to find a segment that you have already translated.
如果在开始翻译后对源文件进行了修改，<a1>OmegaT</a1> 也许会找不到您已经翻译的某个片段。
If the source segment in one of the ancillary TMs is identical to the text being translated, OmegaT acts as defined in the <m0> <g1>Options</g1> <g2>Editing Behavior...</g2> </m0> dialog window.
如果某个辅助TM中的某个源片段与待译的文本完全相同，OmegaT会安装在<m0> <g1>选项</g1> <g2>编辑行为...</g2> </m0>对话框中的设置进行操作。

If the spell checker is not working, then make sure first that the check box <g0>"Automatically check the spelling of text"</g0> in the spell checker dialog (<g1>Options > Spell checking...)</g1> is checked.
如果拼写检查器未能正常工作，先确认勾选了拼写检查器对话框（<g1>选项 > 拼写检查...</g1>）中<g0>“自动检查文本的拼写”</g0>复选框。
If the text is encoded in 8 bits, however, one can be faced with the following awkward situation: instead of displaying the text, for Japanese characters...
然而，如果文本使用 8 位编码，那么可能会遇到这样困惑的情况：不是显示日文的文本...

If the translation for several identical source segments already exists in the translation memory of the project, these segments, together with other, already translated unique segments, will be classified as an "Exact match".
如果在项目的翻译记忆中存在多个相同源片段的译文，这些及其他已译唯一片段将被归类为“精确匹配”。
If the value is <l1>abort</l1>, then on tag errors the errors are printed and the program stops.
如果该参数值为 <l1>abort</l1>，那么在遇到标签错误时打印出错误，同时程序停止。
If the value is <l2>warn</l2> then the errors are printed but OmegaT continues.
如果该参数值为 <l2>warn</l2>，则打印错误且 OmegaT 继续执行。
If there are any differences, check that the <f0>filters.xml</f0> and <f1>segmentation.conf</f1> files are under version control.
如果有所不同，请检查 <f0>filters.xml</f0> 和 <f1>segmentation.conf</f1> 文件是否受版本控制。
If there are other files named test.html in other folders, they will be ignored.
如果在其子目录下有名为test.html的文件，它们会被忽略。
If there's no file name displayed, the source is the internal project translation memory.
如果未显示文件名，则发现匹配的源为缺省项目的翻译记忆。
If there's nothing appearing in the Machine Translate pane, then check the following:
如果在机器翻译窗格中没有出现任何东西，检查下列内容：
If there's several alternative translations available for the active segment, you can label the alternative selected as the default translation.
如果当前片段有多个可选译文，您可以标记所选择的译文为缺省译文。
If they <e0>don't need</e0> to stay immune from further changes, then remove the TMX from /tm/enforce.
如果它们<e0>不需要</e0>免除于进一步更改，请从/tm/enforce中删除TMX。
If they <e0>need</e0> to stay immune from further changes, then keep the TMX in /tm/enforce.
如果它们<e0>需要</e0>免除于进一步更改，请在/tm/enforce中保留TMX。
If they are accidentally changed, the formatting of the final file may be corrupted.
如果它们被意外地改变，最终的文件格式也许会被破坏。
If they are used by some other application on your system, they will disappear from that application, too.
如果系统上有其他程序使用它们，则它们也会从那些程序中消失。
If they do not conflict with system shortcuts, they should be available from within OmegaT.
不会和系统快捷键冲突的话，它们在OmegaT中应该有效了。
If this is all you're interested in, you can skip to step 3a.
如果这是你感兴趣的所有内容，你可以跳到步骤3a。
If this is not the case, open the main dialog by selecting<e0> Options → File Filters...</e0> from the main menu.
如果不满意，可以从主菜单<e0>选项→文件过滤器...</e0>打开主对话框。
If this option is checked, the glossary will only display one entry, even if the same word exists in several forms (e.g. with and without capital letters) in the glossary.
勾选此选项后，词汇表中只会显示一个条目，即使此词汇在词汇表中存在有多种形式（例如，有和没有字母是大写的）。
If this option is checked, when a fuzzy match is inserted, either manually or automatically, OmegaT attempts to convert the numbers in the fuzzy matches according to the source contents.
选中该选项后，在手动或自动插入模糊匹配时，OmegaT会尝试根据源文本转换模糊匹配中的数字。

If this option is checked, when a fuzzy match is inserted, either manually or automatically, OmegaT attempts to convert the numbers in the fuzzy matches according to the source contents. There are a number of restrictions:
如果勾选了此选项，当手动或自动插入模糊匹配时，OmegaT 会尝试根据原文内容转换模糊匹配中的数字。这里有若干限制：
If this option is selected, OmegaT will not remember the access key between sessions.
勾选此选项后，OmegaT 在不同会话之间不会记住访问密钥。
If this version is not available, you can try to <a0>download the unsigned version</a0>.
如果该版本不可用，可尝试<a0>下载未签名版本</a0>。
If used, neither the user's decision to accept the translation nor the final translation are made available to Google.
如果用了，既不表示用户要接受该译文，更不表示最终译文会提供给谷歌。

If we want to avoid any mis-translations in case of segments with several possible target contents, checking this check box will cause <e0>Go To Next Untranslated Segment</e0> to stop on the next such segment, irrespective of whether it has already been translated or not.
如果我们想要避免在具有多个可能译文内容的片段上出现错译，选中此复选框会让<e0>转到下一个未译片段</e0>在下一个此类片段处停下，无论其是否已被翻译。
If you add a prefix (for instance [fuzzy]), you can trace those translations later to see they are correct.
如果您加上了前缀（例如[模糊]），之后您可以找到这些译文并检查是否正确。

If you add terms to a covered work in accord with this section, you must place, in the relevant source files, a statement of the additional terms that apply to those files, or a notice indicating where to find the applicable terms.

If you add terms to a covered work in accord with this section, you must place, in the relevant source files, a statement of the additional terms that apply to those files, or a notice indicating where to find the applicable terms.
If you already have a version of OmegaT installed on your PC and wish to upgrade to a more recent version, you have two options:
如果您已经在电脑上安装了某个版本的 OmegaT 且希望升级到最新的版本，有两种方法：
If you already have collected words you wish the spell checker to ignore / accept, you just need to copy the corresponding two files into the <f0>omegat</f0>subfolder of your current project.
如果您已经收集了希望拼写检查器忽略/接受的单词，只需复制相应的两个文件到当前项目的<f0>omegat</f0>子目录。

If you are already reasonably familiar with computers in general and choose a straightforward scripting language like Javascript or Tcl/Tk, you could teach yourself enough to be able to write simple but useful scripts within just a couple of weeks.
如果你已经了解了电脑，选择一种简单的脚本语言例如 Javascript 或者Tcl/Tk，通过可以自学，可以在几周内写出简单又有用的脚本。
If you are confident that a suitable version of the JRE is already installed on your computer, you can download a version of OmegaT without the JRE.
如果您确定电脑中已经安装了适用的 JRE，您可下载不包含 JRE 的 OmegaT 版本。

If you are confident that a suitable version of the JRE is already installed on your computer, you can download a version of OmegaT without the JRE. The download will be faster, and the installation will require less space on your hard drive. In this case, do not select the Default version; select a different version (e.g. Standard or Latest), then select a version marked "Java not included".
如果您确信计算机上已安装了合适版本的 JRE，则可以下载不带 JRE 的 OmegaT 版本。下载会更快，安装需要的硬盘空间会更少。在这种情况下，请不要选择默认版本；选择不同的版本（例如标准版或最新版），然后选择标记为“不包含 Java”的版本。
If you are confused about which version to download, you can use the <a0>Download selector</a0>.
如果您不确定应下载哪个版本，您可以使用 <a0>下载选择</a0>.
If you are in any doubt, we recommend that you use the version supplied with JRE.
如果还是有疑问，我们建议您使用附带了 JRE 的版本。
If you are interested in modifying or distributing <a1>OmegaT</a1>, read this document carefully and ensure you understand its implications before doing anything.
如果您有兴趣修改和发布 <a1>OmegaT</a1>，请仔细查阅该文档并确保在进行操作前掌握其全部含义。
If you are interested in other settings of this dialog, you can return to it any time by pressing <k0>Ctrl+E.</k0>
如果对该对话框中的其他设置有兴趣，您可在任何时候按下<k0>Ctrl+E</k0>来将其打开。
If you are not very familiar with Linux, we therefore recommend that you install an OmegaT version with JRE included.
如果对 Linux 不是很熟悉的话，我们建议安装带有 JRE 的 OmegaT 版本。

如果您是 Linux 的新用户，我们建议您选择包含 JRE 的 OmegaT 版本。

如果您依赖或希望使用未在系统级别安装的 Java 安装程序，则这还不够：您还必须指示您的系统在哪里查找 Java 。
If you are serious about learning tcl/tk, "Practical Programming in Tcl and Tk" by Brent Welch, ISBN: 0-13-038560-3 is strongly recommended.
如果你是非常认真地想要学习tcl/tk，强烈推荐Brent Welch编写的《Practical Programming in Tcl and Tk》 ， ISBN: 0-13-038560-3.
If you are supplied with previously created translation memories , for example by your translation agency or your client, OmegaT is able to use these as reference memories.
如果您手头有事先创建好的译法记忆文件，比如说是翻译公司或客户提供给您的译法记忆，OmegaT 也可以使用这些文件作为翻译参考。
If you are sure that a suitable Java Runtime Environment is already installed on your computer at system level, you can select the option without JRE included.

如果你正在翻译一个.html文件，一个便捷的方法就是用一个具有自动刷新功能的浏览器来实现现成的预览功能。
If you are unable to run <a0>OmegaT</a0> normally (no graphical environment available): copy the settings files from some other <a1>OmegaT</a1> installation on another machine to a specific folder.
如果您无法正常运行<a0>OmegaT</a0>（没有可用的图形界面）：可将另一机器上安装的<a1>OmegaT</a1>设置文件复制到指定文件夹。
If you are unsure whether a suitable JRE is already installed on your system, you can still download and install an OmegaT version with JRE.
如不确定系统中是否已安装了适用的 JRE，您可下载并安装包含 JRE 的 OmegaT 版本。

If you are unsure whether a suitable JRE is already installed on your system, you can still download and install an OmegaT version with JRE. This version of the JRE will only be used locally for OmegaT, will not conflict with, override or uninstall any other JRE installations, and is therefore safe to use.
如果你不确定系统上是否已经安装有合适的 JRE，你依然可以下载并安装 OmegaT 的带 JRE 版本。此版本的 JRE 将仅由 OmegaT 局部使用，不会出现冲突、覆盖、或卸载任何其他 JRE 安装的情况，因此可以安装使用。
If you are unsure whether or not you have a suitable version of the JRE, select a version with JRE (or the Default version).
如果您不确定您是否已安装了适用的 JRE 版本，选择包含 JRE 的版本（或默认版本）。

如果您使用的是Linux或Macintosh平台，请先获取和安装相关版本的 Crossover，再安装Iceni Infix Professional。
If you are using Mac OSX, you can <a2>download a version of Priorview for Mac here</a2>.
如果你使用的是Mac OSX, 你可以在这里<a2>下载Mac版本的Priorview</a2>。

如果您正在使用的是OmegaT 2.3或更新的版本，您只要把如上描述的从 Infix中导出的XML文件放在您 OmegaT项目的 /source文件夹内。
If you are using an authenticated proxy, please enter here your user and password.
如果您使用的是需要认证的代理服务器，请在此处输入用户和密码。
If you are using an earlier version of OmegaT, upgrading your OmegaT installation is recommended.
如果您使用的是更早版本的OmegaT，我们推荐升级您的OmegaT 安装程序。
If you are using the Windows version with JRE, download the file <a1>OmegaT_with_JRE.bat</a1>; If you are using the Windows version without JRE, download the file <a2>OmegaT_without_JRE.bat</a2>.
如果你使用的是有JRE环境的Windows，下载名为<a1>OmegaT_with_JRE.bat</a1>的文件; 如果你使用的是没有JRE环境的Windows， 下载名为<a2>OmegaT_without_JRE.bat</a2>的文件.

如果您无法看到所有窗格（处于打开或最小化状态），按下<g0>选项>恢复主窗口</g0>将把它们恢复为原始状态。
If you can program in another language, you can write code to support the core application.
如果你会其他编程语言，可以编写代码支持核心应用。
If you can see the file OmegaT but not OmegaT.exe in your File Manager (Windows Explorer), change the settings so that file extensions are displayed.
如果您在文件管理器（Windows 资源管理器）中能看到文件 OmegaT 但看不到 OmegaT.exe，请修改设置以显示文件扩展名。

如果您无法正常运行<a0>OmegaT</a0>（没有可用的图形界面）：可将另一机器上安装的<a1>OmegaT</a1>设置文件复制到特定的文件夹。
If you change segmentation options when a project is open, you must reload the project in order for the changes to take effect.
如果您在项目打开的时候改变分割规则选项，您必须重新载入项目以使改变生效。
If you check the corresponding checkbox, the OmegaT.l4J.ini file is modified to use the language selected (see next section for details).
如果您选中了相应的复选框，则会修改OmegaT.l4J.ini文件以使用选择的语言（请参阅下一部分了解详情）。

如果您输入了还不存在的文件夹名称，则 <a0>OmegaT</a0> 会创建它们。

如果您确定在系统级安装的Java版本与OmegaT不兼容，并且您希望将此Java版本替换为Oracle Java版本，请首先检查Oracle软件包是否适用于您的Linux发行版（SUSE，Ubuntu等）。

如果使用 "Tab-delimited export" 系统选项导出，您必须删除头 5 列（包括
