如果发现了可接受的建议，按下<k0> <k1><i2/>Ctrl</k1> <k3>M</k3> </k0> 可使用它替换已打开片段的目标部分。

If you have TransTips option activated (<g0>Options → TransTips</g0>), you can right click on the highlighted word in the source segment to open a pop-up menu with suggested translation, as offered by your glossary.
如果您激活<g0>选项→翻译提示</g0>中的翻译提示，那么可在源片段中突出显示的单词上点击右键来打开包含由术语表提供的可选译文的弹出菜单。

If you have a PDF file made of scanned pages (sometimes such files are referred to as ‘dead’ PDFs), you need to use an OCR (optical character recognition) program to recognize the text and convert it to a format that can be handled by OmegaT.
如果您有一个由扫描页面组成的PDF文件（有时这些文件被称为“死”PDF文件），您需要使用OCR（光学字符识别）程序来识别文本并将其转换为可由OmegaT处理的格式。

If you have a natural aversion to reading instructions, and your approach to new software is to click on every button you see until something resembling the desired effect occurs, then OmegaT is probably not suitable for you.
如果您讨厌阅读，您面对新软件更喜欢点击每一个按钮，直到实现预期效果，那么 OmegaT 可能并不适合您。

If you have already Java installed on your system, one way to install OmegaT is to use Java Web Start.
如果已在系统中安装了 Java，安装 OmegaT 的方法之一是使用 Java Web Start。
If you have already Java, one way to install the current version of OmegaT is to use Java Web Start.
如果已经装了 Java，安装当前版本 OmegaT 的途径之一是使用 Java Web Start。

If you have already translated a large body of text, and then realize the target language code of the project does not match the spell checker's language code (you specified pt_BR as the language, but there are no pt_BR vocabularies, for instance) you can simply copy the two corresponding files and rename them (e.g. from <e0>pt_PT.aff</e0> and <e1>pt_PT.dic</e1> to <e2>pt_BR.aff</e2> and <e3>pt_BR.dic</e3>).
如果已经译了一大段文本，但是才意识到项目的目标语言代码与拼写检查器的语言代码不符（如将pt_BR设为目标语言，但没有pt_BR术语表），您只需复制两份对应的文件并进行重命名（例如把<e0>pt_PT.aff</e0>和<e1>pt_PT.dic</e1>改名为<e2>pt_BR.aff</e2>和<e3>pt_BR.dic</e3>）。

If you have already translated a large body of text, and then realize the target language code of the project does not match the spell checker's language code (you specified pt_BR as the language, but there are no pt_BR vocabularies, for instance) you can simply copy the two corresponding files and rename them (e.g. from <e0>pt_PT.aff</e0> and <e1>pt_PT.dic</e1> to <e2>pt_BR.aff</e2> and <e3>pt_BR.dic</e3>). Of course it is much wiser, to take a short break and download the correct versions of the spell checker.

如果已经译了大量文本后才意识到项目的译文语言代码与拼写检查器的语言代码不一致（例如，将 pt_BR 设为译文语言，但没有 pt_BR 字典），您只需将对应的两个文件复制并重命名即可（例如把 <e0>pt_PT.aff</e0> 和 <e1>pt_PT.dic</e1>重命名为 <e2>pt_BR.aff</e2> 和 <e3>pt_BR.dic</e3>）。当然，稍停一会来下载正确版本的拼写检查器更为理智。

If you have already translated an instance of a non-unique segment and wish to make a different instance of the non-unique segment the default translation without changing the translation of the instance you have already translated, you must first set the status of the segment you have already translated to "alternative translation" using "Create Alternative Translation".
如果你已经翻译过一例非唯一片段，并且希望为这非唯一片段制作一种不同的默认翻译，同时还不想改变已经翻译过的实例的译文，你必须先用“创建可选翻译”将已翻译片段设定为“可选翻译”状态，
If you have an existing terminology handling system it is quite possible it offers the export of terminology data via TBX format.
如果你已经有术语处理系统，那它很可能提供通过 TBX格式到处术语数据。.
If you have any questions, the <a0>OmT-l10n list</a0> is the best place to post them.
如果您有任何问题，可以在<a0> OmT-l10n列表</a0>上发布。
If you have been using the tokenizer plug-in with an earlier version of OmegaT and have upgraded to version 3.0.0 or later of OmegaT, delete the tokenizer plug-in files from your plug-in folder.
如果你曾经使用OmegaT的早期版本的分词器插件，并现在已升级到OmegaT的3.0.0版或更高版本，请从插件文件夹中删除分词器插件文件。
If you have found OmegaT useful and would like to express your gratitude by making a <a0>donation</a0> on our Paypal account.
如果你觉得OmegaT很有用，并且想要表达感谢，可以 <a0>捐赠</a0>在我们的paypal账号。
If you have installed a version of OmegaT with JRE supplied, the launch script supplied already contains this path for you.
如果您已经安装了提供 JRE 的 OmegaT 版本，则提供的启动脚本已经为您包含此路径。
If you have installed an additional version of Java but have not made it the default version at system level, you must include the whole path of the Java binary in the launch command.
如果您已经安装了额外版本的 Java ，但尚未将其作为系统级别的默认版本，则必须在启动命令中包含 Java 二进制文件的完整路径。
If you have made changes to your Normal.dotm, you might want to back this up first.
如果您对Normal.dotm进行了更改，则可能需要先将其备份。
If you have made changes to your<f0> OmegaT.l4J.ini </f0>file and/or are using a .bat file, you must copy these over.
如果您对 <f0> OmegaT.l4J.ini </f0> 进行了修改或使用 .bat 文件，那么必须把它们复制过去。
If you have no doubt that a TMX is more accurate than the <f0>project_save.tmx</f0> of OmegaT, put this TMX in /tm/enforce to overwrite existing default translations unconditionally.
如果您认同TMX比OmegaT的<f0>project_save.tmx</f0>更准确，请将此TMX置于/tm/enforce目录下，以便无条件覆盖现有的默认翻译。
If you have not already done so, add the Developer tab to the ribbon as follows: click on the Office button.
如果您尚未这样做，请按如下方式将“开发人员”选项卡添加到功能区：单击Office按钮。
If you have the source and the target Properties files for one and the same contents in your language pair, this procedure will create a corresponding tmx file for these contents.
如果您有以您需要的语言对表示的源和目标属性文件，这个过程将创建包含这些内容的 TMX 文件。
If you haven't yet saved the project, this manually confirms whether you really wish to quit.
如果您未手动保存项目，系统将会让您确认是否退出。
If you install a version of Java at system level, you must either ensure that it is in your launch path, or call it explicitly when launching OmegaT.
如果在系统级安装了某个版本的 Java，你要么确保它处于启动路径当中， 要么必须在启动 OmegaT 时明确地对它进行调用。
If you install the OmegaT version with JRE even though the JRE is already installed on your computer, OmegaT's JRE will be installed separately and will not conflict with it.
如果您在电脑上已安装 JRE 的情况下下载了包含 JRE 的 OmegaT 版本，OmegaT 的 JRE 会独立安装，不会与已有的 JRE 冲突

If you install the OmegaT version with JRE even though the JRE is already installed on your computer, OmegaT's JRE will be installed separately and will not conflict with it. It is therefore always safe to install the version of OmegaT with JRE. If you are unsure whether or not you have a suitable version of the JRE, select a version with JRE (or the Default version).
如果您的计算机上已经安装了 JRE 而您又安装带 JRE 的 OmegaT 版本，OmegaT 的 JRE 会单独安装，不会与之冲突。因此，安装带 JRE 的 OmegaT 版本总是安全的。如果您不确定是否具有合适版本的 JRE，请选择具有 JRE 的版本（或默认版本）。
If you later change filters, only the project filters will be updated, while the user filters stay unchanged.
如果以后您改变了过滤器，则只更新当前项目的过滤器而用户过滤器保持不变。

If you modify the project segmentation or delete files from the source, some matches may appear as <e1>orphan strings</e1> in the Match Viewer: such matches refer to segments that do not exist any more in the source documents, as they correspond to segments translated and recorded before the modifications took place.
如果您修改了项目的分割规则或从源中删除了文件，那么在匹配查看器中可能出现<e1>孤立字符串</e1>。这样的匹配指向源文档中不存在的片段，而是指向修改发生前的片段记录。
If you need altered settings, the configuration files must be available.
如果需要变更设置，必须提供配置文件。
If you need assistance with any aspect of OmegaT, feel free to join the <u1>OmegaT users group.</u1>
如果您需要关于OmegaT某些方面的帮助，可随时加入<u1>OmegaT用户组</u1>。
If you need non-standard settings, the corresponding configuration files (<l0>filters.conf</l0> and <l1>segmentation.conf</l1>) must be present.
如果不使用标准设置，则必须提供相应的配置文件（<l0>filters.conf</l0>和<l1>segmentation.conf)</l1>）。
If you need to reproduce text formatting (as well as other things such as drawings) in your translation, there are three ways to try:

If you need to see tags in OmegaT but do not need to retain most of the formatting in the translated document you are free not to include tags in the translation.

Ignore file context when identifying segments with alternate translations: by default, OmegaT uses the source file name as part of the identification of an alternate translation.
当识别片段带有替代翻译时，忽略文件上下文：在默认情况下，OmegaT使用源文件名称作为替代翻译的识别的一部分。

Ignore file context when identifying segments with alternate translations: by default, OmegaT uses the source file name as part of the identification of an alternative translation. If the option is checked, the source file name will not be used, and alternative translations will take effect in any file as long as the other context (previous/next segments or some sort of segment identifier, depending on the file format) matches.
识别有可选翻译的片段时忽略文件上下文：默认情况下，OmegaT 用原文文件名作为可选翻译的识别信息的一部分。如果勾选了此选项，则不使用原文文件名，而只要其他上下文（上一个/下一个片段或依赖于文件格式的某种片段标识）匹配，可选翻译会在任意文件中生效。

忽略大小写不同的命中（例如 FOO 和 foo）

In a file manager a translation project looks and acts just like any other folder.
在文件管理器中翻译项目在外观和操作上和其他文件夹一样。
In a similar fashion as above the user can create project-specific File filters, which will be stored together with the project and will be valid for the current project only.
和上面类似，用户可以创建项目专用文件过滤器，它和项目保存在一起并仅对当前项目有效。

In a similar fashion as above the user can create project-specific File filters, which will be stored together with the project and will be valid for the current project only. To create a project-specific set of file filters, click on the <g0>File filter ... </g0>button, then activate <g1>Enable project specific filters</g1> check box in the window that opens. A copy of the changed filters configuration will be stored with the project. To delete project specific file filters, uncheck the check box. Note that in the menu <g2>Options->File Filters</g2>, the global user filters are changed, not the project filters. See <l3>File Filters preferences</l3> for more on the subject.

和上述类似，用户可以创建项目专用的文件过滤器，这些过滤器将与项目一起存储，且仅对当前项目有效。要创建项目专用的文件过滤器集合，点击<g0>文件过滤器...</g0>按钮，然后在打开的窗口中激活<g1>允许项目专用过滤器</g1>复选框。更改后的过滤器配置的副本会随同项目一起存储。要删除项目专用文件过滤器，取消勾选此复选框。请注意，在菜单<g2>选项->文件过滤器</g2>中，将更改全局用户过滤器，而非项目的过滤器。有关此主题的更多信息，参见<l3>文件过滤器首选项</l3>。
In addition to Trados, however, several other CAT tools also support the "uncleaned RTF" format, notably Wordfast Classic.
然而，除了Trados之外，其他几种CAT工具也支持“不清晰的RTF”格式，特别是Wordfast Classic。
In addition to the plain text format, TBX format <i0/> is also supported as a read-only glossary format.
除了纯文本格式， <i0/> 也支持TBX格式的只读术语。

In addition to the plain text format, TBX format is also supported as a read-only glossary format. The location of the <f0>.tbx</f0> file must be within the <f1>/glossary</f1> folder, but it can be in a deeper folder (e.g., <f2>glossary/sub/MyGlossary.tbx</f2>).
除了纯文本格式，还支持将 TBX 格式作为只读词汇表格式。<f0>.tbx</f0> 文件的位置必须在 <f1>/glossary</f1> 文件夹内，但它可以位于更深的文件夹中（例如，<f2>glossary/sub/MyGlossary.tbx</f2>）。
In addition, if supported by the hardware and operating system (this is not always the case), a beep will sound.
此外，如果硬件以及操作系统支持（通常不会出现这种情况），会发出哔哔的提示音。
In addition, the package <a0>te-scripts.zip</a0> contains some very simple tcl/tk scripts which are intended to illustrate use of the function.
此外，文件包 <a0>te-scripts.zip</a0> 包含了一些非常简单的tcl/tk 脚本，旨在演示这一功能的用法。
In addition, two menu entries allow opening directly the current source and target documents and the writable glossary.
另外，两个菜单条目可直接打开源文档、目标文档以及可写术语表。

In addition, when the right click occurs on an opened segment, other options concerning <e12>Alternative translations</e12> are proposed, for example to to jump to another instance of non-unique segments.
另外，在打开的片段上右击，会出现<e12>替换译文</e12>的选项，例如跳转到若干片段中的另一个实例。
In all other cases no tag validation is done.
在其他情况下（即不使用此参数时）不会进行标签验证操作。
In an as-yet untranslated "External View" file, the target column is empty.
在尚未翻译的“外部视图”文件中，目标列是空的。
In both Firefox and Opera, this can be done by right-clicking in the translated .html file you have opened, then Reload every > select a desired interval (e.g. 5 seconds).
在Firefox和Opera中，你可以打开已翻译.html文件单击右键，重新加载选择所需间隔（例如5秒）。
In both cases, the project manager must send the translator their ID and password to access the repository.
两种情况下，项目经理都必须发给译者他们用来访问的存储库的 ID 和密码。
In both exact and keyword searches, the wild card search characters '*' and '?' can be used.
无论是精确还是关键词搜索，都可以使用通配符 '*' 和 '?'。
In both files, search for (matching the case) and replace:
在这两个文件中，搜索“匹配案例”并进行替换
In case no tokenizer exists for the current languages, OmegaT uses Hunspell instead (in that case, make sure that relevant Hunspell dictionaries are installed).
如果当前语言不存在分词器，OmegaT 会使用 Hunspell（在这种情况下，请确保安装了相关的 Hunspell 词典）。
In case of OmegaT complete project folders - in other words the translation memories involved as well as source folders, project settings etc - are managed by the selected RCS.
在OmegaT中完整的项目文件夹（即包含翻译记忆、源文件夹、项目设置等）都由所选的RCS进行管理。
In case of PO files, a 20% penalty applied to the alternative translation (i.e., a 100% match becomes an 80% match).
如果是PO文件，会对可选译文应用20%的罚点（即100%的匹配度变成80%）。
In case the file name has ambivalent name, one can apply variables of the form <l0>${name only</l0><e1>-extension number</e1>} and <l2>${extension</l2>-<e3>extension number} </e3>.
在文件名存在疑义的情况下，其中某个可以适用于<l0>${仅文件名</l0><e1>-扩展数字</e1>} and <l2>${扩展名</l2>-<e3>扩展数字} </e3>形式的变量。

In case there are non-unique segments in source documents, the Auto-propagation check box offers the user the following two possibilities as regards automatic translation: if checked, the first translated segment will be assumed as the default translation and its target text will be automatically used for later hits during the translation process.
源文档中包含非唯一片段时，自动传播翻译复选框为用户提供了下面两种类似自动翻译的功能：选中时，首次翻译的片段将被假定为默认翻译，其目标文本会自动用于以后翻译过程中的提示。

In case there are non-unique segments in source documents, the Auto-propagation check box offers the user the following two possibilities as regards automatic translation: if checked, the first translated segment will be assumed as the default translation and its target text will be automatically used for later hits during the translation process. Mistranslated segments can of course be corrected later manually using <g0>Create Alternative Translation</g0>. If the Auto-propagation check box is not checked, the segments with alternative translations are left untranslated until the user has decided which translation is to be used.

In order to create an empty set of rules for a new language pattern click <e0>Add </e0>in the upper half of the dialog. An empty line will appear at the bottom of the upper table (you may have to scroll down to see it). Change the name of the rule set and the language pattern to the language concerned and its code. The syntax of the language pattern conforms to regular expression syntax. If your set of rules handles a language-country pair, we advise you to move it to the top using the <e1>Move Up</e1> button.
若要为新的语言模式创建空的规则集，点击对话框上半部分的<e0>添加</e0>。上方表格的底部会出现一个空行（你可能需要向下滚动才能看到它）。将规则集的名称和语言模式更改为相关语言及其代码。语言模式的语法遵循正则表达式的语法规则。如果你的规则集处理的是语言-国家对，我们建议您使用<e1>上移</e1>按钮将其移到顶部。
In order to edit or expand an existing set of rules, simply click on it in the top table.
要编辑或扩展现有规则集合，仅需在上面的表格中打开它。

In some seldom cases the alternative, i.e. segmenting by paragraphs, may be preferred. Changing this flag does not modify the segmentation of already existing translation memories. If you decide mid-translation to switch from sentence to paragraph translation, the internal translation memory of the project will not be changed (OmegaT may upgrade old translation memories that did not use sentence segmentation, but not vice versa), but OmegaT will attempt to create paragraph fuzzy matches by gluing together existing sentence translations.
在一些少见情况下，替代方案，即按段落分割，可能会更好。更改此标志不会影响现有翻译记忆库中的片段。如果您在翻译中途决定从语句翻译切换至段落翻译，项目的内部翻译记忆库不会更改（OmegaT 可能会升级不使用语句分割的旧翻译记忆库，但反之则不然），但 OmegaT 会尝试通过组合现有的句子翻译来创建段落模糊匹配。

Initially, that is when the project is created, the main TM of the project, <f0>project_save.tmx</f0> is empty. This TM gradually becomes filled during the translation. To speed up this process, existing translations can be reused. If a given sentence has already been translated once, and translated correctly, there is no need for it to be retranslated. Translation memories may also contain reference translations: multinational legislation, such as that of the European Community, is a typical example.

By default, left justification is used for Left-To-Right (LTR) languages and right justification for Right-To-Left (RTL) languages. You can toggle between different display modes by pressing <k0> <k1>Shift</k1> <k2>Ctrl</k2> <k3>O</k3> </k0> (this is the letter O and not the numeral 0). Level 0:

Level 1 TMX files contain no formatting information.
Level 1 TMX 文件不包含任何格式信息。
Level 1:

Level 2 TMX files contain formatting information, but these files are typically only compatible when the same CAT tool is used.
Level 2 TMX 文件包含格式信息，但是这些 TMX 文件通常只有在同一 CAT 工具中才互相兼容。
Level 2 tmx files will still be imported and their textual content can be seen in OmegaT, but the quality of fuzzy matches will be somewhat lower.
支持导入级别 2 tmx 文件并在 OmegaT 中看到它们的文本信息，但模糊匹配的质量会有所下降。
Level 2:
级别 2：
Level 3 TMX files contain formatting information in a form that can be read by other CAT tools.
而 Level 3 TMX 文件所包含的格式信息，能被生成该文件的 CAT 工具之外的其他 CAT 工具读取。

Mac OS X has a feature called Gatekeeper that increases security by making it difficult to run unsigned programs.
Mac OS X 有一个叫做 Gatekeeper 的功能，该功能通过增加运行未签字程序的难度来增加安全性。

Mac OS X has a feature called Gatekeeper that increases security by making it difficult to run unsigned programs. OmegaT for Mac OS X is available in both signed and unsigned versions; they are functionally identical, but the signed version is preferred as it is recognized by the system as being published by a known developer.
Mac OS X 有一个叫做 Gatekeeper 的功能，该功能通过增加运行未签字程序的难度来增加安全性。适用于 Mac OS X 的 OmegaT 有签名和未签名两种版本；它们在功能上是完全相同的，但首选签名版本，因为系统会将其识别为由已知开发者发布。
Mac OS X users can convert directly from Office Open XML to OpenDocument Format and back in <a0>NeoOffice</a0>.
Mac OS X 用户可在 <a0>NeoOffice</a0> 中将 Office Open XML 与 OpenDocument 格式互相转换。
Mac OS X users, note: use <k0> <k1>Shift</k1> <k2>Ctrl</k2> <k3>O</k3> </k0> shortcut and <e4>not </e4>cmd+Ctrl+O.

Mac OSX users should install tcl/tk from their system media and Linux users should find it in their distribution's repository, if it is not already installed by default.

Mac users should instead use <k4> <k5>Cmd</k5> <k6>key</k6> </k4> instead.
Mac 用户应该使用 <k4> <k5>cmd</k5> <k6>键</k6> </k4> 来代替它。
Mac users should instead use the <g2>cmd+key.</g2> On Apple keyboards the <g3>cmd</g3> key either has a command label or an Apple icon on it.
Mac 用户则使用 <g2>cmd+key。</g2><g3>Cmd</g3> 键就是在苹果键盘上印有 "command" 或“苹果”符号的那个键。

Note that <f0>Remove</f0> physically removes the selected vocabularies. If they are used by some other application on your system, they will disappear from that application, too. If, for whatever reason, you need to do this from time to time, it may make sense to copy the files involved to a different folder, reserved just for use by OmegaT.

Note that all parameters start with a double - character.
请注意所有的参数都以两个 - 字符开始。
Note that all the tmx files in the /tm repository are parsed when the project is opened, so putting all different TMs you may have on hand into this folder may unnecessarily slow OmegaT down.
注意在程序启动时，/tm 仓库中的所有 TMX 文件将会被解析，因此将手头所有的 TMX 文件导入将会不必要地减慢 OmegaT 的运行。

Note that all the tmx files in the /tm repository are parsed when the project is opened, so putting all different TMs you may have on hand into this folder may unnecessarily slow OmegaT down. You may even consider removing those that are not required any more, once you have used their contents to fill up the <f0>project-save.tmx</f0> file.
请注意，在打开项目时会解析 /tm 仓库中的所有 tmx 文件，因此将手头各种翻译记忆库全放进此文件夹可能会不必要地拖慢 OmegaT。一旦已经用其内容填充了 <f0>project-save.tmx</f0> 文件后，你甚至可以考虑删除那些不再需要的文件。
Note that all the translation memories are loaded into memory when the project is opened.
注意：打开项目时会把所有的翻译记忆加载到内存中。
Note that bug reports and requests for enhancements are publicly visible, so you should not add any sensitive files.
需要注意的是：BUG 报告和改进要求是公开可见的，因此请不要将敏感文件加入其中。
Note that changes to the project setup may have some consequences, especially, when the project has already been started.
请注意对项目设置的变更可能已经产生结果，特别是在重新加载项目后。
Note that default segmentation rules and file filters can be overridden by project-specific setup (see above).
注意默认的分割规则和文件过滤器可以被项目专用设置所覆盖（见上文）。

Note that even after Word's settings have been changed so that it does not insert "nuisance" codes, for example for auto-hyphenation, such codes may still be present in the file and not removed by the change in configuration.
请注意，以为了不插入“干扰”代码（例如自动连字符），即使Word的设置已更改，此类代码仍可能存在于文件中，并且不会因配置更改而被删除。
Note that if you need or wish to use any of the launch command arguments (see above), you must use the normal installation.
请注意，如果您需要某个启动命令参数（见上文），就不得不使用正常安装。

请注意，除了“原文-译文”类型的词典之外，你还可以通过词典功能访问以下信息：
Note that in some cases changes in file filters in <a1>OmegaT</a1> may lead to totally different segmentation; as a result, you will have to upgrade your translation manually in such rare cases.
注意：修改<a1>OmegaT</a1>中的文件过滤器在某些情况下可能会导致完全不同的片段分割结构，结果在少数情况下您必须手动更新译文。
Note that in the above case, this is just half (or even less) of the story, as the target language (Slovenian) uses declension.
必须注意在这种情况中，到这里只说到一半（甚至更少），因为目标语言（斯洛文尼亚语）具有词形变化。

Note that in the above case, this is just half (or even less) of the story, as the target language (Slovenian) uses declension. So the inserted "pojavni meni" in the nominative form - has to be changed to "pojavnem meniju" , i.e. to the locative. So it is probably faster to type the term correctly right away without bothering with the glossary and its shortcuts.
注意在上面这个例子中，到此只把事情做了一半（甚至可能还不到一半），因为译文语言（斯洛文尼亚语）具有词形变化。所以插入的主格形式的“pojavni meni”必须改为“pojavnem meniju”，即方位格形式。所以抛开词汇表与其快捷方式而直接输入正确地输入词汇可能反而会更快。
Note that in the menu <g2>Options->File Filters</g2>, the global user filters are changed, not the project filters.
注意在<g2>选项->文件过滤器</g2>菜单中，修改的是全局用户过滤器而不是项目专用过滤器。
Note that it is easy to install multiple versions of OmegaT on Linux without conflicts.
请注意，在Linux上安装多个版本的OmegaT而没有发生冲突是很容易的。
Note that nothing but your source segment is sent to the MT service.
提示：除了源片段外，其他任何内容不会发送至机器翻译服务。
Note that only one TMX for a given language pair is possible, so if several translation memories should be involved, you will need to merge them all into the XX_YY.tmx.
请注意，对于指定的语言对只有一个TMX是可行的，所以当应该包含多个翻译记忆时您需要将它们全部合并到XX_YY.tmx。
Note that only two files are modified by OmegaT during translation:
请注意，在翻译期间，OmegaT 只修改两个文件：

注意：其他 CAT 也能导出（以及导入）TMX 文件，一般也有三种形式。
Note that the "Install" function requires an Internet connection.
请注意“安装”功能需要网络连接。
Note that the TMX files in the tm folder can be compressed with gzip.
注意在tm文件夹中的TMX文件可使用gzip压缩。
Note that the creator of the repository has implicitly the administrator rights for the repository created.
请注意版本库的创建者默认具有他所创建的版本库的管理权限。

请注意该密钥长度为 38 个字符。

请注意开标签总是出现在闭标签的前面：

要注意的是source子目录的结构完全由您决定。

需要注意的是团队成员必须先注册，您才能把他们添加到项目中（注意：在ProjectLocker的免费版本中每个项目只允许添加两个成员）。

请注意，由其他CAT工具提供的数据同OmegaT提供的数据之间可能存在细微差异。

请注意，这些数据是对项目中所涉及工作的较好（或尽可能好的）估计，因此可以作为您估算成本和价格的基础。

需要注意的是它们都是基于网络：您必须在线才能使用它们。
Note that this is not the same as "deleting" the formatting, which would cause the character formatting to revert to the document's default.
需要注意的是，这与“删除”格式不同，这会导致字符格式化恢复为文档的默认格式。

Note that you can reassign the shortcuts to your own preferences. See <l0>Appendix ShortCut Customization</l0>
请注意，您可以根据自己的偏好重新分配快捷键。参见《<l0>附录 快捷键自定义</l0>》
Note that you segments from order1, that are not present in order2 and other subsequent jobs, will be tagged as orphan segments; however, they will still be useful for getting fuzzy matches.

Note that you will need the ant program (<e0>http://ant.apache.org/bindownload.cgi</e0>) to build your own version of OmegaT.
请注意您还需要 ant 程序（<e0>http://ant.apache.org/bindownload.cgi</e0>）来编译 OmegaT。
Note: All of the segmentation rule sets with a matching Language Pattern are applied in the given order.
注：具有匹配语言模式的所有分割规则集按给定顺序应用。

Note: All of the segmentation rule sets with a matching Language Pattern are applied in the given order. Thus, for example, rules for Canadian French (FR-CA) should be higher than rules for French (FR.*), and higher than Default (.*) ones. Then while translating from Canadian French your project will use all the rules defined for all the language chain in the correct order.
注：具有匹配语言模式的所有分割规则集按给定顺序应用。 因此，例如，加拿大法语（FR-CA）的规则应当高于法语（FR.*）规则，而后者又高于默认（.*）规则。这样，当从加拿大法语进行翻译时，你的项目就会按照正确顺序应用整个语言链条上所定义的所有规则。
Note: All of the segmentation rule sets with a matching \
注意：和匹配语言模式一起设置的分割规则集合将会以给出的顺序应用。例如，为 Canadian French (FR-CA) 创建的规则优先级应该高于为法语 (FR.*) 创建的规则，也高于缺省规则(.*)。当对加拿大法语进行翻译时，您的项目将会以正确的顺序使用为此语言链定义的所有规则。

Note: DocBook files are recognized not only by file extension, but they also must have a DOCTYPE declaration: <!DOCTYPE book PUBLIC \"-//OASIS//DTD DocBook XML... for DocBook 4, or a Namespace: xmlns="http://docbook.org/ns/docbook" for DocBook 5
注：DocBook 文件并不仅根据文件扩展名识别，对于 DocBook 4 还需要有 DOCTYPE 声明：<!DOCTYPE book PUBLIC \"-//OASIS//DTD DocBook XML...，而对于 DocBook 5 则需要有命名空间：xmlns="http://docbook.org/ns/docbook"

of Infix to tags.

Note: Source File Encoding setting affects only the HHC and HHK files that \
注意：源文件编码设置只影响没有编码声明的 HHC 和 HHK 文件。对于有编码声明的 HHC 或 HHK 文件，将会忽略您在此对话框中设置的任何编码值。
Note: Source File Encoding setting affects only the HHC and HHK files that do not contain an encoding declaration.
注：原文文件编码设置只会影响不包含编码声明的 HHC 和 HHK 文件。

Note: Source File Encoding setting affects only the HHC and HHK files that do not contain an encoding declaration. If a HHC or HHK file has an encoding declaration, it will be used regardless of any value you specify in this dialog.
注：原文文件编码设置只会影响不包含编码声明的 HHC 和 HHK 文件。如果 HHC 和 HHK 文件中有编码声明，则将使用之，忽略你在此处设置的值。
Note: Source File Encoding setting affects only the HTML files that \
注意：源文件编码设置只影响内部没有编码声明的 HTML 文件。对于有编码声明的 HTML 文件，将会忽略您在此对话框中设置的任何编码值。
Note: Source File Encoding setting affects only the HTML files that have no encoding declaration inside.
注：原文文件编码设置只会影响内部没有编码声明的 HTML 文件。

Note: Source File Encoding setting affects only the HTML files that have no encoding declaration inside. If HTML file has the encoding declaration, it will be used disregarding any value you set in this dialog.
注：原文文件编码设置只会影响内部没有编码声明的 HTML 文件。如果 HTML 文件中有编码声明，则将使用之，忽略你在此处设置的值。
Note: colors are customizable through the <g0>Options / Custom colours...</g0> dialog.
提示：颜色可在 <g0>选项/个性化颜色</g0> 中定制。
Note: filenames (in first column) can be sorted alphabetically by clicking in the header.
提示：单击标题可将文件名（第一列）按字母顺序排序。
Note: if TMX is removed from /tm/auto before step 3, no extra Translation Unit is added.
提示：如果在步骤3之前，TMX已从/tm/auto文件夹移除，则不会添加额外的翻译单元。
Note: if TMX is removed from /tm/enforce before step 3, enforcements aren't kept at all.
提示：如果在步骤3之前，TMX已从/tm/auto文件夹移除，则强制执行不会被保存。
Note: in that case, <k1> <k2>Ctrl</k2> <k3>M</k3> </k1> can still be used, to force a Machine Translation call on an already translated segment.
提示：在上述情况中，<k1> <k2>Ctrl</k2> <k3>M</k3> </k1>仍可用来为已翻片段获取机器翻译。
Note: not all filters allow you to select an encoding.
注：并非所有过滤器都允许选择编码。

Note: the <f0>.tbx</f0> output of MultiTerm seems to not be reliable (November 2013), it is better to use the <f1>.tab</f1> output of MultiTerm instead.
注意：MultiTerm 所输出的 <f0>.tbx</f0> 似乎不太可靠（2013 年 11 月），建议改用 MultiTerm 的 <f1>.tab</f1> 输出。
Note: the segment marker displays <l0><segment nnnn +yy more> when the segment is non-unique.
提示：片段不唯一时，片段标记将显示<l0><段nnnn + yy 更多>。
Note: these two instructions can be combined by writing <u0>(<.*?>)|(\d+)</u0>.
注：可以通过写入 <u0>(<.*?>)|(\d+)</u0> 来组合这两个指令。

Nothing speaks against using Notepad++ on Windows, GEdit on Linux for instance or some spreadsheet program for this purpose: any application, that can handle UTF-8 (or UTF-16 LE) and that can show white space (so that you do not miss the required <k1>TAB</k1> characters) can be used.
在Windows平台上使用 Notepad++，在Linux平台上使用 GEdit， 或者用电子表格完成都是可以的：任何能处理 UTF-8 (或者UTF-16 LE) ，以及能能显示空格（你不会漏掉必要的 <k1>TAB</k1> 字符）的应用都可以使用。

Nothing, but quotes the following character. This is required if you would like to enter any of the meta characters !$()*+.<>?[\]^{|} to match as themselves.
不匹配任何内容，但会转义后继的字符。需要输入元字符 !$()*+.<>?[\]^{|} 之一来匹配其自身时就必须这样。

获取想要使用的字典的.dic和.aff文件，把这些文件放入此文件夹。
Occitan
奥克西唐语（Occitan）
Of course it is much wiser, to take a short break and download the correct versions of the spell checker.
当然，中断一小段时间并下载正确的拼写检查器版本的做法更加理智。
Of course, the encoding must be compatible with both the languages contained, so Unicode is recommended.
当然，编码必须和术语语言兼容，因此建议使用Unicode码。

Office Open XML can be converted directly to Open Document Format and back by means of the ODF converter, available <a0>here</a0>.
Office Open XML 既可直接转成开放文档格式开放文档格式（ODF），也可通过 ODF 转换器（在 <a0>此处</a0>获取）转回Office Open XML 。
Office Open XML can be converted directly to Open Document Format and back by means of the ODF converter, available <a0>here</a0>. This utility requires a version of MS Office (XP/2003/2007).
Office Open XML 可以直接转换为 OpenDocument 格式，然后通过可在<a0>此处</a0>获得的 ODF 转换器转回。此工具需要有某个版本的 MS Office（XP / 2003/2007）才能用。
Often documents will also have tags that have nothing to do with formatting, but which are also important in the source files (and in the translated files).
经常文档都会含有无需处理的格式标签，但它们对源文件（和已译文件）也很重要。

奥吉布瓦语（Ojibwe、Ojibwa）

tuv.seg: OmTdev
OmTdev
OmegaT
OmegaT
OmegaT - The Free Translation Memory Tool
OmegaT——免费的翻译记忆工具
OmegaT 3.0, Read Me file
OmegaT 3.0, 自述文件
OmegaT 4.0 or later
OmegaT 4.0或更高版本
OmegaT <s0>the free translation memory tool</s0>
OmegaT <s0>免费翻译记忆工具</s0>
OmegaT Download Selector
OmegaT 下载选择器
OmegaT Javadoc...
OmegaT Javadoc...
OmegaT Project Files
OmegaT 项目文件
OmegaT Project Folder
OmegaT 项目文件夹
OmegaT Screenshot
OmegaT 屏幕截图
OmegaT Team Projects
OmegaT 团队项目
OmegaT User Interface Language
OmegaT 用户界面语言
OmegaT allows to run scripts written in different scripting languages.
OmegaT 允许运行用不同脚本语言编写的脚本。
OmegaT allows you to do this by marking the characters/words that have a special formatting with easy-to-handle tags.
通过使用易于维护的 TAG 来标记拥有特殊格式的字符或单词，OmegaT 让您能够做到这一点。
OmegaT also backs up the translation memory to project_save.tmx.YEARMMDDHHNN.bak in the same subfolder each time a project is opened or reloaded.
OmegaT 在每次打开或重新载入项目时，也将翻译记忆备份到同一子目录下的 project_save.tmx.YEARMMDDHHNN.bak 文件中。

OmegaT also backs up the translation memory to project_save.tmx.YEARMMDDHHNN.bak in the same subfolder each time a project is opened or reloaded. YEAR is the 4-digit year, MM is the month, DD the day of the month, and HH and NN are the hours and minutes when the previous translation memory was saved.
OmegaT 在每次打开或者重新载入项目时也会将翻译记忆库备份到同一子目录下的 project_save.tmx.YEARMMDDHHNN.bak 文件。其中 YEAR 是 4 位数年份、MM 是月份、DD 是月份内的日期、而 HH 与 NN 是保存上一份翻译记忆库时的小时和分钟。
OmegaT also has the following mailing lists and trackers, which are hosted on Sourceforge:
OmegaT还有以下邮件列表与跟踪器，它们托管在 Sourceforge 上：
OmegaT automatically saves translations every 10 minutes as well as when you close the project or quit OmegaT.
OmegaT 每十分钟自动保存一次翻译，且在关闭项目或退出程序前自动保存。
OmegaT automatically selects a tokenizer for the source and the target language according to the language settings of the project.
OmegaT会根据项目语言设置中的源语言和目标语言自动选择相应的分词器。
OmegaT can align Java .properties in console mode.
OmegaT 可以在控制台模式中对齐 Java .properties。
OmegaT can also check for programming variables (printf-function variables) like '%s'.
OmegaT 还能检查如 %s 之类的程序变量（printf 函数变量）。
OmegaT can also check for programming variables (printf-function variables) like '%s'. Please select which behaviour is appropriate. Full checking can lead to false positives in normal texts.
OmegaT 还能检查如 %s 之类的程序变量（printf 函数变量）。请选择适当的行为。完整检查可能导致正常文本出现误报。
OmegaT can also check for programming variables (printf-function variables) like '%s'. \
OmegaT 还可以检查程序变量（printf函数变量），如%s。请选择适当的行为。完整检查可能导致正常文本的假阳性。
OmegaT can be customized to support other file formats as well.
还可以定制 OmegaT 来支持其它文件格式。
OmegaT can check that programming variables (like %s for instance) in the source exist in the translation.
OmegaT可以检查源文本中的程序变量如（%s）在译文中是否存在。
OmegaT can generate and store a master password so you don't have to enter it each time, but this is much less secure.
OmegaT 可以生成并存储主密码，因此您不必每次都输入密码，但这样做的安全性要低得多。
OmegaT cannot import or read glossary files in proprietary binary formats, such as Trados Multiterm.
OmegaT 不能读取专利性的二进制文件格式，如 Trados Multiterm。
OmegaT compatibility
OmegaT 兼容性
OmegaT configuration launchers (OmegaT.l4J.ini, omegat.kaptn and Configuration.properties) contain a template entry.
OmegaT的配置启动器（包括OmegaT.l4J.ini、omegat.kaptn和Configuration.properties）包含模板条目。
OmegaT currently requires version 1.6 of the JRE or later.
OmegaT 现要求 JRE 1.6 或更高版本。
OmegaT displays a list of all segments containing all of the words specified.
OmegaT 会显示所有词汇都出现了的片段清单。
OmegaT does not have an integral preview function, but it is possible to provide much the same functionality using additional software.
OmegaT 不提供整体预览功能，但是可以使用附加软件实现类似功能。.
OmegaT does not have read and write permissions to this folder.
OmegaT 对此文件夹无读写权限。
OmegaT does not have read and write permissions to this folder. Please select a different folder.
OmegaT 对此文件夹无读写权限。请另选一个文件夹。
OmegaT does not have to be launched from the command line, but doing so may be useful as it provides debugging information.
OmegaT 不一定要从命令行启动，但这样做可能很有用，因为它提供了调试信息。
OmegaT does not run satisfactorily on all versions of Java.
OmegaT并非在所有Java版本上都能运转地令人满意。
OmegaT does not support these formats directly.
OmegaT 不直接支持这些文件格式。

OmegaT does not support these formats directly. Instead, they must first be converted manually to Office Open XML (MS Office 2007/2010) or Open Document format (LibreOffice or OpenOffice.org) before they can be handled in OmegaT. (OmegaT is far from unique in this respect: many other CAT tools convert source files to a different format, in some cases in the background without the translator being aware of the fact, before they are translated.)

OmegaT 不直接支持这些文件格式。相反，必须先将这些文件手动转换成 Office Open XML（MS Office 2007/2010）或者 OpenDocument 格式（LibreOffice 或 OpenOffice.org）才能在 OmegaT 中处理。（OmegaT 在这方面远非独一无二：许多其他 CAT 工具在翻译人员进行翻译之前会将源文件转换为另一种格式，某些情况下这个过程是在后台进行的，翻译人员并不会意识到这一事实。）
OmegaT encrypts sensitive passwords and API keys with a master password.
OmegaT 用主密码来加密敏感密码和 API 密钥。
OmegaT exports version 1.4 TMX files (both level 1 and level 2).
OmegaT 导出 1.4 版本的 TMX 文件（包括级别 1 和级别 2）。

OmegaT exports version 1.4 TMX files (both level 1 and level 2). The level 2 export is not fully compliant with the level 2 standard, but is sufficiently close and will generate correct matches in other translation memory tools supporting TMX Level 2. If you only need textual information (and not formatting information), use the level 1 file that OmegaT has created.
OmegaT 导出版本 1.4 的 TMX 文件（级别 1 和级别 2 均有）。级别 2 的导出不完全符合级别 2 标准高，但已足够接近并且在其他支持 TMX 级别 2 的翻译记忆工具中会生成正确的匹配。如果你只需要文本信息（而非格式化信息），请使用 OmegaT 创建的级别 1 文件。
OmegaT features highly customizable filters, enabling you to configure numerous aspects.
OmegaT 的特色之一是可高度自定义过滤器，您可以配置众多的过滤器。
OmegaT follows very strict procedures when loading translation memory (tmx) files.
OmegaT在加载翻译记忆文件（TMX 文件）时遵循非常严格的过程。

OmegaT follows very strict procedures when loading translation memory (tmx) files. If an error is found in such a file, OmegaT will indicate the position within the defective file at which the error is located.
在加载翻译记忆库（tmx）文件时，OmegaT 遵循非常严格的流程。如果在这类文件中发现错误，OmegaT 将指示错误在问题文件中的位置。
OmegaT for Beginners tutorial
OmegaT 初学者教程

OmegaT for Mac OS X is available in both signed and unsigned versions; they are functionally identical, but the signed version is preferred as it is recognized by the system as being published by a known developer.
Mac OS X 上的 OmegaT 签名和未签名版都可用；他们在功能上相同，但首选签名版本，因为其是由已知开发者发布的。

OmegaT has a built-in spell checker based on the <l0>spelling checker</l0> used in Apache OpenOffice, LibreOffice, Firefox and Thunderbird. It is consequently able to use the huge range of free spelling dictionaries available for these applications.
OmegaT 有一个内置的拼写检查器，它基于 Apache OpenOffice、LibreOffice、Firefox 和 Thunderbird 中使用的<l0>拼写检查器</l0>。因此，它可以使用大量可用于这些程序的免费拼写词典。
OmegaT has a built-in spell checker based on the spelling checker used in Apache OpenOffice, LibreOffice, Firefox and Thunderbird.
OmegaT内置有拼写检查器，它基于在Apache OpenOffice、LibreOffice、Firefox和Thunderbird中使用的拼写检查器。

OmegaT has a built-in spell checker based on the spelling checker used in Apache OpenOffice, LibreOffice, Firefox and Thunderbird. It is consequently able to use the huge range of free spelling dictionaries available for these applications.
OmegaT内置有拼写检查器，它基于 Apache OpenOffice、LibreOffice、Firefox 和 Thunderbird 中使用的拼写检查器。因此，它可以使用大量可用于这些程序的免费拼写词典。
OmegaT has a presence on various social networks.
OmegaT 在各种社交网络上都有存在。
OmegaT has a very active, supportive and multilingual user group <a0>here</a0>, which users are strongly encouraged to join.
OmegaT拥有非常活跃，热情的多语言用户组<a0>这里</a0>, 强烈鼓励用户加入
OmegaT has a very active, supportive and multilingual user group. This is the <a0>recommended support channel</a0>, which users are strongly encouraged to join.
OmegaT 拥有非常活跃、极为支持的、多语言的用户组。强烈建议用户加入<a0>推荐的支持渠道</a0>。
OmegaT has an inline spelling checker.
OmegaT拥有内联拼写检查工具
OmegaT has been successfully installed on Windows (all versions from 98 onwards), Macintosh OS X and Linux.
OmegaT 已在 Windows（除 98 外的所有版本）、Micintosh OS X 及 Linux 上成功安装。
OmegaT has chosen option 'Yes' automatically.
OmegaT 已自动选择“是”选项。
OmegaT has detected a 3.6-style team project.
OmegaT 已探测到 3.6 风格的团队项目。

OmegaT has detected a 3.6-style team project.
Press 'OK' to convert the project into a 4.x-style team project. This will delete your local data and re-download the project contents from the server.
Press 'Cancel' to leave the project unmodified and load it as a local project without team functionality. (You will still able to use OmegaT 3.6 to edit this project as a team project.)

OmegaT 已探测到 3.6 风格的团队项目。
按“确定”将此项目转换为 4.x 风格的团队项目。 这将删除你的本地数据并从服务器重新下载项目内容。
按“取消”将保持项目不变，并将其作为没有团队功能的本地项目加载。 （你依然可以用 OmegaT 3.6 来将此项目作为团队项目编辑。）
OmegaT has file filters for both Open Document Format and for the Star Office format which it replaced.
无论是开放文档格式（ODF）还是它所替代的 Star Office format 格式，OmegaT 都有针对该格式的文件过滤器。
OmegaT has rudimentary support for XLIFF, and a procedure for using XLIFF in OmegaT in conjunction with the Rainbow tools can be found <a0>here</a0>.
OmegaT 对 XLIFF 有基础性支持, 通过OmegaT 与 Rainbow 工具协同使用 XLIFF， 可借助<a0>此程序</a0>。
OmegaT highlights
OmegaT 亮点
OmegaT identifies the source file encoding by using its encoding declaration, if present (HTML files, XML based files)
OmegaT 通过（HTML 文件、基于 XML 的文件中）可能存在的编码声明来识别源文件编码。
OmegaT identifies the source file encoding by using its encoding declaration, if present (HTML files, XML based files).
OmegaT 使用其编码声明（如果存在）来识别原文文件的编码（HTML 文件、基于 XML 的文件）。
OmegaT in the command line mode
以命令行模式运行 OmegaT
OmegaT inserts the translation of the string most similar to the current source, if it is above the similarity threshold that you have selected in this dialog.
OmegaT 将插入与当前源文本最相似译文字符串，前提是相似度高于在此对话框中设置的阈值。

OmegaT inserts the translation of the string most similar to the current source, if it is above the similarity threshold that you have selected in this dialog. The prefix (per default empty) can be used to tag translations, done via fuzzy matches. If you add a prefix (for instance [fuzzy]), you can trace those translations later to see they are correct.
OmegaT 将插入与当前原文最相似的字符串的译文，前提是相似度高于在此对话框中设置的阈值。可以使用前缀（默认为空）来标记通过模糊匹配插入的译文。如果添加了前缀（例如[模糊]），您可以稍后跟踪这些翻译检查它们是否正确。
OmegaT interfaces to SVN and Git, two common team software versioning and revision control systems (RCS), available under an open source license.
OmegaT为SVN和Git提供了界面，它们是在开源许可下提供的版本控制系统的两种常用协作软件。

OmegaT interfaces to SVN and Git, two common team software versioning and revision control systems (RCS), available under an open source license. In case of OmegaT complete project folders - in other words the translation memories involved as well as source folders, project settings etc - are managed by the selected RCS. see more in Chapter
OmegaT 可连接 SVN 和 Git，这是两种常见的以开源许可提供的团队软件版本与修订控制系统（RCS）。在 OmegaT 的情况下，完整的项目文件夹——换句话说，设计的翻译记忆库和原文文件夹、项目设置等——均由选定 RCS 管理。更多内容参见
OmegaT introduction tutorial
OmegaT 入门教程
OmegaT is a computer-assisted translation (CAT) tool.
OmegaT 是一种计算机辅助翻译（CAT）工具。

OmegaT is a free and open source multiplatform Computer Assisted Translation tool with fuzzy matching, translation memory, keyword search, glossaries, and translation leveraging into updated projects.
OmegaT 是自由且开源的多平台计算机辅助翻译工具，具有模糊匹配、翻译记忆、 关键字查找、词汇表、以及为更新后的项目自动套用翻译等特性。

OmegaT is a free and open source multiplatform Computer Assisted Translation tool with fuzzy matching, translation memory, keyword search, glossaries, and translation leveraging into updated projects.
OmegaT 是自由且开源的多平台计算机辅助翻译工具，具有模糊匹配、翻译记忆、关键字查找、词汇表、以及为更新后的项目自动套用翻译等特性。
OmegaT is a free, open-source translation memory program.
OmegaT是一款免费的开源翻译记忆程序。
OmegaT is able to recognize that you have done this.
OmegaT 可以识别出您已经翻译过了。
OmegaT is able to store translations that are identical to the source.
OmegaT 会保存等同于原文的译文。
OmegaT is also capable of reading glossaries in TBX, the industry-standard format for glossary files.
OmegaT 还能读取 TBX 格式的术语表，该格式是术语表文件的行业标准文件格式。
OmegaT is among the CAT tools for which this process can be used.
与众多CAT工具相比，OmegaT的一个特色就是具有上述文本转换的功能。
OmegaT is an open-source application and project.
OmegaT是一款开源的应用和项目。
OmegaT is available under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or (at your option) any later version.
OmegaT 根据自由软件基金会发布的 GNU 通用公共许可证许第 3 版或（根据您的选择）任何更高版本的条款提供。

OmegaT is available under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or (at your option) any later version. You can find the text of the license in /docs/OmegaT-license.txt.
OmegaT 根据自由软件基金会发布的 GNU 通用公共许可证许第 3 版或 （根据您的选择）任何更高版本的条款提供。你可以在此找到许可证的文本： /docs/OmegaT-license.txt
OmegaT is capable of handling the current Microsoft Office formats directly, without conversion to or from other formats.
OmegaT 能够直接处理当前的 Microsoft Office 格式，而无需转换为其他格式或从其他格式转换。
OmegaT is free software.
OmegaT是一款免费软件。
OmegaT is free software. That means that users like you are free to download and use it with very little in the way of restrictions. You are also free to copy it and pass it on to other people.
OmegaT 是一款自由软件。这意味着像您这样的用户可以免费下载并使用，只有极少的限制。你同样可以自由地将其复制并传给其他人。

OmegaT is generally observant of the conditions and tolerant of other tools' failure to observe them; should problems arise here, however, they can generally be resolved fairly easily by a search & replace in a text editor of the illegal character in the TMX file.
OmegaT 通常会遵守条件，而且也允许其他 CAT 工具不遵从这些条件; 不过，如果因此出现问题，一般可以在文本编辑器中查找和替换 TMX 文件中的非法字符，从而轻而易举地解决问题。
OmegaT is instructed to use a mandatory encoding for certain file formats (Java properties etc)
OmegaT 被设置为某些文件格式（Java 属性等）使用强制性编码。
OmegaT is instructed to use a mandatory encoding for certain file formats (Java properties etc).
OmegaT 被设置为对某些文件格式使用强制编码（Java 属性等）。
OmegaT is not particularly difficult to install or use, but it does require a willingness to read and follow the instructions.
OmegaT 的安装和使用都不复杂，但也需要阅读及遵循指示说明。

OmegaT is not particularly difficult to install or use, but it does require a willingness to read and follow the instructions. If you have a natural aversion to reading instructions, and your approach to new software is to click on every button you see until something resembling the desired effect occurs, then OmegaT is probably not suitable for you.
OmegaT 的安装或使用并不是特别困难，但确实需要阅读并遵循说明。如果您对阅读说明有一种天生的厌恶，并且您对新软件的处理方法是点击您看到的每个按钮，直到出现类似于所需效果的东西，那么 OmegaT 可能不适合您。
OmegaT is not yet able to detect mistakes in formatting fully automatically, so it will not prompt you if you make an error or change formatting to fit your target language better.
OmegaT 目前还无法自动检测格式错误，因此如果犯了错误或者改变格式以更好适应您使用的目标语言时，它不会对您作任何提示。
OmegaT is open-source software.
OmegaT 是一款开源软件。

OmegaT is open-source software. That means that if you feel so inclined, you may modify OmegaT to suit your own requirements. For advocates of open-source software, this freedom is even more important than the exemption from having to pay anything.
OmegaT 是开源软件。这意味着如果您想，可以修改 OmegaT 以满足您自己的要求。对于开源软件的拥护者来说，这种自由比免于付费更重要。
OmegaT is refused access to the system property containing the name of your OS and/or the system property containing your home folder.
OmegaT 无法访问包含操作系统名称的系统属性和/或 包含你的主文件夹的系统属性。

OmegaT is refused access to the system property containing the name of your OS and/or the system property containing your home folder. Therefore, the location of OmegaT's configuration folder cannot be reliably determined. The current folder will be used instead. As a result of this, all settings will be at their defaults, due to which you may experience unexpected, but correct behaviour.
OmegaT 无法访问包含操作系统名称的系统属性和/或 包含你的主文件夹的系统属性。因此，无法可靠地确定 OmegaT 的配置文件夹位置。将改用当前文件夹。 这样的结果是所有设置都将处于其默认值，因此你可能 会遇到意外但正确的行为。
OmegaT is refused access to the system property containing\n\
OmegaT 被拒绝访问包含操作系统名称和主文件夹的系统属性。因此，无法可靠确定 OmegaT 的配置文件夹。将使用当前文件夹来替代。由此，所有的设置都会使用缺省值，这是由于您可能遇到异常，但却是正常的行为。
OmegaT is supplied as a package that can be downloaded from SourceForge.
OmegaT 是以可以从 SourceForge 下载的安装包的形式提供的。
OmegaT is supplied ready-compiled for a number of platforms, including a cross-platform version.
OmegaT是为许多平台提供的现成编译版本，包括跨平台版本。
OmegaT is supplied with a comprehensive user manual.
OmegaT 提供了一份全面详细的用户手册。
OmegaT is supplied with a comprehensive user manual. To call up the manual from within OmegaT, simply select Help > Users manual, or press F1.
OmegaT 附带有全面详细的用户手册。要从 OmegaT 中调出手册，只需选择“帮助 > 用户手册”即可，或按 F1。
OmegaT is the original work of Keith Godfrey.
OmegaT 最初的工作由 Keith Godfrey 完成。
OmegaT is then ready to be launched.
然后 OmegaT 就已就位，可以运行了。
OmegaT is tolerant when reading TMX files: it will accept files with en-GB, en-US, en, EN, etc.
OmegaT 读取 TMX 文件时容忍度很高：它支持用en-GB, en-US, en, EN等语言编码的文件。
OmegaT is written in Java.
OmegaT采用Java编程语言。
OmegaT isn't just a product; it's an exciting project, and you can be part of it.
OmegaT不仅是一款产品；它是一个激动人心的项目，你可以参与其中。
OmegaT leaves the editing field blank.
OmegaT把编辑字段留空

OmegaT leaves the editing field blank. This option allows you to enter the translation without the need to remove the source text, thus saving you two keystrokes (<e0>Ctrl+A </e0>and <e1>Del). </e1> Empty translations are now allowed. They are displayed as <EMPTY> in the Editor. To create one, right-click in a segment, and select "<e2>Set empty translation</e2>". The entry <e3>Remove translation</e3> in the same pop up menu also allows to delete the existing translation of the current segment. You achieve the same by clearing the target segment and pressing <g4>Enter.</g4>

OmegaT 将把编辑字段留空。该选项允许您直接输入翻译而无需删除原文文本，因此省掉了两次按键（<e0>Ctrl+A</e0> 和 <e1>Del</e1>）。现在还允许译文为空。它们在编辑器中显示为<空>。要创建空译文，在片段中点击右键并选择“<e2>设置为空译文</e2>”。在同一个弹出菜单中的<e3>移除译文</e3>还可以用来删除当前片段的现有译文。通过清除译文片段并按下<g4>回车</g4>可以实现相同的效果。

OmegaT 需要您的系统安装有 Java 运行环境（JRE）1.8 或者更高版本。

只要操作系统能运行适当版本的 Java Runtime Environment (JRE) ，那 OmegaT 就能在该操作系统上运行。

OmegaT 可在任何可以运行合适版本的 Java 运行环境（JRE）的操作系统上运行。目前，这包括从 Windows 98 开始的所有版本的Microsoft Windows、Mac OS X 和大多数 Linux 发行版。

OmegaT 设置
OmegaT shares this problem with other CAT tools that handle the .docx format, and the solutions are similar or the same.
OmegaT与处理.docx格式的其他CAT工具共享此问题，并且解决方案相似或相同。
OmegaT stores your translations and proposes possible translations from similar segments in registered in the translation memory files.
OmegaT 保存译文，并根据译法记忆文件中已有的相似片段给出可能的译文，以供参考。
OmegaT supports all current versions of TMX, but is likely to deliver better match results if the TMX file is version 1.4b.
OmegaT 支持当前所有版本的TMX，不过 TMX 文件版本为1.4b 时，产生的匹配结果更好。
OmegaT supports imported tmx versions 1.1-1.4b (both level 1 and level 2).
OmegaT 支持导入 tmx 的 1.1-1.4b 版本（包括级别 1 和级别 2）。

OmegaT supports imported tmx versions 1.1-1.4b (both level 1 and level 2). This enables the translation memories produced by other tools to be read by OmegaT. However, OmegaT does not fully support imported level 2 tmx files (these store not only the translation, but also the formatting). Level 2 tmx files will still be imported and their textual content can be seen in OmegaT, but the quality of fuzzy matches will be somewhat lower.
OmegaT 支持导入 tmx 版本 1.1-1.4b（级别 1 和级别 2 都可）。这使得OmegaT 可以读取其他工具生成的翻译记忆库。但是，OmegaT 并不完全支持导入级别 2 的 tmx 文件（不仅存储翻译，还存储格式）。级别 2 的 tmx 文件依然会被导入，在 OmegaT 中能看到其文本内容，但模糊匹配的质量会有所下降。
OmegaT supports language codes in the format "xx", "XX", "xx-YY" and "XX-YY", where xx or XX is the language, yy or YY the region.
OmegaT 支持 "xx", "XX", "xx-YY" and "XX-YY"这些格式的语言编码，其中xx 或者 XX 表示语言, yy 或者 YY 表示地区。

OmegaT支持两种流行的版本控制系统（简写为VCS）：<u0>Apache Subversion</u0>（在命令名称svn后常被简称为SVN）和<u1>Git</u1>。

OmegaT uses the standard tmx file format to store and access translation memories, which guarantees that you can exchange your translation material with other CAT applications supporting this file format.
OmegaT 使用标准 TMX 文件格式存储和存取翻译记忆库，这确保了您可以将翻译材料与其他支持此文件格式的 CAT 工具进行交换。
OmegaT uses translation memories to store your previous translations and then suggest likely translations for the text you are currently working on.
OmegaT 使用译法记忆文件存储完成的翻译，然后根据您当前翻译的文本，给您提供相似的译文作为参考。

OmegaT will automatically parse even the most complex source folder hierarchies, to access all the supported files, and produce a target folder with exactly the same structure, including copies of any non-supported files.
即便是遭遇结构极其复杂的原文目录，OmegaT 也可以自动分析，访问所有支持的文件，制作一个结构完全相同且包含所有未支持文件的译文目录。

OmegaT will now run on the OpenJDK Java implementation supplied with some Linux distributions, but some functions (such as the full set of command-line options) may not be available; a different font set may be supplied; and some glitches have been reported, such as with window display and the segmentation function.
OmegaT现在将运行在由某些Linux发行版提供的OpenJDK Java实现上，但某些功能（如全套命令行选项）可能不可用；可能提供不同的字型集；已经报错了一些小故障，如窗口显示和分段功能。

OmegaT会识别出团队项目，并在缺省的情况下每隔三分钟自动同步所有内容。
OmegaT will run on any system on which the JRE (Java Runtime Environment) has been or can be installed.

OmegaT will run on any system on which the appropriate JRE (Java Runtime Environment) has been or can be installed. The JRE is now supplied with OmegaT and need not be obtained separately. OmegaT has been successfully installed on Windows (all versions from 98 onwards), Macintosh OS X and Linux.
OmegaT 可在任何已安装或可安装相应 JRE（Java 运行环境）的系统上运行。OmegaT 现在自带 JRE，无需单独获取。OmegaT 已在 Windows（从 98 开始的所有版本）、Micintosh OS X 及 Linux 上成功安装。

另一方面，该功能在特殊情况下可能非常有用，您可以针对需要翻译的文本设置分割规则来提高生产力。
On the ribbon, check Show Developer tab and confirm with OK.

用warn则打印错误且OmegaT继续执行。
Once <a0>OmegaT</a0> is installed, you can click on <e1><a2>OmegaT</a2>.jar</e1> to launch it directly or you can launch it directly from the command line.
一旦安装好 <a0>OmegaT</a0>，您可以通过点击 <e1><a2>OmegaT</a2>.jar</e1> 或者从命令行启动它。

Once <a0>OmegaT</a0> is installed, you can launch it directly from the command line, you can create a script that includes launch parameters for the command line or you can click on <e1><a2>OmegaT</a2>.jar</e1> to launch it directly.
安装好 <a0>OmegaT</a0> 后，可直接在命令行中通过包含命令行启动参数的脚本启动，或直接点击 <e1><a2>OmegaT</a2>.jar</e1> 启动它。
Once Priorview has been launched, however, you cannot select a different browser or conversion utility; these options are therefore hidden after launch.
Priorview一旦启动，你无法选择其他浏览器或转换实用程序；因此这些选项在启动后隐藏。
Once a user has formulated a proposed change or enhancement to OmegaT, a defined procedure exists for its submission to the development team for consideration.
一旦用户提出了对OmegaT的更改或增强建议，就会有一个明确的程序提交给开发团队考虑。

Once computed, the data also available in <f6>omegat/project_stats_match.txt.</f6> Note that the file is time-stamped, as the calculation (contrary to the standard statistics) is not instantaneous and can thus quickly become obsolete.
在计算后，该数据还可以在 <f6>omegat/project_stats_match.txt</f6> 中找到。需要注意的是该文件是有时间戳记录的，因为计算不是瞬时的（相对于统计），所以可能很快过时。
Once the <f0>MainMenuShortcuts.properties</f0> file is modified, <a1>OmegaT</a1> must be relaunched to take the new shortcuts into account.
修改 <f0>MainMenuShortcuts.properties</f0> 文件后，必须重新启动 <a1>OmegaT</a1> 才能让新的快捷键生效。
Once the SVN server is available, project managers must locally install a SVN client, in order to manage the project contents on their computers.
有了SVN服务器，那么项目管理员需要在本地安装SVN客户端用来管理电脑上的项目内容。

Once the SVN server is available, project managers must locally install a SVN client, in order to manage the project contents on their computers. For Windows we recommend <u0>TortoiseSVN</u0>. For Mac you can download the client for instance from <u1>SourceForge</u1>, For Linux see <u2>Subversion Commands and Scripts</u2>.
有了 SVN 服务器后，项目经理必须在本地安装 SVN 客户端，以便在他们的计算机上管理项目内容。对于 Windows，我们建议使用 <u0>TortoiseSVN</u0>。对于Mac，您可以从诸如 <u1>SourceForge</u1> 之类的地方下载客户端；对于 Linux，请参阅 <u2>Subversion 命令和脚本</u2>。
Once the archive has been extracted, a folder containing the following contents is created:
解压缩后将创建一个包含下列内容的目录：
Once the operation has finished, you can check the said folder: it should now contain a subfolder .svn and a green OK badge on its icon will show, that the contents of the folder are up-to-date:
操作完成后，您可以检查刚才所说的目录：现在它应该包含.svn子文件夹且图标上含有绿色的就绪标记，这表示该文件夹的内容是最新的。
Once the project is set up on the server, the project manager can invite the translator to work on it in either of two different ways:
一旦项目在服务器上建立好之后，项目经理可以邀请译者在其上工作，两种方式任选其一：
Once the team project is setup, team members only need <a0>OmegaT</a0> to access the team project.
建立团队项目后，团队成员只需<a0>OmegaT</a0>就能访问团队项目。

Once the team project is setup, team members only need <a0>OmegaT</a0> to access the team project. First, they need to use <g1>Project > Download Team Project</g1>. This will actually do a checkout of the project in a local folder. Credentials are stored, so it isn't needed to enter them each time. Under Linux, if <a2>OmegaT</a2> is still asking for your credentials, you can checking the <g3>Force saving password as plain text</g3> checkbox.
设置好团队项目后，团队成员只需要 <a0>OmegaT</a0> 即可访问团队项目。首先，需要使用 <g1>项目 > 下载团队项目</g1>​​。这实际上会在本地文件夹中检出项目。凭据会被保存起来，因此无需每次都输入。在 Linux 下，如果 <a2>OmegaT</a2> 依然要求输入凭据，则可以选中<g3>强制将密码保存为纯文本</g3>复选框。

Once this has been copied or linked to your execution path (done automatically if you use the installation script provided), you can launch OmegaT by hitting <i0>Alt+F2</i0>, then typing in <i1>omegat</i1> and conforming with ENTER.
一旦该脚本被复制或链接到执行路径（如果你使用提供的安装脚本则会自动完成），可以通过点击<i0> Alt + F2 </ i0>然后键入<i1> omegat </ i1>来启动OmegaT >，之后敲击 ENTER 来确认。
Once you have activated the service, a suggestion for the translation will appear in the Machine Translate pane every time a new source segment is opened.
当您激活了该服务后，每次打开新的源片段时，其对应的翻译建议将会出现在机器翻译窗格中。
Once you have done this, you can delete the <e5>OmegaT_3.n.n_Mac.zip</e5> file, it is no longer needed.

当您确定在翻译中没有标签错误后，按下<k0>Ctrl+D</k0>则会在项目文件夹的<f1>/target/</f1>子文件夹中生成目标文件。

Only a limited number of file formats specify a mandatory encoding.
仅少量文件格式必须指定强制性的编码方式。

Only a limited number of file formats specify a mandatory encoding. File formats that do not specify their encoding will use the encoding you set up for the extension that matches their name. For example, by default <l0>.txt</l0> files will be loaded using the default encoding of your operating system. You can change the source encoding for each different source filename pattern. Target files can also be written in any encoding. By default, the translated file encoding is the same as the source file encoding. The source and target encoding fields use drop-down menus containing all the supported encodings. <auto> leaves the choice of encoding to <a1>OmegaT</a1>. This is how it works:

仅有少量文件格式指定强制编码。未指定编码的文件格式将使用您为其文件扩展名所设置的编码。例如，默认情况下 <l0>.txt</l0> 文件会使用操作系统的默认编码加载。你可以更改每个不同的原文文件名模式的原文编码。译文文件也可以用任意编码编码。默认情况下，已译文件的编码与原文文件编码相同。原文与译文的编码字段使用的是包含所有支持的编码的下拉菜单。<自动>则会让 <a1>OmegaT</a1> 来选择编码。这是它的工作原理：
Only activate this option if you know what you are doing, and only for projects from trusted sources.

Other formatted text file types may also be handled by OmegaT by associating their file extensions to a supported file type, assuming that the corresponding segmentation rules will segment them correctly.

Paragraph segmentation is advantageous in certain cases, such as highly creative or stylistic translations in which the translator may wish to change the order of entire sentences; for the majority of projects, however, sentence segmentation is a choice to be preferred, since it delivers better matches from previous translations.
在某些情况中使用段落分割是有好处的，例如在与创造性和文学性高度相关的翻译中，译员可能需要改变整个段落的顺序；然而，对于大多数项目，应优先选择句子分割，因为这样可以与以前的翻译实现更好的匹配。
Paragraph segmentation is less frequently used, but can be useful in cases of so-called "creative" texts.
根据段落分割片段使用较少，但处理“创意类”文本时可提高翻译效率。
Paragraph segmentation on line breaks, empty lines or never:

Place the dictionary files you wish to use in this folder. There are essentially two ways in which you can do this. You can either copy files manually, i.e. from elsewhere on your system, using your file manager; or you can use OmegaT's <e0>"Install new dictionary"</e0> function to provide a list of available dictionaries to select from. Note that the "Install" function requires an Internet connection. The selected languages will then be installed and will eventually appear in your spell checker setup window (this may take a while).
将要使用的词典文件放到此文件夹中。基本上有两种方法可以做到这一点。您可以用文件管理器从系统中其他位置手动复制文件，或使用 OmegaT 的<e0>“安装新词典”</e0>功能来提供可选择的词典列表。请注意“安装”功能需要因特网连接。随后选中的语言将会安装，并最终显示在拼写检查器窗口中（可能需要一段时间）。

Plain text files - in most cases files with a txt extension - contain just textual information and offer no clearly defined way to inform the computer which language they contain.
纯文本文件（在大多数情况下扩展名为 txt）只包含了文本信息，目前还没有明确的办法告诉计算机该文件包含了何种语言的内容。
Plain text files contain text only, so their translation is as simple as typing the translation.
纯文本文件中只含有文本，因为对它们的翻译工作就像输入翻译一样简单。

Projects can be managed according to your development style and needs.
您可以根据自己的开发风格和需求管理项目。

Projects can be managed according to your development style and needs. Similar as in the case of OmegaT projects, you will need to have separate repositories for different language pairs. Within a given language pair it is best to keep different subjects and/or clients as separate repositories as well. The alternative is to have one single repository with subfolders <l0>Project1</l0>, <l1>Project2</l1>, etc., and share the common material via common <l2>tm</l2>, <l3>glossary</l3> and <l4>dictionary</l4> folders.

可以根据您的开发风格和需求来管理项目。与 OmegaT 项目类似，您需要为不同的语言对提供各自的存储库。在给定的语言对中，最好同样保持不同的主题和/或客户分处单独的存储库。另一种方法是让单个存储库中包含子文件夹 <l0>Project1</l0>、<l1>Project2</l1> 等，并通过公用的 <l2>tm</l2>、<l3>glossary</l3> 和 <l4>dictionary</l4> 文件夹来共享公共资料。

RTF (Rich Text Format):
RTF（Rich Text Format，富文本格式）：

RTF is structurally quite different from the Microsoft Office 98-2003 file format, but with regard to OmegaT, the same applies: it is not supported directly and must first be converted to .docx (MS Office 2007/2010) or Open Document format (LibreOffice/OpenOffice.org).
RTF 在结构上与 Microsoft Office 98-2003 文件格式完全不同，但是对于 OmegaT 而言状况是一样的：不直接支持，必须首先转换为 .docx（MS Office 2007/2010）或 OpenDocument 格式（ LibreOffice/OpenOffice.org）。

Remove leading and trailing tags
删除首尾的标签
Remove leading and trailing tags: uncheck this option to display all the tags including the leading and trailing ones.
删除首尾的标签：不选此选项来展示所有的标签包含首尾的标签。

Remove leading and trailing tags: uncheck this option to display all the tags, including tags at the beginning and end of the segment. Warning: in Microsoft Open XML formats (docx, xlsx, etc.), if all tags are displayed, DO NOT place any text before the first tag – it is a technical tag that must always begin the segment.
删除开头和末尾的标签：取消勾选此选项可以显示所有标签，包括在片段开头和结尾处的标签。警告：在 Microsoft Open XML 格式中（docx、xlsx 等等），如果显示所有标签，不要在第一个标签之前放置任何文本——它是个技术性标签，必须始终是开启段落的标签。
Remove leading and trailing whitespace in non-segmented projects
在未分段的项目中删除首尾的空白字符。
Remove leading and trailing whitespace in non-segmented projects: by default, OmegaT removes leading and trailing whitespace.
在未分段的项目中删除首尾的空白字符：默认情况，OmegaT删除首尾空白字符。

Remove leading and trailing whitespace in non-segmented projects: by default, OmegaT removes leading and trailing whitespace. In non-segmented projects, it is possible to keep it by unchecking this option.
删除非分割项目中开头和末尾的空白字符：默认情况下，OmegaT 会删除开头和末尾的空白字符。在非分割项目中，可以通过取消勾选此项选来保留之。

Right-clicking on an underlined word (Artund in the figure above) opens a drop-down menu listing suggestions for the correction (Art und). You can also instruct the spell checker to ignore all the occurrences of the mis-spelled word, or add it to the dictionary.

Scope: The scope of a search is by default the project and can be set to be any files located in a specified folder hierarchy.
范围： 默认情况下，查找范围是整个项目，但可以设置为位于指定文件夹层次结构中的所有文件。

Scope: The scope of a search is by default the project and can be set to be any files located in a specified folder hierarchy. Project searches are by default performed on the source and target, reference TMs, glossaries, notes and comments of the project.
Types: Exact searches match the whole search string. Keyword searches match all the space-separated keywords regardless of their order. Regular expression searches match Java regular expressions as documented in the user manual.
Wildcards: Both exact and keyword searches support the wildcard characters * and ?. '*' matches zero or more characters ('run*' matches 'run', 'runs', and'running', etc.) '?' matches exactly one character ('run?' matches 'runs' and 'rung', but not 'run' or 'running').
Text Replace: The scope of a text replacement is the target segments of the project, whether they already have contents or not. Keyword searches are not available in the search string. When using regular expressions, the replacement string supports references to groups defined in the search string. Use $n to refer to the nth group.

范围： 默认情况下，查找范围是整个项目，但可以设置为位于指定文件夹层次结构中的所有文件。 默认情况下，项目查找是在项目的原文、译文、参考翻译记忆库、词汇表、备注、和注释中进行的。
类型： 精确查找完全匹配整个查找字符串。 关键字查找会匹配以空格分隔的所有关键字，无视顺序。 正则表达式查找则以用户手册中所记载的 Java 正则表达式来进行匹配。
通配符： 精确查找和关键字查找都支持通配符 * 和 ?。 “*” 匹配零个或若干个字符（“run*”匹配“run”、“runs”、和“running”，等等） “?” 匹配单个字符（“run?”匹配“runs”和“rung”，但不匹配“run”或“running”）。
文本替换： 文本替换的范围是项目的译文片段，无论这些片段是否已经有了译文。 在查找字符串中关键字查找不可用。 当使用正则表达式时，替换字符串支持引用查找字符串中所定义的组。用 $n 来引用第 n 个组。
Scope:\n\

可以在源、翻译或注释中进行搜索。 
在当前项目或某个文件夹或文件夹结构中的搜索完成。 
精确搜索查找整个指定的查询字符串。 
关键字搜索将指定的查询字符串视为一系列搜索关键字（由空格分隔），并返回所有以任何顺序包含这些关键字的片段。 
两种搜索都支持通配符 * 和 ?。字符 '*' 匹配零个或多个字符串（例如：搜索条件 'run*' 将会匹配 'run'、 'runs' 和 'running'）。字符 '?' 匹配任何单个的字符串（例如 'run?' 将会匹配 'runs' 和 'rung'，但是不匹配 'run' 或 'running'）。

Sentence level segmentation
语句级分割
Separates the source text into segments.
将源文本分割为片段。

Separates the source text into segments. For example, "<e0>Did it make sense? I was not sure</e0>." should be split into two segments. For this to happen, there should be a break rule for "?", when followed by spaces and a capitalized word. To define a rule as a break rule, tick the Break/Exception check box.
将原文文本分割为片段。例如，“<e0>Did it make sense? I was not sure</e0>.”应当分割为两个片段。要做到这一点，应该有一个断句规则，针对“?”，同时后面要跟着空格和一个首字母大写的单词。要将一条规则定义为断句规则，请勾选断句/例外复选框。

Should you wish to reuse a translation memory from a previous project (for example because the new project is similar to the previous project, or uses terminology which might have been used before), you can use these translation memories as "input translation memories", i.e. for import into your new project.
如果希望复用之前某个项目的翻译记忆（例如新的项目与之前的项目非常相似，或者使用了之前可能用到的术语），您可以将这些用法记忆用作“输入翻译记忆”，也就是说导入您的新项目。

Should you wish to reuse a translation memory from a previous project (for example because the new project is similar to the previous project, or uses terminology which might have been used before), you can use these translation memories as "input translation memories", i.e. for import into your new project. In this case, place the translation memories you wish to use in the <e0>/tm</e0> or <e1>/tm</e1>/auto folder of your new project: in the former case you will get hits from these translation memories in the fuzzy matches viewer, and in the latter case these TMs will be used to pre-translate your source text.

如果希望重用过往项目的翻译记忆库（例如，因为新项目与之前的项目类似，或者使用之前可能用过的术语），您可以将这些翻译记忆库用作“输入翻译记忆库”，即导入您的新项目中。在这种情况下，将想要使用的翻译记忆库放在新项目的 <e0>/tm</e0> 或 <e1>/tm</e1>/auto 文件夹中：前一种情况下，会在模糊匹配查看器中看到来自于这些翻译记忆库的匹配，而后一种情况下，这些翻译记忆库将用于对原文文本进行预翻译。

Since it is a standard, an advantage of XLIFF is that file filters provided by one CAT tool vendor for conversion between a certain format and XLIFF (and, following completion of the translation workflow, back again) can in theory be used to prepare files in the format concerned for translation in any CAT tool capable of supporting XLIFF.
因为 XLIFF 是行业标准，所以它的一大优势就是，一个 CAT 工具供应商所提供的某文件格式与 XLIFF 之间的文件转换器(并且按照翻译流程的完整性，从 XLIFF 转换回该文件格式) 理论上也可以在任意一款支持 XLIFF 的 CAT 工具中用于该格式相关文件的准备。
Since it is standard procedure for professional translators to receive and deliver texts in digital form, users of OmegaT are naturally interested in its compatibility with other software products.
按照标准流程，专业译员收发的是电子形式的文本，所以 OmegaT 用户很关心它与其他软件产品的兼容性

Since it is standard procedure for professional translators to receive and deliver texts in digital form, users of OmegaT are naturally interested in its compatibility with other software products. This HOWTO aims to provide information in this area.
对于专业翻译人员而言，以数字形式收发文本是标准流程，因此 OmegaT 的用户自然会关心其与其他软件产品的兼容性。本指南旨在提供该领域的信息。
Since tags are included in the text itself, it is possible to use segmentation rules to create segments with fewer tags.
因为标签包含在文本自身里面，因此可以使用片段规则来创建包含更含更少标签的片段。
Since the project's inception, it has received the support of dozens of other contributors, too numerous to mention here, but for whose help we are very grateful.
自项目启动以来，它已经得到了许多其他贡献者的支持，人数太多在此无法全部列出，但我们非常感激他们的帮助。
Since these are inconvenient during translation, it is worthwhile trying to remove these nuisance tags before beginning translation in OmegaT.
由于这些在翻译过程中不方便，因此在开始OmegaT翻译之前，尝试去除这些令人讨厌的标签是值得的。
Since version 2.0.1, OmegaT has had a text export function.
自2.0.1版本开始，OmegaT加入了文本导出功能。

Some CAT tools solve this problem, at least for MS Word, by working within Word itself; most other CAT tools convert to RTF and back, often invisibly for the translator.
有些 CAT 工具通过在 Word 软件自身内工作来克服这个问题，至少对于 MS Word 而言克服了；大部分其他 CAT 工具只能先将其转换成 RTF 处理再转回，此过程通常对于翻译人员是不可见的。
Some CAT tools still employ dedicated proprietary translation memory formats, but virtually all support the import and export of TMX files.

Some devices are designed to deny users access to install or run modified versions of the software inside them, although the manufacturer can do so. This is fundamentally incompatible with the aim of protecting users' freedom to change the software. The systematic pattern of such abuse occurs in the area of products for individuals to use, which is precisely where it is most unacceptable. Therefore, we have designed this version of the GPL to prohibit the practice for those products. If such problems arise substantially in other domains, we stand ready to extend this provision to those domains in future versions of the GPL, as needed to protect the freedom of users.

Some tools are known to produce invalid tmx files under certain conditions. If you wish to use such files as reference translations in OmegaT, they must be repaired, or OmegaT will report an error and fail to load them. Fixes are trivial operations and OmegaT assists troubleshooting with the related error message. You can ask the user group for advice if you have problems.
已知一些工具会在某些条件下生成无效的 tmx 文件。如果你想在 OmegaT 中使用这类文件作为参考译文，则必须对其进行修复，否则 OmegaT 将报错并无法加载它们。修复是微小的操作，OmegaT 会用相关错误信息协助进行错误排除。如果遇到问题，可以向用户组咨询。
Some types of source files (for instance PO, TTX, etc.) are bilingual, i.e. they serve both as a source and as a translation memory.
某些类型的源文件（例如PO、TTX等）是双语文件，即它们即作为源文件又作为翻译记忆。
Something went wrong, please visit Tilde Terminology for details.
出了点问题，请访问 Tilde Terminology 以了解详情。
Sometimes you may wish to rename the files you translate automatically, for example adding a language code after the file name.
有时您也需希望系统自动将译好的的文件重新命名，比如在文件名后加上语言代码。

Sometimes you may wish to rename the files you translate automatically, for example adding a language code after the file name. The target filename pattern uses a special syntax, so if you want to edit this field, you must click <e0>Edit...</e0>and use the Edit Pattern Dialog. If you want to revert to the filter's default configuration, click <e1>Defaults.</e1> You can also modify the name directly in the target filename pattern field of the file filters dialog. The Edit Pattern Dialog offers among others the following options:
有时候你可能希望自动重命名所翻译的文件，例如在文件名后添加语言代码。译文文件名模式使用特殊的语法，因此如果要编辑此字段，你必须点击<e0>编辑...</e0>并使用编辑模式对话框。如果要还原为过滤器的默认配置，点击<e1>恢复默认值</e1>。你还可以在文件过滤器对话框的译文文件名模式字段中直接修改名称。编辑模式对话框提供了以下选项：
Sometimes, however, your translated file may look strange, and – in the worst case – may even refuse to open.
然而有时，这些错误会导致译出的文件看起来不正常，在最坏的情况中甚至可能无法打开。

有时由于题材、客户、版本状态等，需要从翻译记忆中区分出高质量译文与不可靠译文。

System-wide commands Select All (<k0>Ctrl+A</k0>), Paste (<e1>Ctrl+V</e1>), Cut (<e2>Ctrl+X</e2>), copy (<e3>Ctrl+C)</e3>, Insert Match or Selection <e4>(Ctrl+I</e4>) and Insert source (<e5>Ctrl+Shift+I</e5>) act in principle on the text within the currently open segment only.

TBX - Term Base eXchange - is the open, XML-based standard for exchanging structured terminological data, TBX has been approved as an international standard by LISA and ISO.
TBX（Term Base eXchange）是用于交换结构化术语数据的基于 XML 的开放标准，已经被LISA和ISO批准为国际标准。

TBX - Term Base eXchange - is the open, XML-based standard for exchanging structured terminological data, TBX has been approved as an international standard by LISA and ISO. If you have an existing terminology handling system it is quite possible it offers the export of terminology data via TBX format. <u0>Microsoft Terminology Collection</u0> can be downloaded in nearly 100 languages and can serve as a cornerstone IT glossary.
TBX——即 Term Base eXchange ——是用于交换结构化术语数据的基于 XML 的开放标准，TBX 已被 LISA 和 ISO 批准为国际标准。如果你已经有术语处理系统，它就很可能以 TBX 格式提供术语数据导出。有近百种语言的 <u0>Microsoft Terminology Collection（微软术语集）</u0>可供下载，可作为基础 IT 词汇表。

Thank you all!
感谢各位！
Thanks to the work of translators in the past, OmegaT's user interface and/or Help texts have been translated into several languages.
感谢以前译者的工作，OmegaT的用户界面和帮助文档 已经被翻译成多种语言。
That means that if you feel so inclined, you may modify OmegaT to suit your own requirements.
这意味着如果你想，就可以修改OmegaT满足自己的需求。
That means that users like you are free to download and use it with very little in the way of restrictions.
这意味着，像你一样的用户，可以免费下载，几乎无限制地使用。
That means there are only a few thousand left!
这意味着只剩下几千种了!
That the file conversion utility is installed properly and is working.
文件转换实用程序已正确安装并正在运行。
That you are remembering to hit Ctrl+s, Ctrl+d in OmegaT.
你记得在OmegaT中按Ctrl + s，Ctrl + d。
That you have set the auto-refresh interval in the browser.
你已在浏览器中设置自动刷新间隔。
The current folder will be used instead.
将改用当前文件夹。
The "/trunk" version is a cutting-edge, "alpha" version, still in development.
“/主干”版本是一个前沿的“alpha”版本，仍在开发中。
The "/trunk" version is a cutting-edge, "alpha" version, still in development. Pre-built binaries, are available as Nightly Builds.
“/trunk”版本是前沿的“alpha”版本，仍处于开发中。预构建的二进制文件以 Nightly Builds 的形式呈现。
The "Cmd" key either has a "command" label or an apple symbol on Apple keyboards.
"Cmd" 键就是在苹果键盘上印有 "command" 或“苹果”符号的那个键。

The "Corresponding Source" for a work in object code form means all the source code needed to generate, install, and (for an executable work) run the object code and to modify the work, including scripts to control those activities. However, it does not include the work's System Libraries, or general-purpose tools or generally available free programs which are used unmodified in performing those activities but which are not part of the work. For example, Corresponding Source includes interface definition files associated with source files for the work, and the source code for shared libraries and dynamically linked subprograms that the work is specifically designed to require, such as by intimate data communication or control flow between those subprograms and other parts of the work.

The "Corresponding Source" for a work in object code form means all the source code needed to generate, install, and (for an executable work) run the object code and to modify the work, including scripts to control those activities. However, it does not include the work's System Libraries, or general-purpose tools or generally available free programs which are used unmodified in performing those activities but which are not part of the work. For example, Corresponding Source includes interface definition files associated with source files for the work, and the source code for shared libraries and dynamically linked subprograms that the work is specifically designed to require, such as by intimate data communication or control flow between those subprograms and other parts of the work.
The "Latest" version is recommended.
建议使用“最新”版本。
The "Professional" version of Infix has a further function of interest to translators: XML text export.
Infix Professional有一个吸引译者的进阶功能：XML文本输出。

The "Shift" key doesn't exhibit any special behavior per se: when the "Shift" key is pressed, all keys move the cursor in their usual manner, except in the case of the <l0>Shift+Enter</l0> combination, that inserts a line break into the text.
“Shift”键本身没有任何特殊行为：当按下“Shift”键时，所有键都以其正常的方式移动光标，唯一的例外是 <l0>Shift + Enter </l0> 组合键，它会在文本中插入一个换行符。
The "Standard" version of OmegaT includes a full user manual (at least in English) and will usually have been tested for some time to eliminate any bugs.
OmegaT 的“标准”版本包括完整的用户手册（至少包含英文版本），并且通常会经过一段时间的测试以消除 bug。

The "Standard" version of OmegaT includes a full user manual (at least in English) and will usually have been tested for some time to eliminate any bugs. It is the recommended version for first-time users.
OmegaT的“标准”版本包含完整的用户手册（至少有英语版本）并且通常已经过一段时间测试来消除各种 Bug。首次使用的用户推荐使用此版本。
The "Status" field displays the limit like as "1,998,890 Characters remaining" for example.<br3/>
例如，”状态“字段显示”剩余1,998,890个字符“.<br3/>

The "System Libraries" of an executable work include anything, other than the work as a whole, that (a) is included in the normal form of packaging a Major Component, but which is not part of that Major Component, and (b) serves only to enable use of the work with that Major Component, or to implement a Standard Interface for which an implementation is available to the public in source code form. A "Major Component", in this context, means a major essential component (kernel, window system, and so on) of the specific operating system (if any) on which the executable work runs, or a compiler used to produce the work, or an object code interpreter used to run it.

The "System Libraries" of an executable work include anything, other than the work as a whole, that (a) is included in the normal form of packaging a Major Component, but which is not part of that Major Component, and (b) serves only to enable use of the work with that Major Component, or to implement a Standard Interface for which an implementation is available to the public in source code form. A "Major Component", in this context, means a major essential component (kernel, window system, and so on) of the specific operating system (if any) on which the executable work runs, or a compiler used to produce the work, or an object code interpreter used to run it.
The "batteries included" version of OmegaT, with its own Java Runtime Environment.
“内置配置”的 OmegaT 版本，有其独立的 JRE。

The "batteries included" version of OmegaT, with its own Java Runtime Environment. This version will take longer to download and will require more space on your hard drive, but you can be confident that it will run. If in doubt, select this option.
“附带电池”的 OmegaT 版本，具有自己的 Java 运行环境。此版本需要更长时间来下载、需要更多硬盘空间，但您可以确信它能运行。如果不确定，请选择此选项。
The "old" version of OmegaT will be overwritten, but any settings from it will be retained.
旧版本的 OmegaT 会被覆盖，不过将保留所有的设置。
The "prepared" form is typically the tool's bilingual file format.
而“准备就绪”的文件通常是该工具的双语文件格式。
The "source code" for a work means the preferred form of the work for making modifications to it. "Object code" means any non-source form of a work.
The "source code" for a work means the preferred form of the work for making modifications to it. "Object code" means any non-source form of a work.

The '*' character matches zero or more characters (the search term 'run*' would match 'run', 'runs', and 'running', for example).
字符 '*'匹配0个或多个字符串（例如：搜索条件 'run*' 将会匹配 'run'、 'runs'和 'running'）。
The '?' character matches exactly one character ('run?' would match 'runs' and 'rung', for example, but not 'run' or 'running').
字符 '?' 匹配任何单个的字符串（例如'run?' 将会匹配'runs' 和 'rung'，但是不匹配 'run' 或 'running'）。
The '?' character matches exactly one character.
'?' 字符只匹配一个字符。

/tm/ 可包含任何数量的辅助翻译记忆，即 TMX 文件。

主开发（trunk）版本（即内部测试版本 Alpha）展示了最新开发状态。

The 3 other options are described in the specific page concerning <l0>TaaS</l0> (Terminology as a Service).

The <e0>"-Duser.language=XX"</e0> argument causes <a1>OmegaT</a1> to use the language specified rather than the language of the user's operating system.
<e0>"-Duser.language=XX"</e0> 参数会使得 <a1>OmegaT</a1> 使用指定的语言而不是用户操作系统的语言。
The <e0>Replace Glossary Hits when Inserting Source Text</e0> option allows to replace automatically glossary hits with the target term when source text is inserted.
<e0>插入原文时替换匹配术语表中的术语</e0> 选项可插入原文时，程序自动替换匹配表中的术语。
The <e0>omegat</e0> subfolder contains at least one and possibly several other files.
<e0>omegat</e0>子目录至少包含一个或多个其他文件。
The <f0>project_stats.txt</f0> located in the omegat folder of your project contains more detailed segment information, broken down by file.
项目 omegat 文件夹中的 <f0>project_stats.txt</f0> 提供了每份文件更多的片段细节信息。
The <f1>project_save.tmx</f1> file contains all the segments that have been recorded in memory since you started the project.
<f1>project_save.tmx</f1> 文件包含了自项目开始以来所有被保存的片段。
The <f2>project_save.tmx</f2> files are then collected and possible conflicts as regards terminology for instance get resolved.
然后收集 <f2>project_save.tmx</f2>，并解决可能存在的用词冲突。
The <f3>level1</f3> and <f4>level2</f4> memories can be shared with users of other translation programs.
<f3>level1</f3>和<f4>level2</f4>翻译记忆可以共享给使用其他翻译工具的用户。

The LanguageTool in OmegaT
OmegaT 中的 LanguageTool
The LanguageTool plugin is included in OmegaT.
LanguageTool插件包含在OmegaT中。

The LanguageTool plugin is included in OmegaT. It will be used automatically by OmegaT if <g0>Options > Language Checker</g0> is checked. The rules applied (if any) will depend on the source and target language of the project. When a rule is triggered, the corresponding phrase will be underlined in blue in the Editor (see <e1>also </e1>and <e2>I didn't do nothing</e2> in the picture above). When hovering the mouse over the underlined phrase, an explanation will appear.
OmegaT 中 已包含了 LanguageTool 插件。如果已勾选了 <g0>选项 > 语言检查器</g0>，OmegaT 会自动使用它。所应用的规则（如果有）取决于项目的原文语言和译文语言。当有规则被触发时，编辑器中相应短语会标上蓝色下划线（请参阅上图中的 <e1>also</e1> 和 <e2>I didn't do nothing</e2>）。将鼠标放在下划线短语上时，会出现相应说明。
The Latest version is a more recent version than the Standard version and includes new features not present in the latter.
最新版本比标准版更新，包含一些之前没有的新特性。

The Latest version requires Java {{site.data.versions.latest.java_version}}. It is a more recent version than the Standard version and includes new features not present in the latter. The Latest version will usually be reasonably stable and usable, but may have some bugs. Documentation, particularly of new features, will be less comprehensive than that of the Standard version. Users who already have some experience with OmegaT often prefer the Latest version.
最新版本需要Java {{site.data.versions.latest.java_version}}。它是比标准版本更新的版本，包括后者中不存在的新功能。最新版本通常相当稳定可用，但可能会有一些 Bug。文档，尤其是新功能的文档，将不如标准版本中那么全面。已经拥有 OmegaT 经验的用户往往更喜欢最新版本。
The Latest version will usually be reasonably stable and usable, but may have some bugs.
最新版本通常都较为稳定，但可能会有一些 bug。
The Linux version of OmegaT is now supplied with its own installation script, linux-install.sh.
Linux 版本的 OmegaT 现在提供了自己的安装脚本 linux-install.sh 。
The Mac OS X equivalent is the application Terminal located in Applications → Utilities.
Mac OSX 对应的是位于 应用程序［Applications] → 实用工具［Utilities］ 中的应用程序终端。
The Mac OSX version is not yet documented and the information below does <b3>not</b3> apply to it.
Mac OSX 版本尚未记录，以下信息不适用于它。 <b3>not</b3> apply to it.
