也可在匹配显示模板区域中可使用预设置变量修改模糊匹配如何显示。

The Match Statistics are tab-separated and you can use <g0>Ctrl+A <i1/></g0><g2>, Ctrl+C <i3/></g2>, <g4>Ctrl+V <i5/></g4> to copy/paste them, for instance into a spreadsheet or into your cost-accounting application.
该匹配统计是 tab 分割的，您可用 <g0>Ctrl+A <i1/></g0><g2>, Ctrl+C <i3/></g2>, <g4>Ctrl+V <i5/></g4> 来复制/粘贴它们，例如到工作表或费用统计程序中。

The Microsoft Office 2007-2010 file formats (also known as Office Open XML, and with the file extensions .docx, .xlsx and .pptx) is radically different to the Office 97-2003 formats which they supersede.
Microsoft Office 2007-2010 文件格式 (也称 Office Open XML, 以及该文件的拓展格式 .docx, .xlsx and .pptx)与其继承的 Office 97-2003 文件格式由本质区别。

The Microsoft Office 2007-2010 file formats (also known as Office Open XML, and with the file extensions .docx, .xlsx and .pptx) is radically different to the Office 97-2003 formats which they supersede. In fact, their structure is very similar to that of OpenOffice.org files: they consists of a zip archive containing multiple files, and the files containing the text are based upon the XML standard. This makes it much easier for CAT tools to support it and edit it directly. The Microsoft Office 2007-2010 file formats can be processed directly in OmegaT; more information can be found <a0>here</a0>.

Microsoft Office 2007-2010 文件格式（也称为 Office Open XML，文件扩展名为 .docx、.xlsx 和 .pptx）与被它们所取代的Office 97-2003 格式完全不同。实际上，它们的结构与 OpenOffice.org 文件的结构非常相似：它们由包含多个文件的 zip 档案所构成，而其中那些包含文本的文件基于 XML 标准。这让 CAT 工具更容易支持并直接编辑它。Microsoft Office 2007-2010 文件格式可以直接在 OmegaT 中处理；更多信息可以在<a0>此处</a0>找到。
The Microsoft Office 2007-2010 file formats can be processed directly in OmegaT; more information can be found <a0>here</a0>.
Microsoft Office 2007-2010 文件格式能直接在 OmegaT 中直接处理；点击 <a0>此处</a0>获取更多信息。

The OmegaT developers' list. This list is for more technical discussion of features and development, and is intended for OmegaT developers and other interested parties.
OmegaT 开发人员的邮件列表。此邮件列表针对的是关于功能和开发的更技术性的讨论，适用于 OmegaT 的开发人员和其他相关方。
The OmegaT project
OmegaT 项目
The OmegaT project and you
你和 OmegaT 项目
The OmegaT project is maintained by an informal, international group of volunteers.
OmegaT项目由一个非正式的国际志愿者组织维护。

The OmegaT project is maintained by an informal, international group of volunteers. Its purpose is to develop, distribute and support the use of OmegaT, an open-source translation memory software application.
OmegaT 项目由非一个正式的国际志愿者小组维护。其目的是开发、发行开源翻译记忆软件 OmegaT，并对 OmegaT 的使用提供支持。
The OmegaT project philosophy
OmegaT 项目理念
The OmegaT project team is not a company or formal legal body, just a group of volunteers involved in the OmegaT project.
OmegaT项目团队不是一个公司或正式的法人机构，只是一群参与OmegaT项目的志愿者。
The OmegaT project would benefit from greater support from volunteers in almost all areas.
OmegaT 项目得益于来自世界各地志愿者的大力支持。
The OmegaT tokenizer is a plugin for OmegaT.
OmegaT tokenizer是OmegaT的一个插件。
The OmegaT version usually supplied is the "Standard" version.
通常提供的OmegaT版本是“标准”版本。
The OmegaT website includes files in HTML and, as of 2011, PHP format.
OmegaT网站包括HTML格式的文件以及2011年的PHP格式文件。
The Open Document Format is an international standard and has replaced the former proprietary (but open) Star Office file format (two different but very similar file formats).
开放文档格式（ODF)是一种国际标准，其代替了之前的专利性（但是开源的）Star Office file 格式(这两种格式不同但相似)。

The Trados "uncleaned" RTF file format, often referred to simply as "uncleaned files", has for many years been the most common bilingual file format used in translation workflows.
Trados "不干净的" 富文本文件格式，常简称为 "不干净的文件",，许多年来都是翻译流程中最常用的双语文件格式。

项目服务下的网址将被SVN用来从客户端连接到您刚建立的SVN服务器。
The Web Start version is the "install and forget" version.<br0/>
网页启动版本为“简单安装'版本。<br0/>

The Web Start version is the "install and forget" version.<br0/> <s1>The benefit</s1>: once launched, future updates of the Web Start version will be installed automatically on your computer.<br2/> <s3>The drawback</s3>: at present, this version cannot be used in conjunction with plug-ins, so not all functions are available.
Web Start 版本是“安装后不管（install and forget）”版本。<br0/> <s1>优点</s1>：一旦启动，Web Start 版本未来的更新都会自动安装到你的计算机上。<br2/> <s3>缺点</s3>：目前，这个版本不能和插件一起使用，因此并非所有功能都可用。
The Web Start version offers an alternative means of installing OmegaT on your computer.
Web Start 版本提供了另一种在电脑上安装 OmegaT 的方法。

The administrator may decide to include following folders and their contents as well: <f0>tm</f0>, <f1>glossary</f1> and <f2>dictionary</f2>. Also <f3>ignored_words.txt</f3> and <f4>learned_words.txt</f4> in the <f5>omegat</f5> folder may be worth sharing and maintaining on the team level. Avoid in any case adding <f6>bak</f6> files, <f7>project_stats.txt</f7> and <f8>project_stats_match.txt</f8>, in the <f9>omegat</f9> subfolder, as they would without any need or profit just bloat the repository. You might want to apply the same to the <f10>target</f10> folder and its contents.

The collaborative translation offered by OmegaT is based on the functionality of version or revision control, widely used by the software community to maintain control of changes to the code of a program and allow unimpeded collaboration within the development team.
OmegaT中的协作翻译基于版本控制功能，该功能广泛应用于软件社区的程序代码维护和开发团队内部的无阻碍协作。

The collaborative translation offered by OmegaT is based on the functionality of version or revision control, widely used by the software community to maintain control of changes to the code of a program and allow unimpeded collaboration within the development team. OmegaT supports two of the popular version control systems (VCS for short), <u0>Apache Subversion</u0> (often abbreviated SVN, after the command name svn) and <u1>Git</u1>. The advantages of a VC system for a team of translators can be summarized as follows:
OmegaT 提供的协作翻译基于版本或修订控制的功能，软件社区广泛使用它来维护对程序代码变更的控制，并让开发团队内部能无阻碍的协作。OmegaT 支持两种流行的版本控制系统（简称 VCS）：<u0>Apache Subversion</u0>（通常按它的命令名 svn 缩写为 SVN）和<u1>Git</u1>。版本控制系统给翻译团队带来的好处可归纳如下：
The collections are downloaded as TBX glossaries in the current glossary folder.

The content of a segment can be deleted completely either by means of the keyboard shortcuts Ctrl+A > Ctrl+X > Enter, by right-clicking with the mouse and the Remove Translation menu item, or simply by using the delete key (repeatedly).
可以通过使用键盘快捷键Ctrl+A > Ctrl+X > Enter，或鼠标右击片段，选择移除翻译菜单选项，再或重复使用删除键，均可实现完全删除一条片段的内容
The content of the files is overwritten either when a new segment is opened (source.txt and target.txt) or when a new selection is exported (selection.txt).
打开新片段（source.txt 和 target.txt）或导出新的选中部分（selection.txt）时，会覆盖该文件的原有内容。

The content of the files is overwritten either when a new segment is opened (source.txt and target.txt) or when a new selection is exported (selection.txt). The files are unformatted plain text files. The whole process can be steered and controlled via Tck/Tcl-based scripting. See <u0>Using the OmegaT text export function</u0> for specifics, examples and suggestions.
文件的内容在打开新片段（source.txt 和 target.txt）或导出新的所选部分（selection.txt）时会被覆盖。这些文件是无格式的纯文本文件。整个过程可以通过基于 Tck/Tcl 的脚本来操纵控制。关于细节、示例和建议，请参阅<u0>使用 OmegaT 的文本导出功能</u0>。
The content of the script window is editable and can be copied and pasted back into the OmegaT Editor pane.
脚本窗口中的内容是可编辑的，也可以复制粘贴回OmegaT编辑器窗格。
The content of the segment source text (<f0>source.txt</f0>).
当前片段的原文内容（<f0>source.txt</f0>）。
The content of the segment target text (<f0>target.txt</f0>).
当前片段的译文内容（<f0>target.txt</f0>）。

可以下列变量定制该内容：
The contents of glossary files are kept in memory and are loaded when the project is opened or reloaded.
术语表文件的内容会存放到内存中，在打开或重新载入项目时加载它们。

The contents of glossary files are kept in memory and are loaded when the project is opened or reloaded. Updating a glossary file is thus rather simple: press <k0>Ctrl+Shift+G</k0> and enter the new term, its translation and any comments you may have (ensuring you press tab between the fields) and save the file. The contents of the glossary pane will be updated accordingly.
词汇表文件的内容是在在打开或重新载入项目时加载的，并存放在内存中。因此，更新词汇表文件非常简单：按 <k0>Ctrl+Shift+G</k0> 并输入新词汇、其翻译以及你想要写下的注释（确保在字段之间按了 Tab 键）并保存文件。词汇表窗格的内容将相应更新。

因此术语表窗格的内容将会被更新。
The contents of the target subfolder will reflect the current state of the translation, as present in the project translation memory, saved in the current <e8>/omegat/project_save.tmx</e8>.
target子文件夹的内容将反映当前的翻译状态，如同在当前<e8>/omegat/project_save.tmx</e8>中保存的项目翻译记忆一样。
The contents of translation memories in the tm subfolder serve to generate suggestions for the text(s) to be translated.
在 tm 子目录中翻译记忆的内容是为要翻译文本提供建议。

The easiest way for a customers to ensure that these two conditions are met is for them to pretranslate the text themselves before passing it to the translator (thereby defining how it is segmented), and to create the translation memory in the CAT tool of their choice after receiving the translated intermediate bilingual file from the translator (thereby ensuring that the formatting information contained within the translation memory will be compatible with future projects).
对客户而言，要确保满足上述两个条件，最简单的方法就是在把文本发给译员之前先自行预翻译（从而确定了切分规则），并且在收到中间形式的译后双语文件后，用自选的 CAT 工具创建翻译记忆（从而确保翻译记忆所包含的格式信息与今后的项目兼容）。
The encoding of glossaries is determined automatically.
术语表的编码是自动决定的。
The encoding of glossaries is determined automatically. Of course, the encoding must be compatible with both the languages contained, so Unicode is recommended.
词汇表的编码是自动确定的。当然，编码必须同时兼容其所包含的两种语言，因此推荐使用 Unicode。
The end of a line
行尾

The entry will be greyed, if there's just one translation available.

The file can usually be extracted by double-clicking on the downloaded package.
通常可通过双击已下载的安装包来解压缩文件。

在设置时该文件可以不存在，在添加词条时会自动创建该文件（如果需要）。
The file is commented to help you.
该文件是用来帮助你。

这些文件是无格式的纯文本文件。
The files are unformatted plain-text files.
导出的文件是没有格式的纯文本文件。
The files of this site, in a convenient package for those wishing to localize it.
为希望对本网站进行本地化的爱好者提供便捷的打包。
The filter will however still work if you do not do this.
但是，如果你不这样做，过滤器仍然可以运行.
The filters available are mainly for file formats peculiar to the IT industry rather than end-user files.
现有的文件过滤器主要都是针对 IT 行业的文件格式，而非终端用户的文件

字体大小

这些格式也在MS Office 2010中使用。
The formatting information can be as simple as “this is bold”, or as complex as table data with different font sizes, colors, positions, etc.
这些格式信息可能就像 “这是粗体”一样简单，也可能是包含了不同的字体大小、颜色和位置等信息的表格数据一样复杂。

如果使用OmegaT进行发言，格式会自动保留。

您复制的标签组所代表的格式将会应用到原标签和复制标签的两个部分。
The full package contains the user manual, the instant start manual, the user interface resource bundle and the readme file.
完整的软件包中包含用户手册、快速入门指南、用户界面资源包和readme文件。
The full syntax for keystrokes (shortcuts) is defined in the following Java 1.6 documentation from Oracle (bottom of page): <u0>Java 1.6 keystrokes shortcuts</u0>

The fuzzy matches can be also sorted in different ways (for displaying only; no influence on statistics).
模糊匹配可以按两种方式排序 （仅用于显示；不影响统计）。
The glossary file does not have the correct encoding.
词汇表文件没有采用正确的编码。

词汇表文件没有正确的扩展名（.tab、.utf8 或 .txt）。

The glossary file must consist of two columns only, have the name GLOSS.utf8, and be present in the /script folder.
词汇表文件必须仅包含两列，名称为GLOSS.utf8，并且存于/ script文件夹中。
The glossary function only finds exact matches with the glossary entry (e.g. does not find inflected forms etc.).
术语表功能只能找到与术语表条目精确匹配的词汇（也就是说不会找到变化的词形）。
The group archives are public and can be viewed without subscription to the group.
该讨论组的存档是公开的，无须订阅该讨论组就可进行查看。

The in-line formatting information made possible by the supported formats (in particular DocBook, HTML, XHTML, Open Document Format(ODF) and Office Open XML (MS Office 2007 and later) at the time of writing) is presented as tags in OmegaT.
在OmegaT中，由所支持格式（尤其是在写入DocBook、HTML、XHTML、开放文档格式（ODF）和 Office 开放 XML（MS Office 2007及更高版本）的时候）产生的内部格式化信息以标签的形式出现。
The included JRE is the 64-bit version.
内含 64-bit 版本 JRE。

下面分别描述各双语文件格式。

下面的信息概述了它们的用途和调用方式：
The install program can create shortcuts for you in the start menu, on the desktop and in the quick launch area.
安装程序可以在开始菜单、桌面和快速启动栏中创建快捷方式。

The install program can create shortcuts for you in the start menu, on the desktop and in the quick launch area. You can also manually drag the file OmegaT.exe to the start menu, the desktop or the quick launch area to link it from there.
安装程序可以在开始菜单、桌面和快速启动栏中创建快捷方式。 您也可以将 OmegaT.exe 文件手工拖动到开始菜单、桌面或快速启动栏 来将其链接到那些地方。
The installation script provides added convenience, but you can still install OmegaT on Linux manually if you prefer.
安装脚本提供了更多的便利，但如果您愿意，仍然可以在 Linux 上手动安装 OmegaT 。
The items are not separated with a TAB character.
条目不是以制表符分隔的。
The kaptain script (or "grammar", as kaptain scripts are termed) enables you to select launch and configuration options from a user-friendly GUI.
kaptain 脚本（或者称为 kaptain 脚本的“语法”）使您能够从一个用户友好的 GUI 中选择启动和配置选项。
The key must then be given to OmegaT using -Dtaas.user.key=xxxxx.
然后通过 -Dtaas.user.key=xxxxx 形式将密钥输入OmegaT。
The language code should be in the form xx-YY, xxx-YY, xx_YY or xxx_YY, where xx or xxx is the language code and YY is the region or country code (optional).
语种代码应以 xx-YY、xxx-YY、xx_YY 或 xxx_YY 的形式输入，其中 xx 或 xxx 是语言代码而 YY 是地区或国家代码（可选）。
The language code should be in the form xx-YY, xxx-YY, xx_YY or xxx_YY, where \n\
语种代码应该以 xx-YY 或 xx_YY 的形式输入，其中 xx 或 xxx 是语言代码而 YY 是地区或国家代码（可选）。
The last frame offers you to have a look at the readme and changes files for the version you have installed.
最后一个画面提议您看看所安装版本的自述文件和更新文件。
The last segment with the identical source text will thus prevail (Note: of course it makes more sense to avoid this to happen in the first place).
因此含相同源文本的最后一个片段将获得采用（注：当然预先避免这种情况发生会更有意义）。
The launch file script contains the OmegaT launch command.
启动文件脚本包含OmegaT启动命令。
The launch scripts will not be written to your execution path in this case.
在这种情况下，启动脚本不会写入执行路径。
The layout shown here is just for the sake of example; you can of course arrange the windows as you like.
这里显示的布局仅仅是为了举例；你可以按你喜欢的方式排列窗口。
The level 2 export is not fully compliant with the level 2 standard, but is sufficiently close and will generate correct matches in other translation memory tools supporting TMX Level 2.
导出的级别 2 不是标准的级别 2，但是足以在支持 TMX 级别 2 的翻译工具中产生正确的匹配。
The level1 file contains only textual information.
level1 文件仅包含文本信息。

The level2 file encapsulates <a0>OmegaT</a0> specific tags in correct tmx tags so that the file can be used with its formatting information in a translation tool that supports tmx level 2 memories, or <a1>OmegaT</a1> itself.
level2 文件以适当的 TMX 标签封装了 <a0>OmegaT</a0> 的特殊标签，因此它可以在支持第 2 级 TMX 的翻译工具中使用其中的格式信息，包括 <a1>OmegaT</a1> 本身。
The levels refer to the formatting information that is contained in the TMX file:
级别指 TMX 文件所包含的格式信息：
The license of each library is mentionned in /lib/licenses/Licenses.txt.
各个库的许可证在此处提及： /lib/licenses/Licenses.txt

在显示匹配率的这一行还显示了包含该匹配的翻译记忆的名称<i1/>。
The list below is <s0>not</s0> an exhaustive list of all file formats supported by OmegaT, but is limited to those of particular interest to typical users.
而以下列表仅包含一般用户最感兴趣的文件格式，并未列出 OmegaT 支持的所有文件格式。.
The location does not matter, since you can add it to the command line at launch (see below).
位置并不重要，因为无论如何，启动时您都必须将位置添加到命令行。
The location does not matter, since you can add it to the command line at startup.
位置并不重要，因为无论如何，启动时您都必须将位置添加到命令行。
The location does not matter, since you have to add it to the command line at the start-up anyway.
位置并不重要，因为无论如何启动时您都必须将位置添加到命令行。
The location is irrelevant, since it must be specified explicitly on the command-line at launch.
位置并不重要，因为无论如何，启动时您都必须在命令行中明确指定它的位置。
The location of the <f1>.tbx</f1> file must be within the <f2>/glossary</f2> folder, but it can be in a deeper folder (e.g., <f3>glossary/sub/MyGlossary.tbx</f3>).
<f1>.tbx</f1> 文件的地址必须在 <f2>/glossary</f2>文件夹中，但也能存在其子文件夹下，如 <f3>glossary/sub/MyGlossary.tbx。</f3>).
The location of the file must be within the <f2>/glossary</f2> folder, but it can be in a deeper folder (e.g., <f3>glossary/sub/glossary.txt</f3>).
文件必须保存在 <f2>/glossary</f2>文件夹中，但它可以保存在/glossary的子文件夹中，如, <f3>glossary/sub/glossary.txt</f3>).
The location of the writable glossary file can be set in the <g0>Project > Properties ... </g0>dialog.
可写术语表的位置可在<g0>项目>属性...</g0>对话框中设定。
The location of the writable glossary file can be set in the <g0>Project > Properties ... </g0>dialog. The recognized extensions are <f1>TXT</f1> and <f2>UTF8</f2>
可以在 <g0>项目 > 属性... </g0> 对话框中设置可写词汇表文件的位置。可识别的扩展名为 <f1>TXT</f1> 和 <f2>UTF8</f2>
The location of user files depends upon the platform you use:
用户文件的位置取决于当前使用的平台：
The locations of the various different translation memories for a given project are user-defined (see Project dialog window in <l0>Project properties)</l0>
对于指定的项目，多种不同翻译记忆的位置是由用户定义的（请参阅<l0>项目属性</l0>中的项目对话框）。
The machine translation pane, when opened, contains the suggestions by machine translation tools for the current segment.
在机器翻译窗格中，打开后其中会包含由机器翻译工具为当前片段提供的翻译建议。
The main OmegaT application.
OmegaT 主程序。
The main menu provides access to all <a0>OmegaT</a0> functions.
通过主菜单可访问 <a0>OmegaT</a0> 的所有功能。
The main project folder contains 3 tmx files, <f0>project_name-omegat.tmx</f0>, <f1>project_name-level1.tmx</f1> and <f2>project_name-level2.tmx</f2> (project_name being the name of your project).
项目主文件夹中包含 3 个 tmx 文件：<f0>project_name-omegat.tmx</f0>，<f1>project_name-level1.tmx</f1> 以及 <f2>project_name-level2.tmx</f2>（project_name 是项目的名称）。
The main window consists of several panes, the main menu and a status bar.
主窗口由几个窗格、主菜单和状态栏组成。
The match statistics are accessed via<g0>Tools>Match Statistics.</g0> The evaluation is rather CPU intensive and can be time-consuming, so a progress bar is shown during the calculation.
通过<g0>工具/匹配统计</g0>可访问统计信息。该统计需要CPU进行繁重的运算而耗时较多，所以在计算时会显示进度条。

The match viewer shows the most similar segments from translation memories, both from internal project translation memory created in real time as you translate your project and from ancillary translation memories you have imported from your earlier jobs, or received from your client or translation agency.
匹配查看器中显示译法记忆中最相似的片段，包括您在项目翻译过程中创建的项目翻译记忆，也包括从您早前工作中导入的辅助记忆，或者是您从客户或翻译代理那里得到得到的。
The matches will be displayed in bold blue.
匹配将显示为蓝色粗体。
The matching percentage is roughly equivalent to taking the number of common words in the matched and the matching segment and dividing by the number of words in the longer of the two.
匹配率大体上相当于匹配片段和被匹配片段中相同的单词数量，并除以两者单词数量中较大者。
The memory named <f5>omegat</f5> can be used by OmegaT itself, in future projects that you create.
名称为<f5>omegat</f5>的翻译记忆可被OmegaT自身用于将来创建的项目。
The messages you would usually find in the status bar are not displayed.
在状态栏通常可以看到的所有信息都不会被显示。
The minimal package contains the same files as the full package, except for the main user manual.
最小软件包中包含除主用户手册外与完整软件包相同的文件。
The minimum is 10 seconds.
最小间隔为10秒。
The most current info about OmegaT can be found at
可从下列网址获取 OmegaT 的最新信息：
The most current info about OmegaT can be found at:
关于 OmegaT 的最新信息，请访问：
The most frequently used functions are accessible with keyboard shortcuts, so once you become accustomed to them, you will no longer need to browse through the menus while translating.
最常用的功能可以使用键盘快捷键访问，因此当您习惯了使用它们之后，在翻译的时候根本不需要使用菜单。
The most important file here is the <f1>project_save.tmx, </f1>that is the working translation memory for the project.
其中最重要的文件是<f1>project_save.tmx</f1>，它是项目的有效翻译记忆文件。
The most important is <l1><project-dir></l1>, and optionally<l2> --config-dir=<config-dir>.
最重要的是 <l1><project-dir></l1>，以及可选的 <l2> --config-dir=<config-dir>。
The most important of these is <l0><project-dir></l0>, and optionally <l1>--config-dir=<config-dir></l1>.
其中最重要的是<l0><project-dir></l0>，还可以加上<l1>--config-dir=<config-dir></l1>。
The most that OmegaT can do in such a case, is to assume that the text is written in the same language the computer itself uses.
在这种情况下，一般 OmegaT 会假设该文本写入时使用了当前计算机所使用相同语言。
The names of the files must correspond to the language code of your target language as defined in the project properties dialog (<g0>Project > Properties</g0>).
文件的名称必须与项目属性对话框（<g0>项目>属性</g0>）中定义的目标语言的代码一致。

The names of the files must correspond to the language code of your target language as defined in the project properties dialog (<g0>Project > Properties</g0>). For example, if you have selected ES-MX (Mexican Spanish) as the target language, the dictionary files must be named es_MX.dic and es_MX.aff. If you only have a standard Spanish dictionary available, with file names es_es.dic and es_es.aff for instance, you can copy these files to es_MX.dic and es_MX.aff, and the spelling dictionary will work. Note that this will of course check for the standard (Castillian) rather than for Mexican Spanish.

文件的名称必须与项目属性对话框（<g0>项目 > 属性</g0>）中定义的译文语言的的语言代码一致。例如，如果你选择了 ES-MX（墨西哥西班牙语）作为译文语言，则词典文件必须命名为 es_MX.dic 及 es_MX.aff。如果您只有标准西班牙语词典（例如文件名为 es_es.dic 及 es_es.aff），您可以将这些文件复制更名为 es_MX.dic 及 es_MX.aff，拼写检查词典会正常运作。要注意，很显然，这会以标准（卡斯提尔）西班牙语进行检查，而非墨西哥西班牙语。
The names of the files must correspond to the language code of your target language as defined in the project properties dialog (Project > Properties).
文件的名称必须与项目属性对话框（项目>属性）中定义的目标语言代码一致。
The new colours have been saved.
新颜色已保存。
The new colours have been saved. Please restart the application to correctly display the new colours.
新颜色已保存。请重新启动应用程序以正确显示新颜色。

The new format can also serve as a useful way of handling the legacy .doc, .xls and .ppt formats, since they can be converted to their MS Office 2007 counterparts, translated in OmegaT, and converted back again.
新格式还可以作为处理旧版.doc，.xls和.ppt格式的有用方式，因为它们可以转换为其MS Office 2007对应版本，在OmegaT中翻译并再次转换。
The new set of rules will be stored together with the project and will not interfere with the general set of segmentation rules.
新的规则集将和项目保存在一起，而不与通用分割规则集相冲突。
The newline (line feed) character ('\u000A')
The next segment with a note attached to it, will open.
打开含笔记的下一个片段。
The number of unique segments, if needed, is provided in the standard statistics window, regardless of whether they have been translated or not.
在需要时，标准统计窗口中会显示唯一片段数，不论它们是否已经翻译。
The numbers must be exactly the same between the source and the target matches.
数字在匹配的原文和译文中必须完全相同。
The obtained API key needs to be passed to OmegaT at startup through <c0>yandex.api.key</c0> command-line parameter.
获得的API Key需启动时通过 <c0>yandex.api.key</c0> 命令行参数传入在OmegaT。
The omegat folder contains the <f0>project_save.tmx</f0> and possibly a number of backup TMX files.
omegat 文件夹包含 <f0>project_save.tmx</f0> 文件，以及一些备份的 TMX 文件。
The one and the same segment may, depending on the context, require different translations.
同样的片段在不同的语境中可能会使用不同的译文。
The online version of Google Translate allows the user to correct the suggestion and send the corrected segment in.
谷歌翻译的在线版本允许用户纠正翻译建议和发送正确的片段。
The only difference with matches from the <f2>project_save</f2> translation memory is that external TMs cannot give exact matches, only 100%.
与 <f2>project_save</f2> 翻译记忆的匹配的唯一区别是外部 TM 中的统计不会得到精确匹配，而只是 100%。

Note that the creator of the repository has implicitly the administrator rights for the repository created. Sign in to the site first or - if it is your first time on the site, register for it and note your user name and password for the future projects.
此处介绍的流程依赖于 <u0>ProjectLocker</u0> 提供的免费 SVN 服务器（限制为 2 个用户）。请注意，存储库的创建者隐含地具有所创建的存储库的管理员权限。首先登录该站点，或者，如果您是第一次访问该站点，请先注册并保存用户名和密码以用于之后的项目。

<u0>此处</u0>描述了配置对 Microsoft Translator 和 Google Translate 服务的访问的过程。
The process of segmenting can be pictured as follows: the cursor moves along the text, one character at a time.
片段分割过程可描绘如下：光标沿着文本移动，每次一个字符。

The process of segmenting can be pictured as follows: the cursor moves along the text, one character at a time. At each cursor position rules, consisting of a <e0>Before </e0>and <e1>After </e1>pattern, are applied in their given order to see if any of the<e2> Before</e2> patterns are valid for the text on the left and the corresponding <e3>After</e3> pattern for the text on the right of the cursor. If the rule matches, either the cursor moves on without inserting a segment break (for an exception rule) or a new segment break is created at the current cursor position (for the break rule).
分割过程可描绘如下：光标沿着文本移动，每次一个字符。在每个光标位置处，由<e0>前</e0>与<e1>后</e1>模式组成的规则将按给定顺序应用，检查是否有任何<e2>前</e2>模式对于光标左侧的文本有效同时相应的<e3>后</e3>模式也对光标右侧的文本有效。如果规则匹配，则光标会移动而不插入片段分割符（对于例外规则）或者在当前光标位置创建新的片段分割符（对于断句规则）。
The program will see confirmation before closing down.
程序在关闭前即需要确认。

The purpose of the console (i.e. command line) mode is to permit the use <a0>of OmegaT</a0> as translation tool in a scripting environment.

The purpose of the plan is to prevent two or more translators from working on the same translation without being aware of it (duplication of effort).
该计划的目的是避免两个甚至两个以上的译员在互不知情的情况下进行重复的工作。

例如在上文示例中的搜索字符串[a-zA-Z]+[öäüqwß]在目标片段中寻找包含疑似来自德语键盘的字符的单词。

OmegaT 文件和目录章节介绍了翻译项目中不同的子目录和文件，阐述了这些子目录和文件的作用，以及其他 OmegaT 相关的用户和应用文件。
The segment is opened when either its segment call-out or segment number is entered.
在调出片段或输入片段数后，片段打开
The segmentation rules are generally valid across all the projects.
分割规则通常应用于所有项目。

The segmentation rules are generally valid across all the projects. The user, however, may need to generate a set of rules, specific to the project in question. Use this button to open a dialog, activate the check box <g0>Project specific segmentation rules</g0>, then proceed to adjust the segmentation rules as desired. The new set of rules will be stored together with the project and will not interfere with the general set of segmentation rules. To delete project specific segmentation rules, uncheck the check box. See <l1>Segmentation Setup preferences</l1> for more information on segmentation rules.
分割规则通常适用于所有项目。但是，用户可能需要生成一组所讨论项目专用的规则。用此按钮打开对话框，激活<g0>将分割规则设为项目专用</g0>复选框，然后根据需要继续调整分割规则。新的规则集将与项目一起存储，不会干扰到通用的分割规则集。要删除项目专用的分割规则，取消勾选此复选框。更多信息关于分割规则的信息，参见<l1>分割设置首选项</l1>。
The segmentation settings only address the way the source files are handled by <a0>OmegaT</a0>.
分割规则设置只影响 <a0>OmegaT</a0> 处理源文件的方式。

The segmentation settings only address the way the source files are handled by <a0>OmegaT</a0>. The predominant way of segmenting the sources is the sentence-level segmenting, so this check box should in a normal case be left checked.
分割规则设置只影响 <a0>OmegaT</a0> 处理原文文件的方式。语句级分割是分割原文的主要方式，所以正常情况下应该选中该复选框。

片段以在项目中出现的顺序显示。

被选中的模糊匹配会以粗体突出显示，对正在翻译片段中缺少的单词显示为蓝色，而在缺少单词旁边的单词显示为绿色。
The selected languages will then be installed and will eventually appear in your spell checker setup window (this may take a while).
随后选中的语言将会被安装，并出现在拼写检查器窗口中（可能需要一段时间）。
The separators between the panes can be dragged to resize panes.
窗格之间的分割线可以拖动来改变窗格的尺寸。
The server can exist in the local network but in the majority of cases it will be available on internet, i.e. via URL address.
服务器可以在本地网络，但大部分情况下它在因特网上，即通过网址访问。
The server keeps the information on checkouts, so that later commits (see below) can be performed in an orderly fashion.
服务器维护了检出的信息，所以以后的提交（参阅下面）可以平滑地进行。
The server makes sure that any conflicting changes, due to two members working on the same checked-out contents, will be resolved.
服务器会确保在两个成员工作于相同的检出内容时引起的冲突得到解决。
The set of <e0>Unique </e0>segments is computed by taking all the segments and removing all duplicate segments.
<e0>唯一</e0>片段数目的计算方法为统计所有的片段并去除所有重复片段。
The settings in your project indicate which is the source and which the target language.
项目的设置将指出哪个是源语言，哪个是目标语言。
The shortcut characters used try to reflect the underlying meaning of the tag (e.g. b for bold, i for italics, etc.)
使用的快捷字符尝试反映标签所代表的格式含义（例如 b 表示粗体，i 表示斜体）。
The shortcut definition file must be named <f0>MainMenuShortcuts.properties</f0> and must contain at most one shortcut definition per line.
快捷键定义文件名称必须为 <f0>主菜单截图..properties</f0>，同时每行最多包含一个快捷键的定义。

The shortcut definition file must be named <f0>MainMenuShortcuts.properties</f0> and must contain at most one shortcut definition per line. Empty lines are accepted and comment lines should start with "//". Anything after the "//" will be ignored.
快捷键定义文件必须命名为 <f0>MainMenuShortcuts.properties</f0>，每行最多包含一个快捷键的定义。可接受空行，而注释行应以“//”开头。在“//”后的所有内容将被忽略。

The shortcut definition syntax is the following: <c0><menu item code>=<shortcut></c0>, where <e1><menu item code></e1> is a code taken from the tables below and <e2><shortcut></e2> is a combination of pressed keys specified by the user
快捷键定义语法如下：<c0><菜单项代码>=<快捷键></c0>，其中<e1><菜单项代码></e1>见下文的各个表格，而<e2><快捷键></e2>是用户指定的按键组合
The shortcut selects the Nth match displayed in the match window (the first match is selected by default)
选中匹配窗口中显示的第 N 个匹配内容（缺省情况下选中第一个匹配）
The simplest way to launch OmegaT, however, is to execute the<e0> <a1>OmegaT</a1>.exe</e0> program.

The word before the = sign is the source term, and its translation is (or are) the words after =. The vocabulary entry can have a comment added. The glossary function only finds exact matches with the glossary entry (e.g. does not find inflected forms etc.). New terms can be added manually to the glossary file(s) during translation, for example in a text editor. Newly added terms will not be recognized once the changes in the text file have been saved.

There are numerous ways of achiving this, but one practical solution is to use a script which "listens" for changes in the translated file(s) produced by OmegaT and then, when a change is detected, automatically launches the utility which converts the file(s) to html format in order for them to be read by the browser.

There are two possibilities to run an SVN server: you can install SVN on your own server or you can use a hosted service.
有两种运行SVN服务器的方式：可以把SVN安装在自己的服务器或使用托管服务。

There are two possibilities to run an SVN server: you can install SVN on your own server or you can use a hosted service. When using an external service you must be aware of the possible implications in terms of confidentiality, since you are loading the original document on a server outside of your direct control. Alternatively, to avoid this issue you can set a private SVN server, for example if you already have an Apache server that includes the software in question (e.g. VisualSVN).
运行 SVN 服务器有两种可能方式：可以在自己的服务器上安装 SVN，也可以使用托管服务。使用外部服务时，您必须注意可能的机密性方面的影响，因为您将原始文档加载到不受直接控制的服务器上。或者，为了避免此问题，可以建立私有 SVN 服务器，例如，如果您已经有了包含相关软件（例如 VisualSVN）的 Apache 服务器。
There are two strategies for segments that contain only such invariable text.
对于只包含不可变文本的片段可以采取两种策略。
There are two ways of launching <a1>OmegaT</a1> using the command line.
在命令行有两种启动 <a1>OmegaT</a1> 的方法：
There is a strong possibility that at some points, your translation will be longer than the original.
在某些时候您的翻译常常要比原始文本要长。
There is however considerable scope within the project for users to suggest improvements and influence the course of future development.
然而，用户在项目中有相当大的空间来提出改进，影响未来开发的进程。
There is no EXACT match between the glossary entry and the source text in your document - for instance plurals.
词汇表的词条和文档中的原文文本之间并不是“精确”匹配——比如，复数形式。
There is no need to instruct OmegaT to use a particular spelling dictionary; OmegaT will use the correct language dictionary based upon the language codes of your project.
无需告诉 OmegaT 使用特殊的拼写词典，它会根据项目的语言代码来使用正确的语言词典。

There is no need to instruct OmegaT to use a particular spelling dictionary; OmegaT will use the correct language dictionary based upon the language codes of your project. Check however that the language codes are exactly the same: an FR-FR dictionary will not work with an FR target setting, for example. If necessary, edit the file names of the dictionary or change your project's language settings.
并不需要指示 OmegaT 使用特定的拼写词典，它会根据项目的语言代码来使用正确的语言词典。但需要确保语言代码完全一致：例如，FR-FR 词典在以 FR 为译文的设置下将无作用。必要时可以编辑词典文件名或更改项目的语言设置。
There may be a delay in publishing signed versions.
在发布签名版本时可能会有延迟。

There may be a delay in publishing signed versions. Users in a hurry can use the unsigned version instead; if you have difficulty launching the app, see <a0>how to open an app from an unidentified developer</a0>.
发布签名版本可能会有延迟。着急的用户也可改用未签名版本；如果您在启动应用时遇到问题，请参考<a0>如何打开未认证开发者的应用</a0>。
There may be cases where you have done a project with e.g. Dutch sources, and a translation in say English.
可能会遇到这样的情况：项目源语言为荷兰语、目标语言为英语。

There may be cases where you have done a project with e.g. Dutch sources, and a translation in say English. Then you need a translation in e.g. Chinese, but your translator does not understand Dutch; she, however, understands perfectly English. In this case, the NL-EN translation memory can serve as a go-between to help generate NL to ZH translation.
某些情况下，你可能已经完成了一个项目，原文为比如说荷兰语，翻译为比如说英语。然后需要将其翻译为比如说中文，但其译者并不懂荷兰语，不过她精通英语。在这种情况下，NL-EN 翻译记忆库可以作为一个中转来帮助生成 NL 到 ZH 的翻译。
There may be older versions of the documentation and/or translation memories (TMX files) available for your language which are useful to your translation.
文档的旧版本和/或翻译记忆库（TMX文件）可用作您的语言资源，这对您的翻译会很有用。
There should be three files, with extensions <e1>dz, idx </e1>and <e2>ifo</e2>.
其应该包括三份文件，扩展名分别为：<e1>dz, idx </e1>和 <e2>ifo</e2>。
There was an error initializing LanguageTool.
初始化 LanguageTool 时出错。
Therefore, press <k0>Ctrl+Shift+V</k0> before you generate your translated files, to validate that your tags are correct.
因此，在生成已译文件前请按下<k0>Ctrl+Shift+V</k0>以检验标签是否正确。
Therefore, the location of OmegaT's configuration folder cannot be reliably determined.
因此，无法可靠地确定 OmegaT 的配置文件夹位置。
These are the files present in the /source folder in a format that OmegaT is able to recognize.
这些是指以OmegaT能够识别的格式存储于/source文件夹中的文件。
These define subsegments that are presented outside the segment in which they are contained (footnotes are a good example).
这能定义那些在包含他们的片段之外呈现的子片段（脚注就是一个很好的例子）.
These file filters are excellent, and the risk of damaging the formatting of a LibreOffice, OpenOffice.org, etc. file during translation in OmegaT is extremely low.
这些文件过滤器性能优良，用 OmegaT 翻译LibreOffice, OpenOffice.org 等文件时，极少损坏其文件格式。
These file formats are proprietary, binary, and until recently were not publicly documented, all characteristics which make them extremely difficult to handle in a CAT tool.
这些文件格式是专有的、二进制的，且至今尚未公布相应文档，这些特性使得它们极难用 CAT 工具处理。
These file formats are the equivalent of Microsoft Office's formats.
这些文件格式等同于 Microsoft Office 格式。
These files are copies of the file <f0>project_save.tmx</f0>, i.e. of the project's main translation memory, excluding the so-called orphan segments.
这些文件是 <f0>project_save.tmx</f0>文件的副本，即不包括被称为孤立片段的主翻译记忆。
These formats are formally known as "Office Open XML", and have the extensions .docx, .xlsx and .pptx respectively.
这些格式正式称为“Office Open XML”，分别具有扩展名.docx，.xlsx和.pptx。
These segments are marked and delimited by special characters and MS Word formatting styles.
这些段由特殊字符和MS Word格式化样式进行标记和分隔。
These three are certain: Death, taxes, and page not found You, victim of one
世间三事确定无疑： 死亡、税收、和找不到页面的问题。 你，受害于其中之一。

These three are certain:

Death, taxes, and page not found.

You, victim of one.

世间三事确定无疑：

死亡、税收、和找不到页面的问题。

你，受害于其中之一。
These translation memories can be very useful when a document that has already been translated needs to be updated.
如果您需要对已译文档进行更新，这些译法记忆可以有效提高效率。

These translation memories can be very useful when a document that has already been translated needs to be updated. Unchanged sentences are automatically translated, while updated sentences are shown with the translation of the most similar, older sentence. Modifications to the original document are thus handled with greater ease. If you are supplied with previously created translation memories , for example by your translation agency or your client, OmegaT is able to use these as reference memories.
当已翻译的文档需要更新时，这些这些翻译记忆库会非常有用。未发生变化的句子会自动完成翻译，而更新过的句子则会提供最相似的旧有句子的翻译作为参考。因此，对原始文档的修改进行处理变得更加容易。如果您手头有过往创建的翻译记忆库，比如说由您的翻译机构或客户所提供，OmegaT 也把它们作为参考记忆库使用。
These units have been skipped.
已跳过这些单元。
These utilities enable OmegaT to be used to translate file formats for which XLIFF conversion filters are available.
这些实用程序使 OmegaT 可用于翻译 XLIFF 转换筛选器可用的文件格式。
They all involve the application of file filters in the<e1> Options </e1>menu.
它们都与<e1>选项</e1>菜单中的文件过滤器应用程序有关。
They also improve glossary matching.
同时也提高了术语表的匹配度。
They are commonly created in word processors or HTML editors.
它们通常由文字处理器和 HTML 编辑器创建。
They are defined as follows:
它们的含义如下：
They are displayed as <EMPTY> in the Editor.
它们在编辑器中显示为<空>
They are not able to contain or retain information regarding the color, font etc of the text.
它们无法包含或保留关于文本的颜色、字体等的信息。
They are protected, so that you cannot modify their contents, but you can delete them, enter them by hand or move them around in the target sentence.
这些标签受到保护，这样您无法修改它们的内容，可以删除、手动输入或移动它们在目标语句中的位置。
They are the files you deal with on a daily basis while translating.
它们是您在翻译时处理文件的日常基础。
They can be found in the folders of the corresponding compiled versions.
您也可在相应编译版本的文件夹中找到源代码包。
They can share common material, like project translation memory and its glossary
他们可以共享公共资料，比如项目的翻译记忆库和词汇表
They can then create their own projects and, deliver their own <f1>project_save.tmx</f1>, when finished or when a given milestone has been reached.
随后他们可创建自己的项目，当结束或到达阶段性目标时实现他们自己的 <f1>project_save.tmx</f1>。
They carry appropriately changed names, so that its contents still remain identifiable, when used elsewhere, for instance in the <f1>tm</f1> subfolder of some other project (see below).
它们使用适当变化的名称，这样在其他地方使用时容易识别其中包含的内容，例如在其他项目的<f1>tm</f1>子文件夹（见下面）。
They contain text formatting information, but such information cannot be reused by <a0>OmegaT</a0> in order to create target files.
其包含文本格式化信息，但这些信息不能被<a0>OmegaT</a0>重新使用来创建目标文件。
They contain the one and the same translation memory contents in different forms, to be used in future projects.
它们包含了不同形式的相同翻译记忆内容，以用于以后的项目。

They generally follow much the same pattern (for an example from the Regular Expression Tester see below): the regular expression (top entry) analyzes the search text (Text box in the middle) , yielding the hits, shown in the result Text box.
他们几乎都遵循同样的模式（见下面的 Regular Expression Tester 示例）：正则表达式（上面的条目）分析了搜索文本（中间的文本框），进行点击，显示结果文本框。

They have however become an important phenomenon in translation workflows involving CAT tools, and they often present the greatest obstacle to compatibility between OmegaT and other CAT tools (or for that matter between CAT tools in general).
而后演变为 CAT 工具相关工作流的重要现象，这些文件格式也代表了OmegaT 与其他 CAT 工具的兼容性鸿沟（或者说是所有 CAT 工具之间普遍性兼容性鸿沟）。
They have the meaning, familiar to Word users:
它们的含义Word用户很熟悉：
They need no knowledge of Java; most if not all programming languages could be used instead, and useful functions achieved even with only relatively limited programming skill.
他们不需要懂Java；大多数时候，不是所有编程语言都会用到，并且有些实用的功能甚至仅仅用到了相当有限的编程技能就得以实现。
They will appear as separate segments in the translation.
它们将以单独片段的形式出现。
They will however always access the same user configuration files (unless launched from a different user account).
然而它们将始终访问相同的用户配置文件（除非从不同的用户帐户启动）。
Third-party Java versions: until relatively recently, OmegaT ran only on Oracle/Sun's own Java.
第三方Java版本：直到最近，OmegaT只能在Oracle/Sun自己的Java上运行。
Third-party software
第三方软件
Third-party software for use with OmegaT
可在OmegaT中使用的第三方软件
Third-party tools
第三方工具
Third-party tools have been produced to deal with the problem.
已经有第三方工具来处理这个问题。
This will delete your local data and re-download the project contents from the server.
这将删除你的本地数据并从服务器重新下载项目内容。
This API key has been blocked
此 API 密钥已被封
This HOWTO aims to provide information in this area.
这篇 HOWTO 旨在提供兼容性信息。

tu.note: HOWTO 不明，沿袭其他同学翻译 "这篇 HOWTO"

tuv.seg: This HOWTO describes OmegaT's compatibility with other software products.
这篇 HOWTO 描述了 OmegaT 与其他软件产品的兼容性。
This HOWTO describes the function and possible uses for it.
这篇HOWTO描述了这一功能以及一些可能的用途。
This HowTo describes OmegaT's functions for automatic match propagation and one-to-many matching.
本指南介绍了OmegaT的自动匹配传播和一对多匹配功能。.
This HowTo describes how to compile OmegaT from the source code.
这篇如何描述如何从源代码编译OmegaT。
This HowTo describes how to use OmegaT in conjunction with Atril's Déjà Vu CAT tool.
本HowTo介绍如何将OmegaT与Atril的DéjàVu CAT工具结合使用。
This HowTo describes the general principles for setting up a preview function.
该指南介绍了设置预览功能的一般原则。
This HowTo describes the use of Priorview for <b1>Windows and Linux</b1>.
本指南提供了<b1>Windows and Linux</b1>的Priorview使用说明。
This HowTo explains how to create a new file filter for use with OmegaT by describing the creation of a rudimentary file filter for the TMX format.
”HowTo“解释了如何创建一个新的文件过滤器以便与OmegaT一起使用，并描述了如何玮TMX格式创建基本文件.
This HowTo provides information on using OmegaT on Linux.
该操作指导您如何在Linux上使用OmegaT。
This HowTo provides tips on translating MS Office 2007 and later (Office Open XML, .docx) files in OmegaT.
本HowTo提供有关在OmegaT中翻译MS Office 2007及更高版本（Office Open XML，.docx）文件的提示。
This ID is already being used.
此 ID 已被使用。
This JRE will not interfere with other Java implementations that may already be installed on your system.
该JRE不会与系统中可能已安装的其它 Java 实现相冲突。
This TM gradually becomes filled during the translation.
该 TM 文件会在翻译时逐步进行填充。
This URL appears to be invalid.
此网站似乎无效。
This URL appears to be invalid. Please double-check it.
此网站似乎无效。请仔细检查一下。
This allows them for instance to check at any moment, whether the target version for the complete project is still OK
这样允许他们，例如在任何时刻进行检查整个项目的目标版本是否已经完成。
This an exception rule, so the rule check box must not be ticked
这是一条例外规则，因此此规则的复选框必须取消勾选。
This applies also to the <l2>Project files</l2> window.
此操作也适用于<l2>项目文件</l2>窗口。

This area allows entering an external post-processing command (for instance, a script to rename files) that will be applied each time Create Translated Documents is used. This external command cannot include "pipes", etc., which is why calling a script is recommended.
此区域允许输入一个在每次使用“创建译文文档”之后都会应用的外部后处理命令（例如，用于重命名文件的脚本）。这个外部命令不能包含“管道”等，因此建议调用一个脚本。
This bar gives the user feedback on specific operations that are in progress.
该栏目向用户给出仅在进行的某个操作的反馈。

This button enables you to browse and download the collections that exist for the project's source and target languages. Private collections are displayed in bold. The collections are downloaded as TBX glossaries and stored in the current glossary folder.
此按钮让你能够浏览并下载已有的那些针对项目原文语言与译文语言的词库。私有词库显示为粗体。词库将下载为 TBX 词汇表并存放在当前词汇表文件夹中。
This call MUST NOT be in swing thread
该调用不能在 swing 线程中
This call MUST be in swing thread
该调用必须在 swing 线程中
This can also be done within OmegaT:
这也可以在 OmegaT 中完成：
This can be achieved (for Déjà Vu DVX) by use of Déjà Vu's "External View" file format.
这可以通过使用DéjàVu的“外部视图”文件格式实现（对于DéjàVu DVX）。
This can be achieved in two ways:
可通过两种方式达到这个目的：
This can be done either within the CAT tool concerned, or in some cases in an external bilingual file format which the tool is capable of reading.
可以在相关 CAT 工具中进行改动，或者也在该工具可读取的外部双语文件格式中进行改动。
This can easily be restored again in the future.
项目文件夹可以在您未来继续使用时重新恢复。
This can sometimes cause a little trouble when you are in the middle of a translation.
如果您正处于翻译工作的中期，这将会导致一个小问题。
This chapter describes the project properties, such as the source and target languages.
本章介绍了项目属性，如源语言和目标语言等。
This chapter is intended for advanced users, who need to define their own variants of segmentation rules or devise more complex and powerful key search items.
本章内容是为高级用户准备的，用于定义自己的分割规则变体或设计更复杂更强大的关键字查找内容。
This collection of scripts may be useful to scripters with a knowledge of tcl/tk.
该系列脚本对熟悉tcl/tk的脚本编写者有所裨益。
This command changes the folder to the folder containing the executable <a0>OmegaT</a0> file.
该命令将目录改为包含可执行 <a0>OmegaT</a0> 文件的目录。
This command does not work once the modified segment has been validated.
如所修改的片段已经确认，则该操作无效。
This command will be executed after Creating Translated Documents.
在创建译文文档后将执行这里的命令。
This converter is available for Windows and Mac.
此插件包含 Windows 与 Mac 版本。
This copies the selected files to the <f3>source</f3> folder and reloads the project to import the new files.
它将选中的文件拷贝到 <f3>/source</f3> 目录并重新载入项目以导入新文件。
This creates a folder called <e1> <a2>OmegaT</a2> </e1>.
该操作会创建一个名为<e1> <a2>OmegaT</a2> </e1> 的文件夹。
This creates an <e2>./OmegaT_3.n.n_Without_JRE/</e2> folder in the working folder with all the files necessary to run <a3>OmegaT</a3>.
这样会在工作目录中创建<e2>./OmegaT_3.n.n_Without_JRE/</e2>文件夹，且其中包含运行<a3>OmegaT</a3>需要的所有文件。

This dialog enables you to set up the source filename patterns of files to be processed by the filter, customize the filenames of translated files, and select which encodings should be used for loading the file and saving its translated counterpart.
该对话框允许您设置该过滤器所处理的文件的源文件名模式，定制已译文件文件名，并为它选择用何种编码来载入文件及保存已译副本。

This dialog enables you to specify the source filename patterns for files to be processed by the filter, customize the filenames of translated files and select which encodings should be used for loading the source file and saving the translation. To modify a file filter pattern, either modify the fields directly or click <e0>Edit</e0>. To add a new file filter pattern, click <e1>Add</e1>. The same dialog is used to add a pattern or to edit a particular pattern. The dialog includes a special target filename pattern editor, which you can use to customize the names of output files.
此对话框让您能够指定要由过滤器处理的原文文件的文件名模式、自定义已译文件的文件名和选择用什么编码来加载原文文件和保存翻译。要修改文件过滤器模式，请直接修改字段名或点击<e0>编辑</e0>。要添加新的文件过滤器模式，点击<e1>添加</e1>。添加模式和编辑特定模式使用相同的对话框。该对话框包含一个专门的译文文件名模式编辑器，您可以使用它来自定义输出文件的名称。
This dialog is accessible by selecting <m0> <g1>Options</g1> <g2>Preferences...</g2> </m0>
此对话框可通过选择<m0> <g1>选项</g1> <g2>首选项...</g2> </m0>来进入
This dialog is accessible by selecting <m0> <g1>Project</g1> <g2>Properties...</g2> </m0>
此对话框可以通过选择<m0> <g1>项目</g1> <g2>属性...</g2> </m0>来进入
This dialog lists available file filters, where the filters used by the current project are displayed in bold.
此对话列出了可利用文件过滤器，当前项目的文件过滤器加粗显示。

This dialog lists the file filters available. The filters used by the current project are displayed in bold. If you prefer not to use OmegaT to translate files of a certain type, you can turn off the corresponding filter by deactivating the check box beside its name. OmegaT will then omit the corresponding files when loading projects, and will copy them unmodified to the target folder when creating target documents. When you wish to use the filter again, just tick the check box. Click <e0>Defaults</e0> to reset the file filters to the default settings. To edit the files and encodings a filter is used for, select the filter in the list and click <e1>Edit.</e1>

此对话框列出了可用的文件过滤器。当前项目所使用的过滤器以粗体显示。如果你不想用 OmegaT 翻译某种类型的文件，可以通过对其名称旁边的复选框的勾选来关闭相应的过滤器。然后，OmegaT 在加载项目时会忽略相应的文件，并在创建译文文档时不加修改地将它们复制到译文文件夹。如果你想再次使用此过滤器，只需要勾选相应复选框即可。点击<e0>默认</e0>可以将文件过滤器重置为默认设置。要编辑过滤器所针对的文件和编码，请在列表中选中此过滤器然后点击<e1>编辑</e1>。
This differences do not generally lead to compatibility problems.
不过这些差异并不会导致兼容性问题。
This document is the official user's guide to OmegaT, the free Computer Aided Translation tool.
该文档是正式的 OmegaT（免费的计算机辅助翻译工具）用户指南。
This documentation is intended both as a tutorial and as a reference guide.
本文档为 OmegaT 的简易教程和参考指南。
This documentation is intended both as a tutorial and as a reference guide. Here is a short summary of the chapters and their contents.
本文档既可作为教程，也可作为参考指南。以下是各章节及其内容的简短概要。
This enables the HTML segmentation rule to be used to choose whether or not segmentation should occur at these points.
这样就能应用HTML的分割规则来选择是否应该在这些点上进行分割。
This enables the document concerned to be released for translation by another translator.
这样相关的文件能够发布到另一位译员处以供翻译。
This enables the numerous suggestions to be managed more easily.
这使得众多建议更易于管理。
This enables the text to be exported to an XML file which can be translated in a CAT tool.
这使得文本能以XML格式导出，从而可以使用CAT工具来翻译。
This enables the translation memories produced by other tools to be read by OmegaT.
这样就可以在 OmegaT 中使用其他工具创建的翻译记忆。
This ensures that the users' interests are protected, and has also resulted in OmegaT being awarded the <a0>Softpedia "100% FREE" guarantee</a0>.
这确保了用户的利益受到保护，并且使OmegaT有<a0> Softpedia“100％免费”的保证</a0>。

然而此功能在 OmegaT 中尚未实现。
This file always exists in the project.
项目中总是存在此文件。

这种文件格式使得OmegaT用户能够向DéjàVu DVX用户提供双语文件，然后他们可以进一步编辑它们或将它们合并到自动化工作流程中。

然而，这个手册如果没有许多人的帮助和支持是不可能的。

该标记优先于标记已译片段和标记未译片段功能。
This may be confusing, so you may consider unchecking this option in this case.
这样可能引起混乱，所以此时您应考虑取消该选项。

This means for instance that you do not need to exit a project you are currently working on if you decide to add another ancillary TM to it: you simply reload the project, and the changes you have made will be included.
这里的意思是，例如如果您想添加一个辅助 TM 到当前正在工作的项目时，无需退出项目：只要简单地重新载入项目，所做的更改就会生效。
This means that as soon as a segment is translated, the same translation is automatically inserted into all identical segments.
这意味着只要翻译了一个片段，相同的翻译就会自动插入到所有相同的语段中。

This means that if the source language is LTR and the target language is RTL, or vice versa, it may be necessary to toggle back and forth between RTL and LTR modes to view the source and enter the target easily in their respective modes.
这意味着如果源语言是自左向右，而目标语言是自右向左，或者反过来，就可能必须在自右向左和自左向右模式之间来回切换，以轻松地在相应的模式下查看源文件和输入译文。
This means that the source code of the OmegaT program is freely available, and that OmegaT's license gives its users considerable freedom in its use.
这意味着OmegaT的源代码可以免费获得，OmegaT的许可证给予用户相当的使用自由。

此选项允许 OmegaT 覆盖 PO 文件头中的规范，并使用所选译文语言的默认值。

该选项支持在批处理模式中进行标签验证。

Tokenizers
分词器
Tokenizers (or stemmers) improve the quality of matches by recognizing inflected words in source and translation memory data.
分词器（或 stemmer，词干分析器）通过识别源语言和翻译记忆数据中的词形变化来提高翻译匹配质量。
Tokenizers (or stemmers) improve the quality of matches by recognizing inflected words in source and translation memory data. They also improve glossary matching.
分词器（或词干分析器）通过识别原文和翻译记忆数据中的词形变化来提高匹配质量。它们同样也提高了词汇表的匹配质量。
Tokenizers are included in OmegaT and active by default.
OmegaT里包含了分词器并且默认为开启状态。

Tokenizers are included in OmegaT and active by default. OmegaT automatically selects a tokenizer for the source and the target language according to the language settings of the project. It is possible to select another tokenizer (Language Tokenizer) or a different version of the tokenizer (Tokenizer Behavior) from the Project Properties window.
OmegaT 中已包含分词器并默认开启。OmegaT 根据项目的语言设置自动为原文语种和目标语种选择分词器。可以在“项目属性”窗口中选择另一个分词器（语言分词器）或分词器的不同版本（分词器行为）。
Tokenizers corresponding to the selected languages are displayed.
会显示所选语言所对应的分词器。

Translation memory tools work with textual units called segments.
翻译记忆工具的使用以叫做片段的文本为单位。

Translation memory tools work with textual units called segments. <a0>OmegaT</a0> has two ways to segment a text: by paragraph or by sentence segmentation (also referred to as “rule-based segmentation”). In order to select the type of segmentation, select <m1> <g2>Project</g2> <g3>Properties...</g3> </m1> from the main menu and tick or untick the check box provided. Paragraph segmentation is advantageous in certain cases, such as highly creative or stylistic translations in which the translator may wish to change the order of entire sentences; for the majority of projects, however, sentence segmentation is a choice to be preferred, since it delivers better matches from previous translations. If sentence segmentation has been selected, you can setup the rules by selecting <m4> <g5>Options</g5> <g6>Segmentation...</g6> </m4>from the main menu.

翻译记忆工具使用称为片段的文本单元。<a0>OmegaT</a0> 有两种方式来分割文本：按段落或按语句分割（亦称为“基于规则的分割”）。要选择分割的类型，请从主菜单中选择<m1> <g2>项目</g2> <g3>属性...</g3> </m1>，然后勾选或取消勾选所提供的复选框。段落分割在某些情况下是有利的，例如在高度创造性或讲究文体的翻译中，译者可能想要整个改变语句的顺序；然而，对于大多数项目而言，语句分割是首选的选择，因为它能更好地与之前的翻译相匹配。如果选用了语句分割，你可以通过从主菜单中选择<m4> <g5>选项</g5> <g6>片段分割...</g6> </m4>来设置规则。

Usage
用法
Usage:
用法：
Usage: <l0>java -jar <a1>OmegaT</a1>.jar /path/to/project --mode=console-translate --quiet</l0>
用法：<l0>java -jar <a1>OmegaT</a1>.jar /path/to/project --mode=console-translate --quiet</l0>
Usage: <l0>java -jar <a1>OmegaT</a1>.jar /path/to/project --mode=console-translate --tag-validation=abort</l0>
用法：<l0>java -jar <a1>OmegaT</a1>.jar /path/to/project --mode=console-translate --tag-validation=abort</l0>
Usage: java -jar OmegaT.jar [<options>] [<project path>]
用法：java -jar OmegaT.jar [<选项>] [<项目路径>]

Usage: java -jar OmegaT.jar [<options>] [<project path>]
Options: None: Launch GUI Project path only: Launch GUI and load specified project team Team project tool. Invoke `team -h` for details. -h, --help Show usage information. --remote-project Download an omegat.project file from the URL given as <project path> and load the project. --mode=[console-translate|console-pseudotranslatetmx|console-align] Specify a mode other than default (GUI). See below for details. --config-file=<path> A Java .properties file from which to load default settings. --resource-bundle=<path> A Java .properties file to use for interface text --config-dir=<path> The directory to read/write OmegaT configuration files from/to. --disable-project-locking Do not attempt to lock the project's omegat.project file. --disable-location-save Do not remember the last directory opened in the file picker. --no-team Disable team project functionality. --ITokenizer=<classname> --ITokenizerTarget=<classname> Source- or target-language tokenizer to use (overrides project settings). See OmegaT.jar/META-INF/MANIFEST.MF for valid values.
Non-GUI mode options: --quiet Reduce output to command line stdout. --script=<path> A script file to be executed on project events. --tag-validation=[abort|warn] Validate tags. Abort: Exit with an error if tags invalid. Warn: Report invalid tags to stdout.
Console-translate mode: --source-pattern=<pattern> A regex whitelist of source files to process.
Console-pseudotranslatetmx mode: --pseudotranslatetmx=<path> The output pseudotranslated TMX file. --pseudotranslatetype=[equal|empty] What to fill the pseudotranslated TMX with.
Console-align mode: --alignDir=<path> A directory containing the translated files.
See Help > User's Manual for more information.
{0}

用法：java -jar OmegaT.jar [<选项>] [<项目路径>]
选项： 无：启动图形界面 仅有项目路径：启动图形界面并载入指定项目 team 团队项目工具。有关详细信息，请调用 `team -h`。 -h, --help 显示用法信息。 --remote-project 从作为<项目路径>给出的网址下载 omegat.project 文件并载入此项目。 --mode=[console-translate|console-pseudotranslatetmx|console-align] 指定默认模式（图形界面）之外的其他模式。请参阅下文了解详情。 --config-file=<path> 用于加载默认设置的 Java .properties 文件。 --resource-bundle=<path> 用于界面文本的 Java .properties 文件 --config-dir=<path> 用于读取/写入 OmegaT 配置文件的目录。 --disable-project-locking 不要尝试锁定项目的 omegat.project 文件。 --disable-location-save 不要记忆最后一次在文件选择器中打开的目录。 --no-team 禁用团队项目功能。 --ITokenizer=<类名> --ITokenizerTarget=<类名> 原文语言或译文语言所使用的分词器（会覆盖项目设置）。有关所有有效的值，参见 OmegaT.jar/META-INF/MANIFEST.MF。
非图形界面模式选项： --quiet 减少输出到命令行 stdout 的输出量。 --script=<path> 在项目事件时执行的脚本文件。 --tag-validation=[abort|warn] 校验标签。Abort：当标签无效时退出并显示错误。 Warn：将无效的标签记录到 stdout。
Console-translate 模式: --source-pattern=<模式> 要处理的原文文件的正则表达式白名单。
Console-pseudotranslatetmx 模式: --pseudotranslatetmx=<path> 输出伪翻译的 TMX 文件。 --pseudotranslatetype=[equal|empty] 用什么来填充伪翻译的 TMX。
Console-align 模式: --alignDir=<path> 包含译文文件的目录。
更多信息，参见 帮助 > 用户手册。

Using the RTL mode in <a0>OmegaT</a0> has no influence whatsoever on the display mode of the translated documents created in <a1>OmegaT</a1>.

Using the RTL mode in <a0>OmegaT</a0> has no influence whatsoever on the display mode of the translated documents created in <a1>OmegaT</a1>. The display mode of the translated documents must be modified within the application (such as Microsoft Word) commonly used to display or modify them (check the relevant manuals for details). Using <k2> <k3>Shift</k3> <k4>Ctrl</k4> <k5>O</k5> </k2> causes both text input and display in <a6>OmegaT</a6> to change. It can be used separately for all three panes (Editor, Fuzzy Matches and Glossary) by clicking on the pane and toggling the display mode. It can also be used in all the input fields found in <a7>OmegaT</a7> - in the search window, for segmentation rules etc.

在 <a0>OmegaT</a0> 中使用从右向左模式对于 <a1>OmegaT</a1> 中创建的译文文档的显示模式没有任何影响。译文文档的显示模式必须在通常用于显示或修改它的应用程序（诸如 Microsoft Word）中修改（详细信息请查看相关手册）。用 <k2> <k3>Shift</k3> <k4>Ctrl</k4> <k5>O</k5> </k2> 会导致 <a6>OmegaT</a6> 中的文本输入与显示都发生变化。通过点击窗格并切换显示模式，它可以单独用于所有三个窗格（编辑器、模糊匹配和词汇表）。它也能在 <a7>OmegaT</a7> 中出现的所有输入字段中使用——搜索窗口中、分割规则等。

Version: {0}
Very early versions of <a0>OmegaT</a0> were capable of segmenting source files into paragraphs only and were inconsistent when numbering formatting tags in HTML and Open Document files.
<a0>OmegaT</a0> 的早期版本只能将源文本按照段落切割成片段，而且对HTML和开放文档文件的格式标签编号时会出现前后不一致。
Very popular clients for Windows environment are <u1>TortoiseSVN</u1> and <u2>TortoiseGit</u2>.
Windows系统中最常用的客户端分别为<u1>TortoiseSVN</u1>和<u2>TortoiseGit</u2>。

我们推荐使用包含 JRE 的 OmegaT 软件包，以避免选择、获取、与安装 JRE 的麻烦。
We therefore recommend that you download and install either the Oracle Java Runtime Environment (JRE) or the OmegaT package bundled with JRE (the .tar.bz2) bundle marked "Linux").
因此，我们建议下载安装或者 Oracle Java 运行环境（JRE），或者标有"Linix"并绑定了 JRE 的 OmegaT 安装包（.tar.bz2）。

Whatever the inconsistencies, omissions and straightforward errors you may find in the present version, I declare them all my own.
不论您可能在当前版本中发现不一致、遗漏或简单的错误，我宣布我们自己的。

Whatever the inconsistencies, omissions and straightforward errors you may find in the present version, I declare them all my own. This manual, however, would not be possible without the help and support from a number of people. Explicit thanks to:
在当前版本中的任何不一致、遗漏或直接错误，均完全归因于我。但是，如果没有许多人的帮助和支持，本手册是不可能问世的。明确感谢：
When OmegaT encounters a file in its source folder, it attempts to select the filter based upon the file's extension.
当 OmegaT 在源文件夹中发现一个文件时，它将首先根据文件的扩展名试着选择过滤器。

When OmegaT encounters a file in its source folder, it attempts to select the filter based upon the file's extension. More precisely, OmegaT attempts to match each filter's source filename patterns against the filename. For example, the pattern <l0>*.xhtml </l0>matches any file with the <l1>.xhtml</l1> extension. If the appropriate filter is found, the file is assigned to it for processing. For example, by default, the XHTML filter is used to process files with the .xhtml extension. You can change or add filename patterns for files to be handled by each file filter. Source filename patterns use wild card characters similar to those used in <e2>Searches. </e2>The '*' character matches zero or more characters. The '?' character matches exactly one character. All other characters represent themselves. For example, if you wish the text filter to handle readme files (<l3>readme, read.me</l3>, and <l4>readme.txt</l4>) you should use the pattern <l5>read*</l5>.

当 OmegaT 在其原文文件夹中遇到文件时，它会尝试根据文件的扩展名选择过滤器。更确切地说，OmegaT 尝试将每个过滤器的原文文件名模式与文件名进行匹配。例如，<l0>*.xhtml </l0>模式将会匹配任何扩展名为 <l1>.xhtml</l1> 的文件。如果找到了合适的过滤器，则将文件分配给它进行处理。例如，默认情况下，XHTML 过滤器用于处理扩展名为 .xhtml 的文件。您可以更改或添加由每个文件过滤器处理的文件的文件名模式。原文文件名模式使用的通配符类似于<e2>搜索</e2>中所用的。“*”字符匹配零个或多个字符。“?”字符只匹配一个字符。所有其他字符代表其自身。例如，如果您希望文本过滤器处理 readme 文件（<l3>readme、read.me</l3> 和 <l4>readme.txt</l4>），那么您应该使用模式 <l5>read*</l5>。
When a rule is triggered, the corresponding phrase will be underlined in blue in the Editor (see <e1>also </e1>and <e2>I didn't do nothing</e2> in the picture above).
检查发现错误后，编辑器中相应短语会标上蓝色下划线（请参阅上图中<e1>also </e1>和<e2>I didn't do nothing）</e2>
When a single file has more segments than this, additional segments will be loaded on-demand as you scroll.
当单个文件的片段数量多于此数字时，多出来的片段会随着滚动按需载入。
When active, <k0> <k1>Ctrl</k1> <k2>M</k2> </k0> will insert the suggestion into the target part of the current segment.
激活后，使用 <k0> <k1>Ctrl</k1> <k2>M</k2> </k0> 可将翻译建议插入到当前片段的目标部分。

When actuated, this launches your browser with a dummy page instructing you to set the automatic refresh function, which you should then do, and then to hit Ctrl+s, Ctrl+d in OmegaT to launch automatic updating of the browser.
点击它就会启动您的浏览器并显示虚拟页面，指示您设置自动刷新功能，然后在OmegaT中按Ctrl + s和Ctrl + d以启动浏览器的自动更新。
When an OmegaT segment containing this string is opened, the script outputs a warning.
当包含这个字符串的OmegaT片段开启，这个脚本会输出一个警告。
When another window is on the foreground, click on the main window to bring it to the foreground or press <k0>Esc</k0> to close the other window.
当其他窗口挡在前面时，点击主窗口使它位于前方，或者按 <k0>Esc</k0> 键关闭当前窗口。
When checked, the items in the glossary auto-completer view will contain the source text, too.
勾选后，在词汇表自动完成视图中的项目中也将包含原文文本。
When enabled, all the formatting tags are removed from source segments.
启用该选项后，会从源片段中移除所有格式化标签。

When enabled, all the formatting tags are removed from source segments. This is especially useful when dealing with texts where inline formatting is not really useful (e.g., OCRed PDF, bad converted .odt or .docx, etc.) In a normal case it should always be possible to open the target documents, as only inline tags are removed. Non-visible formatting (i.e., which doesn't appear as tags in the OmegaT editor) is retained in target documents.
启用后，将从原文片段中移除所有格式化标签。这在处理内联格式并不真正有用的文本（如 OCRed PDF、转换不良的 .odt 或 .docx 等）时特别有用。正常情况下译文文档应当都能打开，因为只移除了内联标签。不可见的格式信息（即不会在 OmegaT 编辑器中显示为标签的那些）在译文文档中会得已保留。
When hovering the mouse over the underlined phrase, an explanation will appear.
将鼠标放在画线短语上时，会出现相应说明。
When launched in console mode, no GUI is loaded ( it will work therefore on any console) and the given project is automatically translated.
在控制台模式下，将不会载入任何图形化界面（因此仅在某控制台中运行），同时会自动按要求翻译指定的项目。
When looking for fuzzy matches, the remove pattern is ignored.
寻找模糊匹配时，会忽略移除模式。.
When mode has been used, this option will specify the files to be processed automatically.
如果使用了模式，则该选项将指定要自动翻译的文件。
When moving between segments, you may wish to populate the editing field with an existing translation in the fuzzy match pane or with the source text.
在片段之间移动时，您可能希望用现存的译文或源文本来填充正在编辑的区域。
When multiple target terms are available, the first one (as shown in the Glossary pane) will be used.
当多个目标术语可用时，（在术语表窗格中显示的）第一条术语会被使用。
When selected, LanguageTool checks the translations, and underline potential issues in blue.
选择该选项后，语言检查工具会对译文检查，并用蓝色显示出可能存在的问题。
When started in console mode, no GUI is loaded (so it will work on any console) and the given project is automatically processed as requested.
在控制台模式下，将不会载入任何图形化界面（因此仅在某控制台中运行），同时会自动按要求翻译指定的项目。
When starting OmegaT from the command line, specify in the command:
通过命令行打开OmegaT，输入命令：
When the translated document is created, its display direction will be the same as that of the original document.
在创建已译文档时，其显示方向将与源文本相同。

When the translated document is created, its display direction will be the same as that of the original document. If the original document was LTR, the display direction of the target document must be changed manually to RTL in its viewing application. Each output format has specific ways of dealing with RTL display; check the relevant application manuals for details.
创建译文文档时，其显示方式将与原始文档相同。如果原始文档是从左向右的，译文文档的显示方向需要手工在查看它的应用程序中改为从右向左。每种输出格式都有专门的方法来处理从右向左显示；查看相关的应用程序手册来了解详情。
When the user exits <a0>OmegaT</a0>, this file is not emptied, in order to be consistent with usual clipboard behavior.
当用户退出 <a0>OmegaT</a0> 时，为了与通常的剪贴板行为一致，该文件不会清空。
When this file is executed, the commands within it are automatically carried out.
执行该文件时，将自动执行其中的命令。
When this is done the panes display a tab at the top.
重叠后的窗格将在顶部显示一个标签。
When this option is checked, the glossary will display pairs or groups of words (expressions) even if the words within them appear separately in the source text.
勾选此选项后，对于由一对或一组单词（表达式）所组成的条目，即使其中的单词在原文文本中是分开出现的，词汇表中也会显示此条目。
When this parameter is added, tag validation is done prior to translation/aligning.
添加此参数后，标签验证操作先于翻译/对齐进行。

When translating between RTL and LTR languages, correctly reading the tags from the source and entering them properly in the target may require the translator to toggle between LTR and RTL modes numerous times.
如需在自右向左和自左向右之间进行翻译工作，为从源文件中正确读取标签以及在目标中正确输入，有可能需要在自左向右和自右向左模式之间来回切换多次。

When translating software-related files, you can configure the Tag Validator options to also check programming (%...) variables. You can also define various options relating to tag validation and define custom tags.
当翻译软件相关的文件时，可以配置标签检验器选项来检查编程（%...）变量。您还可以定义与标签验证相关的各种选项并定义自定义标签。

tu.note: 这是说也可以同时编程么……

tuv.seg: When translating software-related files: Allows you to configure the Tag Validator options to check also programming (%...) variables.
在翻译与软件关联的文件时：您可以通过标签验证器检验程序中的（%...）变量。
When unavailable, the ID will be used as a fallback
不可用时，ID 将用作后备
When using an external service you must be aware of the possible implications in terms of confidentiality, since you are loading the original document on a server outside of your direct control.
使用外部服务时您必须注意到可能的机密泄漏，因为您是在不受自己直接控制的服务器上加载文档的。
When using regular expressions, the replacement string supports references to groups defined in the search string.
当使用正则表达式时，替换字符串支持引用查找字符串中所定义的组。

When we speak of free software, we are referring to freedom, not price. Our General Public Licenses are designed to make sure that you have the freedom to distribute copies of free software (and charge for them if you wish), that you receive source code or can get it if you want it, that you can change the software or use pieces of it in new free programs, and that you know you can do these things.

When we speak of free software, we are referring to freedom, not price. Our General Public Licenses are designed to make sure that you have the freedom to distribute copies of free software (and charge for them if you wish), that you receive source code or can get it if you want it, that you can change the software or use pieces of it in new free programs, and that you know you can do these things.
When working on a team project, this window allows you to define the mapping between remote folders and local folders (see examples <l0>here</l0>).
在处理团队项目时，此窗口允许您定义远程文件夹和本地文件夹之间的映射（示例参见<l0>此处</l0>）。
When writing purely RTL text, the default (LTR) view may be used.
在编写纯自右向左文本时，将使用缺省的（自左向右）视图。

When writing purely RTL text, the default (LTR) view may be used. In many cases, however, it is necessary to embed LTR text in RTL text. For example, in OmegaT tags, product names that must be left in the LTR source language, place holders in localization files, and numbers in text. In cases like these it becomes necessary to switch to RTL mode, so that the RTL (in fact bidirectional) text is displayed correctly. It should be noted that when <a0>OmegaT</a0> is in RTL mode, both source and target are displayed in RTL mode. This means that if the source language is LTR and the target language is RTL, or vice versa, it may be necessary to toggle back and forth between RTL and LTR modes to view the source and enter the target easily in their respective modes.

在编写纯从右向左文本时，可以使用默认的（从左向右）视图。然而在许多情况下，必须在从右向左文本中嵌入从左向右文本。例如，在 OmegaT 标签中、必须维持使用从左向右的原文语言的产品名称、本地化文件中的占位符、以及文本中的数字。在这类情况下，必须转换为从右向左模式，以正确显示从右向左（实际上是双向）文本。应当注意，当 <a0>OmegaT</a0> 处于从右向左模式时，原文和译文都以从右向左模式显示。这意味着如果原文语言是从左向右的而目标语言是从右向左的，或反之，就可能必须在从右向左和从左向右模式之间来回切换，以便在各自的模式下查看原文并输入译文。
When you are ready to view the final product, you can export the translated files, open them in the appropriate application and view the translation in the final format...
如果您需要查看最终翻译成果，您可以导出已译文件，在相应的应用程序中打开，查看导出为最终格式的译文...

When you begin a new project on the same subject or for the same customer, navigate to the repository folder in the <g0>Project > Properties > Edit Project dialog</g0> and select it as the translation memory folder.
当您为同一主题或者同一客户开始新项目时，在<g0>项目 > 属性 > 编辑项目</g0>对话框内转到该仓库文件夹，将其选作翻译记忆库文件夹。

When you create a translation project, OmegaT automatically creates a folder with the specified name, and a list of folders:
创建翻译项目时，OmegaT会自动创建一个您指定名称的文件夹和一系列文件夹：

When you create the target documents in an <a0>OmegaT</a0> project, the translation memory of the project is output in the form of three files in the root folder of your <a1>OmegaT</a1> project (see the above description).
在<a0>OmegaT</a0>项目中创建目标文档时，项目的翻译记忆记忆将会在<a1>OmegaT</a1>项目的根目录中输出三份文件（查阅之前的表述）。

When you create the target documents in an <a0>OmegaT</a0> project, the translation memory of the project is output in the form of three files in the root folder of your <a1>OmegaT</a1> project (see the above description). You can regard these three tmx files (<f2>-omegat.tmx</f2>, <f3>-level1.tmx</f3> and <f4>-level2.tmx</f4>) as an "export translation memory", i.e. as an export of your current project's content in bilingual form.
当你在 <a0>OmegaT</a0> 项目中创建译文文件时，项目的翻译记忆库将输出为 <a1>OmegaT</a1> 项目根目录下的三个文件（参见上文描述）。你可以将这三个 tmx 文件（<f2>-omegat.tmx</f2>、<f3>-level1.tmx</f3> 和 <f4>-level2.tmx</f4>）视为“导出翻译记忆库”，即以双语形式导出的当前项目的内容。

tu.note: 这里的句点明显应用逗号

tuv.seg: When you exit the project.
在退出项目时，

When you exit the project. the TMX files in the main project folder (see above) now contain the translations in the selected language pair, for the files, you have copied into the source folder. Copy them to a safe place for future referrals.
现在退出项目。主项目目录（见上文）中的 TMX 文件现在包含你复制到原文文件夹中的文件的所选语言对的翻译。将它们复制到安全的地方备用。
When you have selected all of these, the Start button appears.
当你选择完毕，就会出现开始按钮。
When you left-click on the number, the selected script will run.
当您左键点击数字时，将运行选择的脚本。

When you left-click on the number, the selected script will run. You can start the selected macros from the main menu as well by using their entries in the <g0>Tools </g0>menu or by pressing<k1> Ctrl+Alt+F#</k1> (# 1 to 12).
当您左键点击数字时，将运行所选脚本。您还可以在主菜单中点击 <g0>工具</g0> 菜单下的脚本条目或按 <k1>Ctrl+Alt+F#</k1>（#表示1到12）组合键来运行所选的宏。

When you let OmegaT know the files that you need to translate, it looks for the files it understands based on file filtering rules, recognizes the textual parts within them, splits up the text groups according to the segmentation rules, and displays the segments one by one so that you can proceed with the translation.
您可以通过设置选择需要翻译的文件，OmegaT可以通过文件过滤规则对文件进行查找，辨认文件中的文本部分，根据片段分割规则对文本进行分割，然后在编辑器中显示出待翻译的片段以供翻译。
When you load a segmented TTX file, segments with source = target will be included, if "Allow translation to be equal to source" in Options → Editing Behavior... has been checked.
当您加载片段化的TTX文件时，如果选中了选项→编辑行为...中的“允许译文和原文相同”选项时将会包含源文本与目标文本相同的片段。
When you move to another segment, the translation is validated and stored.
移动到另一个片段时，译文将被确认并保存。
When you move to the next segment, the first fuzzy match (the one with the best matching percentage) is automatically selected.
当您进入下一片段，第一个模糊匹配（拥有最高匹配百分比的那个）自动被选中。
When you release the right click, a dialog opens with a number of options.
当你释放右键时，会打开一个对话框，其中包含多个选项。
When you translate your files, <a2>OmegaT</a2> stores all your progress in the translation memory <l3>project_save.tmx</l3> that resides in the project's <l4>/omegat</l4> subfolder.
在翻译文件时，<a2>OmegaT</a2>在项目的<l4>/omegat </l4>子文件夹的翻译记忆文件<l3>project_save.tmx</l3>中储存您所有的进度信息。
When you wish to use the filter again, just tick the check box.
如果之后您又决定使用这些过滤器，只需勾上这些复选框。
Whenever you finish a project, copy one of the three "export" translation memory files from the root folder of the project to the repository folder.
每当完成一个项目，将三份“导出”翻译记忆库文件之一从项目的根文件夹复制到仓库文件夹。

Whenever you want to see what your translation will look like in its final format, press <k2>Ctrl+D</k2> to generate the translated documents, which will be created in the <f3>/target/</f3> subfolder of your project folder.
当您想看看译文的最终格式时，按下<k2>Ctrl+D</k2>会生成已译文档，它们在项目文件夹中的<f3>/target/</f3>子文件夹。
Where a paragraph contains desired formatting, you must restore the deleted formatting after levelling the paragraph.
如果段落包含所需的格式，则必须在平整段落后恢复已删除的格式。
Where circumstances permit, unifying used fonts, font sizes, colors, etc. should be considered, as it could simplify the translation and reduce the potential for tag errors.
如果有可能，应该尽可能考虑使用统一的字体、字体大小、颜色等，以此简化翻译工作和减少可能的标签错误。
Where paragraphs do contain inline formatting (bold, italics, hyperlinks, etc.), you can either:
在段落包含内联格式（粗体，斜体，超链接等）的情况下，您可以：
Where possible, unifying the fonts, font sizes, colors, etc. used in the document simplifies the task of translation and reduces the possible number of tag errors.
如果有可能应该考虑在文档中使用统一的字体、字体大小、颜色等，以此简化翻译工作和减少可能的标签错误。
Where routine tasks are concerned, volunteers working on the OmegaT project are generally given as much freedom as possible in determining the form of their contribution.
在日常任务方面，从事OmegaT项目的志愿者通常会有尽可能多的自由来确定其贡献形式。.
Where the vendor of a software product claims that his product is compatible with another piece of software, this compatibility is seldom 100%.
就算软件产品供应商声称其产品与其他软件兼容，事实上也很少完美兼容。

Where two segments also have identical preceding and following segments (for example when an entire page appears twice in the text), they cannot be translated differently from each other in OmegaT, i.e. it is not possible to make one of them an "alternative translation".
有些情况，两个片段也会拥有相同的前后片段，（例如，当一整页内容在一篇文章中出现两次），在OmegaT中这两页无法被译成不同的版本，即无法为其中一页设置“可选译文”。
Whether anti-aliasing is enabled (this is a command-line launch option, but you can also set it in the kaptain launch script)
是否启用了抗锯齿功能（这是一个命令行启动选项，但您也可以在kaptain启动脚本中进行设置）

Whether or not it is adopted depends firstly upon whether the development team considers it beneficial to OmegaT, and secondly, upon whether one of the developers is willing to do the work of implementing it.
它是否被采用，首先取决于开发团队是否认为这是对OmegaT有利的，其次是开发人员是否愿意实现它。
Which version do you want to keep?
你想保留哪个版本？

While the translation is progressing, additional files (<e2><f3>project_name</f3></e2><f4>-omegat.tmx, project_name-level1.tmx and project_name-level2.tmx</f4>) are created (and updated during the process of translation) in this folder.
在翻译时会在此文件夹中创建（且在翻译过程中更新）附加文件（<e2><f3>project_name</f3></e2><f4>-omegat.tmx、project_name-level1.tmx和project_name-level2.tmx</f4>）。

Will Helton: his final reading of the draft has spared me a lot of embarrassment.
Will Helton：他查看草稿后的决定省去了我一堆麻烦。

Will be synchronized next time.
将在下次同步。

您可以将MS Office 1997/2000/2003 / XP文件转换为MS Office 2007格式，方法是在MS Office 2007中打开它们，并以新格式保存为“另存为”。
You can create a new project for each new job, and you can add new source files to a project at anytime.

您可以决定完全不翻译这样的片段。

You can decide not to translate such segments at all. OmegaT will then report these segments as not translated. This is the default. The alternative is to enter a translation that is identical to the source text. OmegaT is able to recognize that you have done this. To make this possible, select this option.
您可以决定完全不翻译这类片段。OmegaT 会将这些片段报告为未译。这是默认的情况。另一种方法是输入与原文相同的译文。OmegaT 可以识别出您已经翻译过了。要允许这一点，请勾选此选项。
You can define one of the alternative - for instance the most probable among them - as default translation by selecting <g1>Edit → Use as Default Translation</g1>
您可以通过<g1>编辑→用作默认译文</g1>指定某个可选译文（例如其中可能性最大的译文）为默认译文。
You can define out-of-turn tags.
你可以定义外转标签.
You can delete the line:
您也可以删除横线:
You can disable the auto-propagation function with Project > Properties > uncheck the "Auto-propagation of Translations" box.
你可以通过项目>属性>取消勾选“翻译自动传输”选框，停用自动传输功能。

You can either copy files manually, i.e. from elsewhere on your system, using your file manager; or you can use OmegaT's <e0>"Install new dictionary"</e0> function to provide a list of available dictionaries to select from.
您可以使用文件管理器从其他位置手动复制文件，或使用 OmegaT 的<e0>“安装”</e0>功能来提供可选择的词典列表。
You can either enter the source and target languages by hand or use the drop down menus.
您可以手动输入语种或者通过下拉菜单选择。

You can either enter the source and target languages by hand or use the drop down menus. Bear in mind that changing the languages may render the currently used translation memories useless since their language pair may not longer match the new languages.
您可以手动输入或者通过下拉菜单选择原文与译文语言。请记住：更改语言可能会导致当前使用的翻译记忆库变得无用，因为其语言对可能与新语言不匹配。
You can eliminate this problem by specifying a tokenizer for the target language as well (where available), with the argument --ITokenizerTarget=.
你可以通过也为目标语言指定一个分词器（如果可用），并使用参数--ITokenizerTarget =来消除此问题。
You can enable project specific filters via the <e0>Project → Properties...</e0>.
通过<e0>项目→属性...</e0>您可以启用项目专用过滤器。
You can find detailed statistic information in the file: {0}
可在以下文件中找到详细统计信息： {0}
You can find detailed statistic information in the file:\n{0}
可在文件：{0} 中找到更多详细统计信息
You can find the text of the license in /docs/OmegaT-license.txt.
你可以在此找到许可证的文本： /docs/OmegaT-license.txt
You can for example use it to select the user interface language, assign more memory to OmegaT, or enter a Google Translate password.
例如，您可以使用它来选择用户界面语言，为 OmegaT 分配更多内存，或输入 Google 翻译密码。
You can go to the <a0>home page</a0> and hopefully find the information you need from there.
前往 <a0>首页</a0> 希望你能查找到有用信息
You can have as many "alternative translations" as you like of identical segments, but there can only be one default translation (or none at all).
你可以为相同片段设置多种“可选翻译”，但只能有一种默认翻译（或完全没有）。
You can have entries with the target column missing, i.e. just containing the source term and the comment.
您可以添加目标列为空的条目，即只包含源术语和注释。
You can have several Search windows open at the same time, but close them when they are no longer needed so that they do not clutter your desktop.
您可以同时打开多个搜索窗口，但别忘记在不需要时关闭它们，这样它们才不会弄乱您的桌面。
You can have the source text inserted automatically into the editing field.
您可以将源文本自动插入编辑区域
You can have the source text inserted automatically into the editing field. This is useful for texts containing many trade marks or other proper nouns you which must be left unchanged.
你可以将原文文本自动插入编辑区。这对于包含许多商标或其他必须保持不变的专有名词的文本很有用。
You can however obtain a neater and more user-friendly installation by using the installation script (linux-install.sh).
不过，您可以使用安装脚本（linux-install.sh）获得更整洁、更友好的安装。

You can however obtain a neater and more user-friendly installation by using the installation script (linux-install.sh). To use this script, open a terminal window (console), change folder to the folder containing OmegaT.jar and the linux-install.sh script, and execute the script with ./linux- install.sh.
不过，您可以使用安装脚本（linux-install.sh）获得更整洁、更友好的安装。 要使用此脚本，请打开终端窗口（控制台），进入包含 OmegaT.jar 和 linux-install.sh 脚本的文件夹，然后用 ./linux-install.sh 执行脚本。
You can however use other software if you wish.
但是如果您愿意的话也可以使用其他软件。
You can launch OmegaT from the command line with a script that includes start-up options or you can click on <e0><a1>OmegaT</a1>.jar</e0> to launch it directly.
可直接在命令行中通过包含命令行启动参数的脚本启动 OmegaT，或直接点击 <e0><a1>OmegaT</a1>.jar</e0> 启动它。

You can level the formatting of paragraphs essentially by copying whole paragraphs in MS Word and pasting them back over themselves such that the entire paragraph assumes the formatting of the first character.
您基本上可以复制MS Word中的整个段落，并粘贴他们至整个段落，使整段采用第一个字符的格式来平整段落的格式。
You can modify OmegaT's behaviour by editing the <e0>Properties</e0> as well as the <e1>Configuration.properties</e1> file in the package.
你可以通过编辑 <e0>Properties</e0>以及<e1>组件中的Configuration.properties</e1> 文件来修改OmegaT的行为。
You can modify, correct, add or delete information at your own discretion.
您可以自行决定修改、更正、添加或删除信息。
You can now translate the text (see screenshot).
现在您就可以翻译文本了(参见截图)。
You can open them in an Internet browser to obtain access to external links.
您可在网络浏览器中打开它们以访问其外部链接。
You can overlap panes if desired.
需要时您可以重叠窗格。
You can presumably resolve this by obtaining and installing the necessary fonts; or you can select a different font for this purpose – which may or may not be an adequate solution.
您也许可以通过获取和安装必要的字体来解决这一问题；或者您可以根据目的选择一个不同的字体——这有可能或也可能不是一个妥善的办法。
You can process the generated tmx with any tool you want.
可以使用任何工具处理生成的 tmx 文件。
You can quickly see their contents by looking at their title: it will contain the search term used.
通过标题您可以快速了解它们的搜索内容：标题中包含了搜索用词。

You can regard these three tmx files (<f2>-omegat.tmx</f2>, <f3>-level1.tmx</f3> and <f4>-level2.tmx</f4>) as an "export translation memory", i.e. as an export of your current project's content in bilingual form.
可将这三份 TMX 文件（<f2>-omegat.tmx</f2>，<f3>-level1.tmx</f3> 和 <f4>-level2.tmx</f4>）视为一份“导出的翻译记忆”，即当前项目的可导出双语形式。
You can run OmegaT directly from the command line with
您可以直接从命令行运行OmegaT
You can select a file with <k0>Up</k0> and <k1>Down</k1> keys, and open it for translation by pressing <k2>Enter</k2>
您可以使用<k0>Up</k0>和<k1>Down</k1>选择文件，然后按<k2> Enter</k2>打开此文件开始翻译。
You can select which elements are to be translated.
您可以选择要翻译的元素。

接着可以点击喜欢的翻译来将其插入目标片段的当前位置。

然后，你可以在页面 <u0>https://term.tilde.com/account/keys/create?system=omegaT</u0> 上创建访问密钥。
You can then enter a new shortcut and assign it with Assign as you did before.

然后您可以转回搜索窗口以编辑找到的下一个片段，例如进行检查或者在必要时调整术语。
You can think of LanguageTool as a software to detect errors that a simple spell checker cannot detect, e.g. mixing up there/their, no/now etc.
LanguageTool可用于检查一般拼写检查软件无法检测出的错误，例如混用了there/their、no/now等。

You can think of LanguageTool as a software to detect errors that a simple spell checker cannot detect, e.g. mixing up there/their, no/now etc. It can also detect some grammar mistakes. It does not include spell checking. LanguageTool will find errors for which a rule has been defined in its language-specific configuration files.
您可以将 LanguageTool 视为一种用于检测简单拼写检查程序无法检测到的错误（例如：弄混了 there/their、no/now 之类）的软件。它也可以检测一些语法错误。但它不包括拼写检查。 LanguageTool 将查找在其特定于语言的配置文件中已定义规则的错误。
You can thus select a word anywhere in <a2>OmegaT</a2> and use Services to check this word, for instance in Spotlight or in Google.
因此，您可以在 <a2>OmegaT</a2> 的任何地方选择一个单词，然后使用在 Spotlight 或谷歌提供的服务查阅该词。
You can toggle between different display modes by pressing <k0> <k1>Shift</k1> <k2>Ctrl</k2> <k3>O</k3> </k0> (this is the letter O and not the numeral 0).
通过按下 <k0> <k1>Shift</k1> <k2>Ctrl</k2> <k3>O</k3> </k0>（字母 O 而不是数字 0）来切换不同的显示模式。

您可以使用类似的过程为您的宏创建一个按钮：

您可以用使用搜索窗口查找项目中的某个片段。

您可以选择<g0>工具>统计</g0>查看该文件
You create first an empty client folder on your disk.
您先在磁盘上创建空的客户端文件夹。
You currently have {1}.
您目前使用的是 {1}。
You define its location and name in the project properties dialog.
您可以在项目属性对话框中设定其位置和名称。

You define its location and name in the project properties dialog. The extension must be <f0>.txt</f0> or <f1>.utf8</f1> (if not, it will be added). The location of the file must be within the <f2>/glossary</f2> folder, but it can be in a deeper folder (e.g., <f3>glossary/sub/glossary.txt</f3>). The file does not need to exist when setting it, it will be created (if necessary) when adding a glossary entry. If the file already exists, no attempt is done to verify the format or the character set of the file: the new entries will always be in tab-separated format and UTF-8. As the existing content will not be touched, damage to an existing file would be limited.

您可以在项目属性对话框中定义其位置和名称。其扩展名必须为<f0>.txt</f0> 或 <f1>.utf8</f1>（如果不是的话，则会添加）。文件必须位于 <f2>/glossary</f2> 文件夹内，但可以位于更深的文件夹中（例如：<f3>glossary/sub/glossary.txt</f3>）。在设置时该文件可以不存在，当添加词条时会自动创建该文件（如果需要）。如果该文件已存在，不会尝试验证其格式或字符集：新条目将始终使用以制表符分隔的格式和 UTF-8 编码。由于不会触及已有的内容，因此限制了对已有文件的破坏。
You do not have to translate a complete package; you can, for instance, translate just the user interface (Bundle.properties), or just the instant start tutorial.
您无需翻译整个软件包，可以只翻译一部分，比如只翻译用户界面或快速入门指南。
You have complete freedom in how you translate.
您可以完全自己决定如何去翻译。

你已达到每日请求限制

你已达到每日翻译文本量限制

In <m0> <g1>Options</g1> <g2>Editing Behavior...</g2> </m0> <a3>OmegaT</a3> offers you the following alternatives:

Your project does not contain any files in a supported file format. (In the user's manual, see 'Files to translate' > 'File formats' for a list of supported file formats.) To add files to the project, click on the Copy Files to Source Folder... button in the Project Files window or call this action from the Project menu and select the source files you want to copy. You may also copy the files to your project's 'source' folder using your favorite file manager and reload the project by calling Reload from the Project menu.

specify what parts of text should NOT be separated.

specify what parts of text should NOT be separated. In spite of the period, <e0>"Mrs. Dalloway "</e0> should not be split in two segments, so an exception rule should be established for Mrs (and for Mr, for Dr, for prof etc), followed by a period. To define a rule as an exception rule, leave the Break/Exception check box unticked.
指定不应分开的文本部件。尽管其中有个句点，但<e0>“Mrs. Dalloway”</e0>不应当分割为两个片段，因此应当为后面跟着句点的 Mrs（以及 Mr、Dr、prof 等）制定一条例外规则。要将一条规则定义为例外规则，请取消对断句/离外复选框的勾选。
